TITLE: 110 Volt Wall Adapter for Rugged Handheld Radio Charging Cradle
DESCRIPTION: 110 Volt Wall Adapter for Rugged Handheld Radio Charging Cradle Replacement works to recharge the Handheld Rugged Radio, making it compatible with several Charging Cradles for Handheld Rugged Radios including the GMR2, GMR2 PLUS, RH5R, RH5R-V2, RDH16-U, RDH16-U-HV, RDH-X, and RDH-X-HV models. Its function requires a charging cradle.

TITLE: Replacement Power Cord for 6-Pack Bank Chargers
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Power Cord for 6-Pack Bank Chargers ensures continual power. Suitable for all Rugged Radios 6-Bank Chargers, this power cord assists in maintaining charged communications, ready for work, race, or play.

TITLE: 110 Volt Wall Adapter USB Charge Cable
DESCRIPTION: The 110 Volt Wall Adapter USB Charge Cable comes with the ability to charge multiple devices simultaneously. Its dual-port mechanism aids in better connectivity. Its compact size makes it handy and easy to use. It also comes with an LED indicator for charge indication. It is compatible with all USB powered devices.

TITLE: 110 Volt Wall Adapter for Rugged Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: 110 Volt Wall Adapter for Rugged Handheld Radios is a directly connecting replacement accessory for several radio models: GMR2 GMR2-PLUS R1 V3. It can also associate with BAT-RH5R-XL. The adapter operates by connecting straight to the battery's port.

TITLE: SUPER SPORT Wired Helmet and Cable Kit with Alpha Audio Speakers and Mic
DESCRIPTION: SUPER SPORT Wired Helmet and Cable Kit encompasses Alpha Audio Speakers and Mic, suitable for 2 and 4-wheel riders and compatible with all adventure bikes, dirt bikes, quads, and UTV. This lightweight kit provides race-level audio performance, delivering key functionality of full race kits. Package contains two helmet kits, dual cable bundle for intercom linkage, enhancing in-car communication for driver and passenger. Alpha Audio helmet speakers yield full-range sound, enhanced highs and lows, while the dynamic noise-canceling microphone assures clear voice transmission. Microphone positioning is facilitated with a full-flex boom mic. Secure connections courtesy of Snap-Lock Dura-Link connectors. The set includes durable cables made to endure rugged use and works seamlessly with all Rugged SUPER SPORT harnesses and cabling with 3.5mm Snap-Lock Dura-Link connectors. Installation involves use of 3M adhesive mounting and double-sided tape.

TITLE: Velcro Mount Push to Talk (PTT) Buttons for Intercoms - Driver and Passenger PTT - Bundle
DESCRIPTION: Velcro Mount Push to Talk (PTT) Buttons for Intercoms is available both individually or as a convenient bundle. They come with tough cables which have extra length. Notable features include new rugged ABS housing, high bend test cable, industry standard 3 pin plug, and a water resistant PTT cover. This model also offers a quick Velcro mounting. The steering wheel PTT has coil cord while the passenger grab bar mount PTT comes straight. Compatible with Rugged Radios intercom RRP660, RRP660 PLUS, RRP696, and other brands like Avcomm, PCI Racer X, MRC. The cable length varies from 6ft coiled to 10ft when extended.

TITLE: 3.5 Stereo to Mono Adapter
DESCRIPTION: 3.5 Stereo to Mono Adapter allows the connection of mono earbuds to a stereo with a 3.5mm stereo male connector and a 3.5mm mono female adapter. This adapter is popular for Nitro Bee X applications for compatibility with mono earbuds.

TITLE: 2 Person - 364 Super Sport - Communication Intercom System with Helmet Kits
DESCRIPTION: The 2 Person - 364 Super Sport - Communication Intercom System with Helmet Kits enables streaming music, conversation between driver and passenger and easy usage. By turning on and adjusting the volume, communication begins. Pairing your phone with Bluetooth 5.0 facilitates addition of music. The Super Sport cabling, with a lightweight design and press-fit 3.5mm connectors, provides secure, waterproof headset connections. It is equipped with a fiber weave abrasion resistant shield for durability. Expanding a single headset port into two, allows for conversations with up to four passengers. Bluetooth 5.0 and support for aptX provides high fidelity music and GPS navigation. The kit facilitates making and receiving phone calls when you connect your smartphone. Super Sport cabling offers easy installation and built-in PTT buttons permit vehicle-to-vehicle communication. Included in the kit are the RRP364-BTC Intercom, a two-position intercom cable, and a Super Sport helmet kit for both positions. As a reminder, external push-to-talk (PTT) buttons are not available for this unit.

TITLE: Four Place Expansion for Rugged OFFROAD Intercom Systems
DESCRIPTION: Four Place Expansion for Rugged OFFROAD Intercom Systems turns your four person intercom setup into eight. This product offers plug and play expansion with quick and easy installation, making it apt for airboats, military vehicles, or any large group in high noise environments. You can plug your 2-way radio headset directly into a 5-pin jack or add a CS-OFF intercom cable for usage with your favorite Ultimate Headset or Offroad Helmet Kit.

TITLE: RRP5050 2 Person Helmet Kit System
DESCRIPTION: RRP5050 2 Person Helmet Kit System incorporates two, 3.5-watt amplifiers for separate volume controls for driver and co-driver. Includes a sealed 3.5mm port that allows connection of MP3 player or phone for music enjoyment. Facilitates connection to a 2-way handheld or mobile radio for communication with other cars. Features OFFROAD construction and special shape for easy installation. Engineered for high-noise environments. Offers adjustable depth and angle mounting and high-output amplifier for enhanced music listening. Comes with mounting brackets and hardware. Package includes one RRP5050 Intercom, two Helmet Kits, two 12' Foot Intercom Cables, one Driver Push-to-Talk, and one Passenger Push-to-Talk.

TITLE: RRP5050 2 Person Race Intercom Kit
DESCRIPTION: RRP5050 2 Person Race Intercom Kit is a reliable, cost-effective intercom designed specifically for drivers who enjoy both racing and pleasure drives. With separate volume controls for driver and co-driver, courtesy of dual amplifiers, communication is blissfully easy. Catch music tunes while on the go, thanks to the 3.5mm music port compatible with an mp3 player or phone. Connect with other cars via a 2-way handheld or mobile radio through the built-in radio jumper pigtail. Built to cope with high-noise environments, the RRP5050 integrates smoothly into race trucks, UTVs, or buggies. Offering race and play features, it caters splendidly to the 50/50 driver and comes at an affordable price.

TITLE: Nut Plate for Rugged 5100 Intercom Insert
DESCRIPTION: Nut Plate for Rugged 5100 Intercom Insert facilitates the mounting of your 5100 intercom on any flat dash, improving serviceability of the intercom system. By cutting an opening in the dash and attaching the nut plate using double stick tape, the intercom can be easily accessed and serviced. This Nut Plate is compatible with Rugged 5100 intercom and almost any box style intercom made since 1991, such as Racer X, AVCOMM, and PCI.

TITLE: OFFROAD and STX Cable Adapters - Mono
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD and STX Cable Adapters serve as a backup replacement for STX headsets. Handy for swapping into a friend's vehicle with a different connection, the adapters help convert your STX headset to either Stereo or Mono. Compatibility is specific to STX Ultimate and AlphaBass headsets. These are sold individually.

TITLE: OFFROAD and STX Cable Adapters - Stereo
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD and STX Cable Adapters serve as replacement components for STX headsets. Suitable as a backup or for use with differing connections in another vehicle, they enable conversion of the STX headset to Stereo or Mono format. Compatibility extends to STX Ultimate and AlphaBass headsets. Available for individual sale.

TITLE: RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES Intercom with Helmet Kits - Yes - Install DSP Chips
DESCRIPTION: The product, RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES Intercom with Helmet Kits, surpasses all other racing intercoms. With an accessible flip switch, Side Tone is effortlessly turned off to minimize background noise for improved driver co-driver communication. Primary attributes also consist of a Driver Isolate Switch for focus on driving, independent dual volume controls, and an adaptable internal amplifier gain for personalized audio levels with varying speaker types. Built on transformer based circuitry in Rugged exclusive Total Shielded Housing, the RRP6100 provides excellent RF interference protection. The surface mount added microphone level control pots facilitate various dynamic mics for optimal noise level alignment. RRP6100 comfortably accommodates two-way radio, handheld or mobile units and offers AUX port for music, smartphones, cameras, GPS, or satellite phones. The RRP6100 Intercom is specifically designed for extreme offroad race vehicles and can be fitted with optional Digital Speech Processor Chips (DSP) to further enhance voice clarity.

TITLE: RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES Intercom with Helmet Kits - No - Don t Install DSP Chips
DESCRIPTION: RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES includes Helmet Kits, designed for high-level performance in any racing environment. With Side Tone, switch off instantly for reduced background noise, enhancing driver and co-driver communication. Driver Isolate Switch directs all radio communications to the co-driver when turned inONin. Enjoy independent volume adjustments for each user and adjustable audio levels to suit low ohm or high ohm speakers and earbuds for personal preference. The RRP6100, featuring transformer-based circuitry and Total Shielded Housing from Rugged, is safe from RF interference for optimal audio performance. Its surface mount internal microphone level control pots cater to any dynamic mic matching the noise level, ensuring clear communication in extreme racing conditions. Ready for Two-way radio, the RRP6100 accepts handheld or mobile units. Options for music, smartphones, cameras, GPS, or satellite phones are available through the rear AUX port. Optional Digital Speech Processor Chips (DSP) significantly reduce background noise for clearer voice communications.

TITLE: RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES Intercom - Yes - Install DSP Chips
DESCRIPTION: The RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES Intercom provides superior performance in racing intercoms. Features include a Side Tone which, when turned off, dramatically lowers background noise for clear communication between driver and co-driver. Other features include a Driver Isolate Switch, directing radio communications to the co-driver, dual volume controls, and an internal amplifier gain for personalised audio adjustment regardless of whether earbuds, low ohm or high ohm speakers are used. Packaged in Rugged's exclusive Total Shielded Housing with transformer based circuitry, the RRP6100 is immune to RF interference, ensuring top-tier audio performance. The rear AUX port makes it compatible with handheld or mobile units, as well as other devices such as music, smart phones, RePlay and GoPro cameras, GPS, or satellite phones. Specially developed for extreme offroad race vehicles, the RRP6100 also allows addition of optional Digital Speech Processor Chips (DSP) for enhanced voice clarity.

TITLE: RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES Intercom - No - Don t Install DSP Chips
DESCRIPTION: RACE INTERCOM KIT - RRP6100 RACE SERIES Intercom performs incomparably in the race intercom market with the ability to immediately turn off Side Tone, reducing background noise for clear communication between driver and co-driver. Features a Driver Isolate Switch which, when activated, directs all radio communications to the co-driver while letting the driver concentrate on driving. Independent volume adjustments for driver and co-driver, adjustable audio levels for any race application and compatibility with various types of speakers, are provided by the internal amplifier gain. The RRP6100, built with transformer based circuitry and enclosed in Rugged's exclusive Total Shielded Housing, is safeguarded against RF interference, delivering top-quality audio performance. Its internal microphone level control adapts to any dynamic mic to suit noise levels, ensuring clear communications in extreme race situations. The RRP6100 is prepared for Two-way radio and can link with handheld or mobile units and features a rear AUX port for added options like music, smartphones, cameras, GPS, or satellite phones. Developed for extreme offroad race vehicles, it is the ideal intercom for Trophy Trucks, Class 1, and Ultra4. The optional Digital Speech Processor Chips (DSP) upgrade significantly eliminates background noise for clearer voice communications.

TITLE: BUILDER KIT - 696 PLUS Intercom System with Bluetooth Music
DESCRIPTION: BUILDER KIT - 696 PLUS Intercom System with Bluetooth Music lets users interact with passengers, link to a two-way radio, take phone calls, and listen to music from their phone. Its upgraded Bluetooth module brings high-quality music. Its enhanced interface allows comprehensive cell phone & music management. Other developments involve refined VOX and volume adjustments, next-level electrical interference resistant mechanism, an extra 5th passenger crew port. The RRP696 PLUS intercom enables easy conversation with passengers through the sets or helmet kits. Also, it\ allows for interaction with other vehicles by connecting a radio using the integrated jumper cable and pressing the PTT on the wheel or grab-bar. It connects to Ride Command, GPS, or any Bluetooth device for music and phone calls. High output amplifier offers high fidelity audio for excellent music experience. There's a shuffle function for music directly from the faceplate of the intercom. These full kits are available with basic mounting brackets.

TITLE: 6-Pack Bank Charger for Handheld Radios - GMR2
DESCRIPTION: 6-Pack Bank Charger for Handheld Radios offers organized radio management and simultaneous charging for up to 6 radios, eliminating the need for multiple chargers. Convenient central location, individual indicator lights in front of each slot for easy identification of charging status: red for charging and green for fully charged. Dimensions are L: 11in x W: 8 5/8in x H: 2 1/2in. Radios and High Capacity batteries, required for operation, are not included. The charger isn't compatible with Standard V3 batteries.

TITLE: 6 Pack - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radios with Bank Charger - Grey
DESCRIPTION: The BUNDLE - 6 PACK Bank Charger with GMR2 PLUS GMRS/FRS Two Way Radios includes six GMRS handheld radios, one bank charger, and an AC Power Supply. With individual indicator lights at each charging slot, the bank charger allows for easy radio management, charging up to 6 radios at once. Red light shows the radio is charging, while a green light means full charge. The dimensions of the bank charger are L: 11in x W: 8 5/8in x H: 2 1/2in. All GMRS radios are compatible, including Rugged G1, GMR45, GMR25, and GMR2 from various manufacturers like Motorola, Midland, Uniden and more, along with FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22.

TITLE: 6 Pack - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radios with Bank Charger - Safety Yellow
DESCRIPTION: BUNDLE - 6 PACK Bank Charger with GMR2 PLUS GMRS / FRS Two Way Radios is a collection of six GMRS handheld radios and a bank charger that keeps the radios organized and fully charged. Indicator lights in front of each charging slot show whether a radio is charging (red light) or fully charged (green light). The dimensions of the bank charger are L: 11in x W: 8 5/8in x H: 2 1/2in. The pack additionally includes six GMR2 PLUS Handheld Radios and an AC Power Supply. All GMRS radios, including models from other manufacturers, are compatible, along with FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22.

TITLE: 6 PACK - Choose Your Business Band Two Way Handheld Radio - R1 Blue
DESCRIPTION: 6 PACK - Choose Your Business Band Two Way Handheld Radio comes with six Business Band radios and a bank charger for centralized charging. TITLE: Fire and Safety 2-Person Dual Radio Intercom Kit
DESCRIPTION: Fire and Safety 2-Person Dual Radio Intercom Kit is designed for rugged conditions in various vehicles like fire trucks, ambulances, and public safety vehicles. The RRP800 kit provides clear communications. It supports quick and easy installation, allowing engineer and officer positions for hands-free voice-activated communication while using push-to-talk to transmit on up to two radios. The intercom features include voice-activated operation, dual two-way radio ready & expandable, adjustable transmit mic gain, audio receive gain, stuck mic indicator, 6-pin auxiliary port for cell phone and audio in/out, quick lock easy install cable connections, and 100% shielded RF housing. The RRP800 is also easy to install with Quick Lock connections. An included Universal Radio Jumper offers easy connectivity to any mobile radio. The installer can adjust the mic gain and audio receive gain for the best audio performance. This kit is compatible with Rugged Radios, Firecom, David Clark, and Sigtronics headsets using the Nexus 5-conductor TP105 Plug. The kit can be expanded to your vehicle using Rugged's accessories.

TITLE: Fire and Safety 4-Person Dual Radio Intercom Kit
DESCRIPTION: Fire and Safety 4-Person Dual Radio Intercom Kit is built for extreme conditions including fire trucks, brush trucks, and ambulances. Key features include a rugged design for clear communication among engineer, officer, and crew positions, allowing hands free communication. An additional attribute is that it allows these individuals to transmit on two radios using push-to-talk. The intercom feature has a voice-activated operation, is expandable, and has an adjustable transmit mic gain. It also has a inStuck Micin indicator and auxiliary ports for cell phones and audio in/out. Other notable product attributes are the Quick Lock easy install cable connections, 100% shielded RF housing, and the PTT Jack Boxes with dual push-to-talk. The kit also includes extension cables, engineer jack boxes, an inline electrical noise reducing intercom audio filter, and the universal radio jumper kit. Completing the kit are Rugged Fire/Safety headsets and cables, compatible with Rugged Radios, Firecomm, David Clark, and Sigtronics headsets. The kit is easy to install with Quick Lock connections and a plug-and-play design. The Rugged 800 Intercom Kit can be expanded with Rugged's range of accessories.

TITLE: Fire and Safety 6-Person Dual Radio Intercom Kit
DESCRIPTION: Fire and Safety 6-Person Dual Radio Intercom Kit caters to rugged conditions in fire trucks, ambulances, tactical and public safety vehicles. With a robust design, the RRP800 kit provides clear communication, connecting engineer, officer, and crew positions for hands free, voice-activated communication. Features include adjustable transmit mic gain and audio receive gain, stuck mic indicator, and the kit is dual two-way radio ready. The dimensions are 5.9L x 3.9W x 1.6H. The Kit also includes PTT Jack Box with dual PTT's, Nexus 5 conductor TJ105 jack, aluminum extrusion construction, and built-in panel mount design with self-tapping screws for easy installation. There's a universal radio jumper kit for connectivity to any mobile radio. Audio performance is optimized through independent mic gain and audio receive gain adjustments. It's compatible with Rugged Radios, Firecomm, David Clark, and Sigtronics headsets using the Nexus 5-conductor TP105 Plug. The kit is expandable with additional Rugged accessories.

TITLE: Fire and Safety 6-Person Dual Radio and Pump Panel Intercom Kit
DESCRIPTION: Fire and Safety 6-Person Dual Radio and Pump Panel Intercom Kit is designed for rugged conditions in various vehicles including fire trucks, brush trucks, ambulances, and public safety vehicles. With the RRP800 kit, communication is powerful and clear. It ensures hands-free, voice activated communication and can simultaneously transmit on two radios. The intercom has various features such as voice-activated operation, adjustable mic gain and audio receive gain, and a 6-pin auxiliary port for cell phones. The kit includes an RRP800 Dual Radio Intercom, engineer Jack Boxes with Dual Radio Push-to-Talk, Dual Crew Headset Jack Boxes, a Universal Radio jumper kit, and an Inline Electrical Noise Reducing Intercom Audio Filter. The intercom system is easy to install using Quick Lock connections and is compatible with Rugged Radios, Firecomm, David Clark, and Sigtronics headsets using the Nexus 5-conductor TP105 Plug.

TITLE: Accessory Hub for Rugged M1 Mobile Radios
DESCRIPTION: Accessory Hub for Rugged M1 Mobile Radios offers convenience with accessible connections to programming data port and 3.5 mm external speaker output. This cable, that connects to the rear panel of M1 mobile radios, is installed near the dash for easy access. ACCS-HUB Accessory Hub comes included with M1 radios.

TITLE: Master Communication Accessory Kit - Offroad
DESCRIPTION: Master Communication Accessory Kit - Offroad: An essential, robust kit specifically designed to cater for all offroad communication needs. The kit is a comprehensive set that contains high-quality compatibility with offroad vehicles for seamless, reliable communication. The kit comes with various useful features, ensuring users have all the tools they need for effective communication while exploring offroad terrains. Sturdily built for durability and performance, this Kit makes staying connected in difficult terrains easier and more efficient. Aimed at outdoor enthusiasts who venture into offroad areas, this kit represents the ultimate in communication tools. Easy to set up and operate, this kit is an essential for any offroad adventurer.

TITLE: Master Communication Accessory Kit - STX
DESCRIPTION: Master Communication Accessory Kit - STX is designed for excellent communication experience. With premium sound quality, the accessory kit includes high-quality earphones, microphone, and a connectivity cable. The earphones provide top-notch sound clarity and are comfortable for prolonged use. With a durable microphone, it picks up fewer background noises, thus, less liked to distract conversation flow. The kit comes with a long, sturdy connectivity cable that offers easier and flexible setup. It delivers superior professional performance, enhances voice clarity, and reduces echo. The kit ensures user-friendly and efficient communication for various applications.

TITLE: Active Noise Filter for Radio and Intercom Systems
DESCRIPTION: Active Noise Filter for Radio and Intercom Systems is an affordable accessory designed to suppress noise generated through the charging system/power supply by being installed inline with your radio and intercom. This filter improves communication, and flaming current fluctuations from electrical components or accessories contribute to noise and disrupt conversations. This plug-and-go accessory can enhance the sound quality for both your intercom and radio when installed on the power lead to your component. The value of this small investment is evident in profound audio enhancement. This Filter also features waterproof connectors compatible with mobile radios manufactured by Rugged Radios.

TITLE: Intercom PTT to Car Harness Push to Talk (PTT) Adapter
DESCRIPTION: Intercom PTT to Car Harness Push to Talk Adapter comes with a 3-pin male connector on each end, enabling conversion of PTT buttons with a 3-pin female end to connect racing communication harnesses such as Offroad Single Seat Car Harness, NASCAR / Circle Track 3-Conductor Long Car Harness, IMSA 4-Conductor Nexus Road Race Long Car Harness etc. Its compatibility extends to PTT-VM2-CCXL, PTT-VM2-SC, PTT-HM-CCXL, PTT-HM-SC and PTT-HM-SC-12 and is an updated adapter of CS-PTT-M2M.

TITLE: Adventure Van Cabinet Bag Bundle
DESCRIPTION: Adventure Van Cabinet Bag Bundle is designed to fit standard depth cabinets in Sprinter vans and ideal for carrying handheld radios, tools, more. Storage bag bundle combines medium-sized bags and compact Cube Bags. Key features of Medium Bag include foam-padded interior, interior pocket, adjustable/removable divider, ergonomic handle, top label pocket and Velcro patch strip. It measures 9in W x 11in H x 6in D. Cube Bag, made of durable ballistic nylon, with Rugged Radios logo, has dimensions: 8in W x 5.5in H x 3in D and includes a handle. Bundle includes (3) Medium bags, (6) Cube bags, and (1) Pack of 4 morale patches. Ideal for neat organization and easy access of gear.

TITLE: Adventure Van Shelf Bag Bundle
DESCRIPTION: Adventure Van Shelf Bag Bundle is specifically designed for Sprinter van's standard-depth overhead shelf. This storage bag bundle, including large bags and compact Cube Bags, simplifies gear organization. The bags, handy for storing items such as handheld radios, tools, clothing, snacks, etc., feature foam-padded interiors and an internal pouch for small items like SD cards and headphones. With an adjustable compartment divider, the bag's layout can be customized or removed for larger items like camera equipment. The Large Bag and Cube Bag have beneficial features like added protection, customizable interior dividers, easy carrying handle, and quality construction, plus they are size-compatible. Application is straightforward, simply apply the RF Noise Reducer to any cables, recommending two each around 3 inches from every cable end. Compatibility extends to Radio & Intercom Power Cables, Speaker Wires, Mic Cables, and Headset Cables. It comes in two sizes, small for 3mm and under, and large for up to 5mm.

TITLE: Clamp On RF Noise Reducing Filter Choke Clip - Large (Up to 5mm)

Practical use involves clamping the reducer to any cable, best when two are used on each cable, placed around 3 inches away from each end. Suitable for radio and intercom power cables (either Ground [BLACK] or Live [RED] Wires), speaker wires, mic cables, headset cables. Small model for 3mm and under, large model for up to 5mm. It contains 6.5 feet of filtering media, which is 18% more than conventional filters. Deep pleats trap particles, heavy-grade interior wire mesh blocks larger particles, and an open cell intermediate foam filter provides additional protection. An outer micron pre-filter prevents most particulates from interrupting airflow. These extend the life of your paper filter.

TITLE: HIGH PERFORMANCE Filter Kit for MAC Air Helmet Pumper - 5 Kits

When dirty, the paper filter is replaceable, while the other filters are washable. TITLE: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios - Rugged Radios V3 and RH-5R
DESCRIPTION: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios provides quick connect/disconnect radio frequency connectors for coaxial cable. Compatible with Rugged Radios R1, ABH7, RDH-X, GMR2, GMR2-PLUS, RDH-16, and RH-5R & V3. Adapters include SMA male (SMA-M) adapter, BNC Female/SMA Male Adapter, which can be used with Motorola and Vertex handheld radios. Specifically for Vertex EVX-531, there is an adapter, BNC-ADPT-MOT. There is also an adapter for Icom and Motorola handheld radios.

TITLE: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios - Rugged Radios R1 / GMR2 PLUS / RDH16 / RDHX / ABH
DESCRIPTION: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios includes a quick connect/disconnect BNC Connector for coaxial cable, equipped with two bayonet lugs on the female connector, and provides full connection with a quarter turn of the coupling nut. The Rugged Radios models R1, ABH7, RDH-X, GMR2, GMR2-PLUS, and RDH-16 use the BNC SMA male (SMA-M) Adapter. The BNC Female/SMA Male Adapter is designed for use with Motorola or Vertex handheld radios, specifically the Vertex EVX-531, which uses the BNC-ADPT-MOT. Also included are Icom and Motorola handheld radio adapters named respectively as BNC-ADPT-ICOM and BNC-ADPT-MOT.

TITLE: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios - Icom
DESCRIPTION: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios are BNC connectors with a miniature quick connect/disconnect radio frequency function for coaxial cable. Distinguished by two bayonet lugs on the female connector, this adapter affords connections to antennas and coax cables with a quarter turn of the coupling nut. The adapter is compatible with Rugged Radios R1, ABH7, RDH-X, GMR2, GMR2-PLUS, RDH-16, RH-5R & V3, and for Vertex EVX-531, Motorola and Icom handheld radios. BNC SMA male (SMA-M) Adapter, BNC Female/SMA Male Adapter, and a variety of other adapters are available.

TITLE: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios - Motorola
DESCRIPTION: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios features a BNC Connector, a miniature quick connect/disconnect radio frequency connector used for coaxial cable. Two bayonet lugs on the female connector and a quarter turn of the coupling nut completes the mating. The BNC provides convenient connections to antennas and coax cables. Models include Rugged Radios R1, ABH7, RDH-X, GMR2, GMR2-PLUS and RDH-16, with BNC SMA male (SMA-M) Adapter and Rugged Radios RH-5R & V3. Use includes Motorola or Vertex handheld radios, best for Vertex EVX-531 with the BNC-ADPT-MOT. Also compatible with Icom and Motorola handheld radio.

TITLE: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios - Motorola and Vertex
DESCRIPTION: BNC Antenna Adapters for Handheld Radios include a BNC Connector, a quick connect/disconnect radio frequency connector for coaxial cable, with two bayonet lugs on the female side that connects with a quarter turn of the coupling nut. These adapters provide connections to antennas and coax cables, with specific models suitable for Rugged Radios R1, ABH7, RDH-X, GMR2, GMR2-PLUS, RDH-16, RH-5R & V3, Motorola, Icom and Vertex handheld radios. Adapters come in different types such as BNC SMA male (SMA-M) Adapter, BNC Female/SMA Male Adapter. The Vertex EVX-531 model specifically uses the BNC-ADPT-MOT adapter.

TITLE: BNC Antenna Connector for Coax Cable
DESCRIPTION: BNC Antenna Connector for Coax Cable is always required when working with antenna coaxial cable - this standard connector crimps on to complete your cable assembly. Replacing it after working on your antenna coax cable is recommended to assure the best fit and performance of all radio components. This miniature quick connect/disconnect radio frequency connector, used for coaxial cable, features two bayonet lugs on the female connector, with mating fully achieved with a quarter turn of the coupling nut. This provides convenient connections to antennas and coax cables.

TITLE: Replacement Mic Boom for BT2 Bluetooth Headset
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Mic Boom for BT2 Bluetooth Headset, a direct replacement choice for former BT2 headset users. This particular mic exhibits multiple unique features, including a molded mount, a hook and loop style fastener, a flexible mic boom, and a male connector addition. These exceptional features promise to keep communications working proficiently.

TITLE: Ford Bronco Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - G1 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: Ford Bronco Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit comes with exceptional range and clarity, ensuring you never lose communication on your adventures. Available in GMR25, G4, and G1 models, these radios can withstand harsh environments and feature a reliable rugged tuned GMRS antenna. Installation is easy and requires no special tools; the kit includes all hardware and mounts. Compatibility is universal, communicating with all GMRS and FRS radios, which makes it a match with brands like Motorola, Midland, Uniden. The kit offers a direct bolt-on fitment to the factory mounting points, not requiring any drilling. Included are choices from waterproof G1, durable G4, waterproof GMR25 models and a premium GMRS tuned antenna. A 13 rugged cable with nickel-plated brass NMO mount, a custom mount and a mobile radio mount, specifically designed for Ford Bronco interiors, are also featured. However, adapted lighting conditions or Bronco Sport are incompatible, the same goes on for ditch lights. For easy and diverse communication, a built-in Rugged Ready pigtail cable integrates with intercoms, 5-pin accessories. This durable and easily installed radio kit provides reliable communication across remote areas.

TITLE: Ford Bronco Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - Rambler G4
DESCRIPTION: Ford Bronco Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit provides rugged communication for every adventure. With three models namely GMR25, G4, and G1, these radios ensure unmatched clarity and reliability. Designed specifically for tough trails and remote landscapes, this kit keeps you connected whether you are overlanding, rock-crawling, or cruising the open road. The GMRS-specific antenna with low-loss, double-shielded cable ensures peak performance and clarity even in harsh environments. The kit allows easy and quick installation, requiring no special tools. The antenna mounting location is engineered for direct bolt-on fitment without drilling. Integrated with Rugged Ready pigtail cable, the kit can be connected with intercoms, headsets, or any 5-pin accessories. It's universally compatible, communicating with all GMRS and FRS radios from brands such as Motorola, Midland, Uniden. Kit includes waterproof G1, durable G4, premium GMRS Tuned Antenna, heavy-duty antenna cable, driver-side antenna mount and mobile radio mount designed specifically for Ford Bronco interiors. It doesn't work with ditch lights or Bronco Sport. This durable radio kit is your reliable communication partner.

TITLE: Ford Bronco Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - GMR25 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: Ford Bronco Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit provides reliable connectivity on every adventure. Three models - GMR25, G4, and G1 - offer exceptional range and clarity. The kit features a rugged, tuned GMRS antenna, designed for various harsh environments, with low-loss, double shielded cable for signal boost. Installation is straightforward, with all necessary hardware included. The antenna mount offers direct bolt-on fitment to factory points without drilling. Built-in connectivity allows integration with intercoms, headsets, or any 5-pin accessories. The kit communicates with all GMRS and FRS radios, compatible with brands like Motorola, Midland, Uniden among others. The kit includes waterproof G1, G4, and GMR25 radio models, GMRS antenna, 13 feet rugged cable with nickel-plated brass NMO mount. Custom antenna mount and mobile radio mount designed specifically for Ford Bronco interiors are also included. The kit is designed for Ford Bronco (2021-present) and is not compatible with ditch lights or Bronco Sport. Get this robust and easy-to-install radio kit for optimal communication across tough trails and remote areas.

TITLE: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Headset for Motorcycle Helmet
DESCRIPTION: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Headset for Motorcycle Helmet allows phone to helmet connection with increased battery life by 32% compared to BT-MOTO. Alpha Audio Speakers and modern Bluetooth technology combine for a superior music listening experience and simple GPS navigation. Features include Bluetooth Audio Priority for turn-by-turn navigation, Voice Activated Commands for music play, messaging and calling while maintaining focus on the ride. In terms of call clarity, this headset has Digital Speech Processing that cancels background noise and enhances rider's voice quality. Key Features include Enhanced Bluetooth with InstaPair, High Fidelity True Stereo Music, Ergonomic Controls, Alpha Audio Speakers, Quick charge Lithium-Ion Battery, and optional 2-Way radio for intercom function. Compatible with iOS and Android, it also supports walkie-talkie compatible handheld radios for bike-to-bike communication over a distance of 1-3 miles. The proprietary design allows radio communication even when the headset runs out of battery.

TITLE: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit with Radio - Without Radio
DESCRIPTION: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit with Radio Adventure comes with advanced Bluetooth connection for effortless music streaming, GPS navigation, and phone calls. This kit pairs with the SUPER SPORT Moto Kit for long-range communication. It uses compact handheld radios for connection, enabling communication with an unlimited number of riders up to 1-3 miles beyond the scope of existing Bluetooth models. Radios work on the same channel, eliminating the need for pairing or mesh network. Even with a drained Bluetooth headset battery, communication continues via handheld radio. The complete BT2-KIT-GMR2 kit includes: the Rugged Connect BT2 Bluetooth Headset, Sport Moto Harness, Handlebar Mount PTT Cable with RCA Connector, and BT2 to Moto Harness Coil Cord. Radio options include GMR2 PLUS, GMRS V3, and R1.

TITLE: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit with Radio - GMR2 PLUS
DESCRIPTION: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit with Radio Adventure features the Rugged Connect BT2 using latest Bluetooth technology for enhancing music streaming, GPS navigation, and phone call conversations. The kit, paired with SUPER SPORT Moto Kit, supports talk for miles simply at a button's push without any pairing, cell service or mesh network. Incorporating powerful, compact, walkie-talkie compatible handheld radios, it can connect unlimited number of riders and reliably communicate 1-3 miles or more while surpassing range of current Bluetooth models. Radios set on the same channel can start talking immediately. This BT2-KIT-GMR2 includes items such as Rugged Connect BT2 Bluetooth Headset, Optional Handheld Radio, Sport Moto Harness, Handlebar Mount and more.

TITLE: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit with Radio - R1
DESCRIPTION: The CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit with Radio Adventure employs cutting-edge Bluetooth technology for quick connection to your phone, allowing for seamless music streaming, GPS navigation, and phone conversations. The kit includes the Rugged Connect BT2 and a SUPER SPORT Moto Kit, letting you communicate for miles with a simple button push. The powerful, compact, walkie-talkie compatible handheld radios reliably allow unlimited number of riders to communicate 1-3 miles or more, surpassing current Bluetooth models. Simply align radios to the same channel to communicate, with no pairing or mesh network required. Even when Bluetooth headset runs out of battery, communication via handheld radio continues. Kit includes: Rugged Connect BT2 Bluetooth Headset, optional handheld radio, Sport Moto Harness, Handlebar Mount, PTT Cable with RCA Connector, and BT2 to Moto Harness Coil Cord. Radio options: GMR2 PLUS: GMRS V3: Analog Business Band VHF/UHF R1: Digital/Analog Business Band VHF/UHF.

TITLE: CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit with Radio - V3
DESCRIPTION: The CONNECT BT2 Bluetooth Moto Kit enjoys the latest Bluetooth technology for easy phone connections, streaming music, GPS navigation, and phone calls. This Rugged Connect BT2 combined with a SUPER SPORT Moto Kit enables mile-long talk with just a button press. A powerful, compact, walkie-talkie-compatible handheld radio, when combined, allows unlimited rider connections and 1-3 mile communication, surpassing current Bluetooth models. Radios on the same channel eliminate pairing or mesh network requirements, even if the Bluetooth headset battery drains, you can still communicate through your handheld radio. BT2-KIT-GMR2 includes: Rugged Connect BT2 Bluetooth Headset, Optional Handheld Radio, Sport Moto Harness, Handlebar Mount, PTT Cable with RCA Connector, and BT2 to Moto Harness Coil Cord with options for GMR2 PLUS, GMRS V3, Analog Business Band VHF/UHF, and R1: Digital/Analog Business Band VHF/UHF.

TITLE: Cap Nut for Behind The Head BTH Headset
DESCRIPTION: Cap Nut for Behind The Head (BTH) Headset is designed for BTH headsets, offering increased usability and functionality. This cap nut enhances the headset performance by providing a secure fit, offering an optimal audio experience. Ideal for individuals seeking an improved headset operation.

TITLE: Replacement Velcro Strap for Behind the Head Style Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Behind the Head BTH Replacement Velcro Strap for H42 style headsets is designed specifically for use with Behind-the-Head headsets to replace missing, torn, or ripped straps. It's conveniently easy to install with self-fastening hook and loop strips. The strap is compatible with H42 Ultimate, H42, and the majority of Behind-The-Head headsets.

TITLE: 3-Pin Female Mini XLR Connector TA3FL
DESCRIPTION: 3-Pin Female Mini XLR Connector TA3FL manifest as a Mini-XLR TA3FL with solder leads. Contains 3 Pin Female and 4 Conductors with a push button lock. It has a .170in cable opening. Cross reference part numbers correlate with Acousticom - TA3FL, Switchcraft - TA3FL, and Rugged - C3PFL.

TITLE: 3-Pin Male Mini XLR Connector TA3ML
DESCRIPTION: 3-Pin Male Mini XLR Connector TA3ML is a Lock type mate Mini-XLR TA3ML connector featuring 4 conductors with a .170in cable opening. The product can be cross-referenced with part numbers from Acousticom and Switchcraft as TA3ML. The connector is designed with solder leads. It's identified as rugged C3PML in its specifications.

TITLE: 3-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TB3M
DESCRIPTION: 3-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TB3M is a 3 pin male Mini-XLR TB3M with solder leads. This connector features 4 conductors, suitable for panel mounts. Cross reference part numbers for the connector include Acousticom - TB3M, Switchcraft - TB3M, and Rugged - C3PM. The product is highly durable, facilitating easy installation and usage. The primary feature of this product is its Mini-XLR TB3M and 3 pin male compatibility making it extremely versatile for different uses. The product guarantees durability and is a top-range product in its category.

TITLE: 5-Pin Female Mini XLR Connector TA5FL
DESCRIPTION: The 5-Pin Female Mini XLR Connector TA5FL definitely impresses with features like 5 conductors, a push button lock, and .170in cable opening. Boasting cross-reference part numbers from brands like Acousticom, Switchcraft, and Rugged such as TA5FL and C5PFL respectively, this connector also features solder leads. Comprising a Mini-XLR TA5FL, this product is designed for perfection.

TITLE: 5-Pin Male Mini XLR Connector TA5ML
DESCRIPTION: 5-Pin Male Mini XLR Connector TA5ML is a mini-XLR TA5ML, featuring 5-pin male with 5 conductors. Unique in design, comes with solder leads and lock type: mate. A .170in Cable Opening adds up as a distinguished feature. The connector cross references with part numbers from Acousticom, Switchcraft, and Rugged denoted as TA5ML, TA5ML, and C5PML respectively.

TITLE: 5-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TB5M
DESCRIPTION: 5-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TB5M is a 5-pin Male Mini-XLR TB5M with 5 conductors designed for panel mounting. The Mini-XLR TB5M comes with solder leads. For cross-reference, the part numbers are as follows: TB5M from Acousticom, TB5M from Switchcraft, and C5PM from Rugged.

TITLE: 6-Pin Female Mini XLR Connector TA6FL
DESCRIPTION: 6-Pin Female Mini XLR Connector TA6FL, a mini XLR with push button lock and .170in cable opening, comes equipped with solder leads. This 6 pin and 6 conductor unit finds relevance in multiple part numbers, including Acousticom - TA5FL, Switchcraft - TA5FL, and Rugged - C5PFL.

TITLE: 6-Pin Male Mini XLR Connector TA6ML
DESCRIPTION: 6-Pin Male Mini XLR Connector TA6ML offers features such as 6 Pin Male, 6 Conductors, and Lock type mate. Compatible with .170in cable opening, this Mini-XLR TA6ML is interchangeable with Acousticom - TA6ML, Switchcraft - TA6ML, and Rugged - C6PML part numbers. The design integrates solder leads.

TITLE: 6-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TB6M
DESCRIPTION: 6-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TB6M comes with 6 Pin Male, 6 Conductors and is perfect for panel mount. Mini-XLR TB6M is similar to part numbers from Acousticom, Switchcraft, and is as rugged as C6PM. It features solder leads for reliable connections.

TITLE: 6-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TY6F
DESCRIPTION: The 6-Pin Panel Mount Mini XLR Connector TY6F features a 6-pin female interface suitable for panel mounting.

TITLE: USB-C Audio Adapter for GoPro Camera
DESCRIPTION: USB-C Audio Adapter for GoPro Camera by Scosche features a charge port for USB-C devices. This product acts as a 3.5 adapter to CS-MUSIC-REC with compatibility for most GoPro cameras. A key component of the adapter is the USB Audio Adapter designed for use with most GoPro cameras.

TITLE: Fire Truck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for 1/4  Style Jacks
DESCRIPTION: Fire Truck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for 1/4in Style Jacks Quick Lock offers easy lock mechanism to Fire / Safety headset, compatible with fire department and safety crew intercom systems. Works with 1/4in jack and 5-pin ports like Rugged Radios, AVCOMM, David Clark, Sigtronics, and other fire intercom systems. Highlighted features include a molded 1/4in gold plated plug, total shield RF blocking, a high bend test coil cord, Quick Lock 5 pin headset plug, and approximately 5' coiled length.

TITLE: Firetruck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for 1/4  Style Jacks & FHS Headset
DESCRIPTION: Firetruck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for 1/4in Style Jacks & FHS Headset is specially made for Rugged Radios FHS headset series, functioning with fire department and safety crew intercom systems. It locks easily into your headset and plugs into 1/4in jack and 5-pin ports like Rugged Radios, AVCOMM, David Clark, Sigtronics, and other fire intercom systems. It includes features such as a molded 1/4in gold plated plug, total shield RF blocking, high bend test coil cord, a Quick Lock 5 pin headset plug, and is approximately 5' coiled.

TITLE: 3-Pin to 3-Pin TA3FL Coil Cord for H80 Dual Talk Headsets
DESCRIPTION: The 3-Pin to 3-Pin TA3FL Coil Cord can serve as a replacement for H80 Double Talk, other brand double talk intercom headset systems, and can be used to convert harness style PTT's for use with offroad intercoms.  Compatible with various brands including Avcomm, Racing Radios, Fan Scan, and Racecom of Virginia. The cable measures 3ft coiled and 6ft when stretched.

TITLE: C-ICM-VAR - CC-5P-EXT
DESCRIPTION: 5-Pin to 5-Pin Extension Cables are designed for connecting your radio jumper to your intercom, your headset to your radio jumper, or any other 5-pin application. Options include straight cord and coil cord configurations. You can link your radio to your intercom when the standard pigtail or cable falls short, and connect your Two Way Rugged Radios Headset to your Mobile Rugged Radio models like GMR25, GMR45, G1, and M1-V. The cable serves as an extension for any compatible 5-Pin accessories. It offers Total Shield RF blocking and high bend test cable with a universal 5 pin headset plug. The 22-inch coil cord extension includes 12 inches of coiled cable while the straight cord extension comes in 2, 5, 10, and 20' lengths, proving compatible with all Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other offroad intercoms.

TITLE: OFFROAD Headset / Helmet Coil Cord Cable for Rugged Radios and Kenwood Radios
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Headset / Helmet Coil Cord Cable for Rugged Radios and Kenwood Radios provides compatibility with R1, GMR2, V3, RH-5R, RDH16, ABH7 or Kenwood 2-Pin radio. Connection to an OFFROAD helmet kit or headset is made through the coil cord. The 2-pin connector plugs into your radio and the OFFROAD connector plugs into your OFFROAD helmet kit or headset preparing you for communication. This suited for all OFFROAD wired helmet kits and headsets. However, only listen-only capabilities are operational on some radio models.

TITLE: Firetruck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for Firecom Style Jacks - 15 Foot
DESCRIPTION: Firetruck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for Firecom Style Jacks Quick Lock encompasses a straightforward locking mechanism to Fire / Safety headsets and is also compatible with popular fire department and safety crew intercom systems like Firecom, AVCOMM, David Clark, Sigtronics. Comes with a 5P Firecom Style plug and has high bend test coil cord. It has RF blocking features for added functionality. They come in 5' or 15' coiled cord options.

TITLE: Firetruck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for Firecom Style Jacks - 5 Foot
DESCRIPTION: Firetruck Intercom Headset Coil Cord for Firecom Style Jacks features the Quick Lock, easy to attach to Fire / Safety headset and compatible with popular fire department and safety crew intercom systems like Firecom, AVCOMM, David Clark, Sigtronics, among others. The cord offers a Molded 5P Firecom Style plug, Total shield RF blocking, High bend test coil cord, and Quick Lock 5 pin headset plug. Depending on needs, you can opt for a 5' or 15' coiled cord.

TITLE: 5-Pin to General Aviation Headset Adapter Cable
DESCRIPTION: 5-Pin to General Aviation Headset Adapter Cable is a robust adapter to directly connect 5-pin headsets to General Aviation, Fixed Wing, or Twin Plug intercoms. Headsets including HS10-CF, HS11-RBLK, HS15-RBLK are compatible. With EM56 Microphone conversion, compatibility expands to H15-BLK, H42-GREEN, H42-LTBLUE, H42-PINK, H42-RED, H22-CF, H41-CF, H42-CF, and H43-BLK-K. A great connective solution for varied Aviation intercoms.

TITLE: Crew Chief Headset Harness for Remote Push to Talk (PTT)
DESCRIPTION: Crew Chief Headset Harness for Remote Push to Talk (PTT) offers a simple way to seamlessly integrate a remote push to talk with any radio adaptor. It's perfect for use with a single Rhino spot. It does not include a headset or PTT. The standout features include a rugged coil cord, a universal radio jack, and a push to talk jack. It also has a molded Y block for efficient use and comes with a 5-pin headset jack, for easy connection.

TITLE: C-ICM-VAR - CC-HSDIRECT
DESCRIPTION: Direct Headset to Intercom Cords delivers the convenience of connecting your 5-pin headset to your intercom. Various cable lengths and types including straight and coil cords are available. It is worth noting that for most UTV front seat applications, the recommended length is 12', while for back seat applications, 16' is the preferred length. The Universal 5-pin headset plug, Total Shield RF blocking, and High bend test cord are among the features these cords have. The compatibility of these cords is quite extensive, including Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other offroad intercoms and can function as an interface/jumper cable for the Midland MXT500 to Rugged Intercoms or Harnesses. They, however, aren't compatible with STX Stereo intercoms.

TITLE: Standard Horizon HX Series Handheld Radio - Headset Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord connects the radio to a 2-way racing headset or intercom. This 2' coiled and 6' uncoiled cord works with various radio models like RuggedV3, RH-5R, RDH16C, and many Kenwood models such as TK208, TK2100 PRO TALK, TK2101 PRO POWER, TK2130 PRO TALK XLS, and many more. The other compatible models include HYTTC620, TC700EX, and others from the RELMRPV516A, RPV599A series. This cord also pairs well with Motorola models like CP100, CP150, CP200, and others including GP2000, GP300, as well as HYTTC500, TC508, and more. Compatible with ICOMCI-F3, F3S models, and all ICOM dual pin amateur radios, SL25, SL55 from Maxon, and all 2 pin radios from Cobra. The cord works with2-Pin Bolt-On coil cord for ICOM radios and Motorola and Vertex Standard HX370 / HX400 series radios, and others like Motorola / Yaesu / Vertex radios with a single pin screw. Also compatible with Motorola Talkabout and HYT (Hytera) TC320.

TITLE: Icom Bolt On Handheld Radio - Headset Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord enables connection between radio and 2-way racing headset or intercom. Two feet coiled and six feet uncoiled, it works with various models including RuggedV3, RH-5R, RDH16C among others. Specific compatible Kenwood models consist of TK208, TK2100 PRO TALK, TK2130 PRO TALK XLS to name a few. RELM, Motorola, Speedcom, Black Box, ICOM, Maxon, Cobra, Vertex, HYT models are included, as well as Motorola Talkabout 200, and 250, Distance DPS. It also functions with Vertex Standard HX370 / HX400 series radios and other particular models of Motorola/Yaesu/Vertex radios with a single pin screw in connector such as the Yaesu VX-7R. Moreover, this coil cord works with 2-Pin Bolt-On coil cord ICOM radios and X-Talker, T71VP3, T77VP5, in addition to HYT (Hytera) TC320.

TITLE: Icom 2-Pin Handheld Radio - Headset Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord provides a connection between radio and 2-way racing headset or intercom. The cables are 2' coiled and 6' uncoiled. It is compatible with several models, including, but not limited to RuggedV3, RH-5R, RDH16C Kenwood, Motorola, ICOM radios, Speedcom, Cobra, and Vertex radios. CC-KEN works with various Kenwood models. CC-MOT is suitable with a series of Motorola radios. CC-ICOM-RT, CC-ICOM-B function with different models of ICOM radios. CC-MID can be used with the X-Talker series. CC-HX is compatible with Motorola and Vertex Standard HX370 / HX400 series radios. CC-VERT-B accommodates Motorola / Vertex Radios:VX130 till VX420 models. Lastly, CC-TALK is applicable with Motorola Talkabout and HYT (Hytera) TC320.

TITLE: Rugged and Kenwood Handheld Radio - Headset Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord is a connective accessory meant for handheld radios and a 2-way racing headset or intercom. The coiled length measures 2', stretching up to 6' when uncoiled. The coil cord works with a variety of radios including but not limited to, Kenwood TK2100 PRO TALK, TK250, TK270G, TK3100 PRO TALK, TK350, TK360G, TK370G, RDH16C, and RuggedV3. It is also compatible with Motorola CP100, GP300, GP88, PR400, P200, GP68; ICOM F3S, F31, F4TR, F10, H2, H6, J12; Black Box & Black Box+, as well as ICOM dual pin amateur radios. The cord functions with radios featuring the bolt-on configuration such as 2-Pin Bolt-On coil cord. It also operates with Speedcom MT/ST series radios and Vertex Standard HX370 / HX400 series radios.

TITLE: Rugged and Kenwood Radio - Spotter Headset Listen Only Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Rugged and Kenwood Radio - Spotter Headset Listen Only Coil Cord allows you to listen to your Rugged Radios V3, R1, RH-5R, RDH16C or Kenwood 2-Pin radio through your headset using the 3.5mm coil cord provided. The 2-pin connector aids in connecting to your radio and the single 3.5mm connector serves to connect your headset for easy listening. The cord can be utilized to record radio traffic onto a digital recorder.

TITLE: Headset Coil Cord for Midland Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord can connect to a 2-way racing headset or intercom. The cables are designed to be 2' coiled and 6' uncoiled. Works with multiple series of Kenwood, Motorola, ICOM, Speedcom, Blackbox, HYT, Cobra, and Vertex radios. For instance, it is compatible with Kenwood TK2101 PRO POWER, TK3101 FREE TALK XL, TK220, TK370G among other models in the series. It also works with Motorola CT450, GP300, GP2000, GP68, PRO3150 and further models. Compatibility with ICOM series covers CI-F3, F30G, F10, IC-H2, U12, U16, and all ICOM dual pin amateur radios. Additionally, all 2 pin radios of Cobra brand and Vertex radios models like VX200, VX500, VX210, VX231 are supported. Other series covered include Speedcom MT/ST and Black Box & Black Box+. Series of compatibility also extend to Motorola Talkabout and HYT (Hytera) TC320.

TITLE: Motorola 2-Pin Handheld Radio  - Headset Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord links a radio to a 2-way racing headset or intercom, with cables extending to 2' coiled and 6' uncoiled. CC-KEN can function with a wide array of models such as RuggedV3, RH-5R, RDH16C, and various Kenwood models, from TK208 to TK3201, TK3202, including HYTTC620, TC700EX, and RELM types. CC-MOT is compatible with Motorola models like CP100, CP150, GP300 to PR400, and XTN446 to XU2600. CC-ICOM-RT works with ICOM types like F3, F3S, F30G to 4008, 4088A, and other dual pin radios. CC-ICOM-B works with 2-Pin Bolt-On coil cord for ICOM radios. CC-MID can function with X-Talker to T10. CC-HX is designed for Motorola and Vertex Standard HX370/HX400 series radios. CC-VERT-B is compatible with Motorola/Vertex Radios models VX130 to VX420. Finally, CC-TALK works with Motorola Talkabout and HYT (Hytera) TC320.

TITLE: C-ICM-VAR - CC-OFF
DESCRIPTION: The RUGGED Headset Adapter Cable to Intercom Cable allows connective functionality for your 5-pin headset to your existing intercom cable. Available in both straight or coil options, it features a Universal 5-pin headset plug, a High bend test cord, and a Total Shield RF blocking. The coil cord's overall length spans 3.5' in its coiled form and 10' when uncoiled while the straight cord measures at 3'. This cable offers compatibility with all Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other OFFROAD intercoms but avoids usage with stereo STX intercoms and the HK-UNI.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Headset or Helmet Kit Extension Cables - Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired Headset or Helmet Kit Extension Cables include coiled or straight cord cable options for extending headset or helmet cable length. Notable features comprise Total Shield RF blocking, RUGGED wired NEXUS plug, High Bend test cord, and 43in coiled length that can extend up to 8' uncoiled. Straight Cord length is 3 feet. These cables are compatible with all Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other OFFROAD intercoms. However, do not use with stereo STX intercoms.

TITLE: Headset to Scanner (Nitro Bee) Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Headset to Scanner (Nitro Bee) Coil Cord works as a connection cable designed for a Nitro Bee and Crew Chief headset & radio set-up. This coil cord utilizes an L-shaped Stereo plug for Nitro Bee jack connection and a straight Mono plug for the headset connection.

TITLE: SUPER SPORT Coil Cord Adaptor Cable to 5-pin Headset
DESCRIPTION: SUPER SPORT Coil Cord Adaptor Cable to 5-pin Headset provides a secure, waterproof connection to Rugged SUPER SPORT cabling, and is suitable for connecting to a headset with a 5-pin port. The snap-lock 3.5mm Dura-Link male connector and the 5-pin female connector can connect to Rugged Radios H22 and H42 Headsets. The SUPER SPORT coil cord is lightweight and expandable from 13in to 32in. Notable features are the Snap-Lock 3.5mm Dura-link Connector (male), 5-pin Universal Connector (female), and an expandable coil cord.

TITLE: Connect BT2 to Moto Harness Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Connect BT2 to Moto Harness Coil Cord enables 2-way radio communication when connected to the MH-SPORT motorcycle harness. With a 3.5mm (MH-SPORT side) to 2.5mm (Rugged Connect BT2 side) coil cord, it can replace parts in the full BT2 moto kits.

TITLE: SENA to Moto Harness Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: SENA to Moto Harness Coil Cord offers 2-way radio communication through a link to our MH-SPORT motorcycle harness. It features a 3.5mm (MH-SPORT side) to 2.5mm (SENA side) coil cord. The product is compatible with SENA headsets with a 2.5mm 4 Conductor AUX port and connects seamlessly with Rugged Radios MH-SPORT harness.

TITLE: Dual Radios to Headset Coil Cord Adapter for Crew Chief and Race Control
DESCRIPTION: Dual Radios to Headset Coil Cord Adapter for Crew Chief and Race Control allows the connection of one's team radio and a race control monitor radio to their crew chief headset. This is done with a 5-pin splitter that supports connection of two handheld radios to a single headset, thereby enabling the monitoring of two different channels simultaneously. The adapter's length is 27in when coiled and approximately 36in when uncoiled.

TITLE: STX STEREO Headset or Helmet Extension Coil Cable
DESCRIPTION: STX STEREO Headset or Helmet Extension Coil Cable Headset or Helmet Extension Coil Cord for the Rugged Radios STX Stereo Intercom is characterized by 30in inches of straight cable and 13in inches of coiled cable, extending fully to 8' feet. It features an STX STEREO Nexus Plug and RF blocking Total Shield. The high-bend test coil cord demonstrates compatibility with Rugged Radios STX STEREO High Fidelity Intercom, Rugged STX STEREO helmet kits and headsets, and other stereo intercoms and helmet kits like PCI Trax.

TITLE: Motorola Single Pin Handheld Radio - Headset Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord connects handheld radios to a 2-way racing headset or intercom with 2' coiled and 6' uncoiled cables. Compatible with RuggedV3, RH-5R, RDH16C, numerous Kenwood models (including TK208, TK2100 PRO TALK, TK2101 PRO POWER, TK2130 PRO TALK XLS), and HYT models (like TC620, TC700EX). Also fits Motorola models (such as CP100, CP150, CP200, CT150), SpeedcomMT/STBlack Box & Black Box+, various ICOM radios (CI-F3, F3S, F30G, F31) and Maxon models (SL25, SL55, SP100). Works with Bolt-On coil cord for ICOM radios, X-Talker, T71VP3, T290VP4, and Motorola and Vertex Standard HX370 / HX400 series radios. Fits Motorola / Vertex Radios:VX130, VX160, VX180 among others. Also, compatible with Motorola Talkabout and HYT (Hytera) TC320.

TITLE: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord - Vertex Bolt On
DESCRIPTION: Select Handheld Radios Coil Cord provides connectivity between the radio and a 2-way racing headset or intercom. These headset cables are 2' coiled and 6' uncoiled. Compatible with various radio models - RuggedV3, RH-5R, RDH16C Kenwood, and others including numerous versions of TK2101, TK3131, TK320, TK350, TK360, TK370, TK372G, TK373, TK430, TK431, TK2160, TK2170, TK2200, TK2202, TK3160, TK3170, TK3173, TK3200, TK3201, TK3202, etc., SpeedcomMT/STBlack Box & Black Box+. Also works with ICOM models like CI-F3, F3S, F30G, F31, F4, F4S, F4TR, F10, F20, IC-H2, H6, J12, M5, U12, U16, 4008, 4088A, and dual pin amateur radios. Its compatible with different types of Motorola, Cobra, Maxon, Ritron, Vertex, Radios and 2-Pin Bolt-On coil cord for ICOM radios. Finally, works with Motorola and Vertex Standard HX370 / HX400 series radios and others with a single pin screw in a connector like the Yaesu VX-7R.

TITLE: Vertex Single Pin Bolt On Handheld Radio - Headset Coil Cord
DESCRIPTION: Vertex Single Pin Bolt On Handheld Radio - Headset Coil Cord is designed to connect Motorola or Vertex single pin bolt on handheld radio to 2-way racing headsets. The 2' coiled length and 6' uncoiled length offers convenience of usage. Compatible radio models include VX130, VX160, VX180, VX210, VX210A, VX230, VX231, VX261, VX350, VX351, VX354, VX400, VX410, and VX420.

TITLE: Headset and Helmet Kit Extension Cable with Volume Control - RUGGED
DESCRIPTION: Headset and Helmet Kit Extension Cable with Volume Control can extend your headset or helmet cables and adjust the volume with an inline knob. Each person in the vehicle can independently modify their volume. Particularly useful for moto riders, this extension allows volume adjustment without accessing tucked away phones or radios. The volume knob attenuates incoming volume but doesn't increase it. To increase volume, adjust the device volume and then fine-tune with the inline knob. Features RF blocking, mono intercom RUGGED wired and stereo intercom STX wired options. This coil cord can stretch from 28in to 6'. Compatible with all Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other intercoms.

TITLE: Headset and Helmet Kit Extension Cable with Volume Control - STX Stereo
DESCRIPTION: Headset and Helmet Kit Extension Cable with Volume Control enables length adjustment of headset or helmet cables and volume tweaking via an inline knob. This cable allows individual volume control, thus optimizing audio experience for each person in the vehicle. Particularly beneficial for moto riders, this feature eliminates the need to fumble for concealed phones or radios. Note that the inline knob reduces the volume but doesn't augment it. To increase volume, users should boost it on their sound system before fine-tuning via the inline knob. Key features include Total Shield RF blocking and various Wired Options, specifically RUGGED for mono intercoms and STX for stereo ones. The robust, high-bend test coil cord measures 28in coiled and 6' uncoiled. This product is compatible with all Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other intercoms.

TITLE: IMSA 4-Conductor 4C Circle Track Road Race Car Harness
DESCRIPTION: The IMSA 4-Conductor 4C Circle Track Road Race Car Harness is a universal IMSA car harness with 6 ft. helmet and push-to-talk leads. This rugged harness comes with Total Shield RF blocking and tough high bend test wire for reliable performance. It also features a rugged black Nexus jack, standard 3 pin push to talk jack, universal 5 pin radio connection, and molded Y block. This harness is suitable for use with certain Rugged Products like Helmet Kit HK-IF or HK-IFC, Push-to-Talk PTT-HM, PTT-VM2 and Radio Jumper CJ-HX370, CJ-ICOM, CJ-MIDLAND, CJ-MOTO, CJ-TALK, CJ-VERT, and CJ-VERTB.

TITLE: NASCAR 3-Conductor 3C Circle Track Road Race Car Harness
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR 3-Conductor 3C Circle Track Road Race Car Harness is a Universal NASCAR car harness with 6 ft. helmet and push to talk leads. It's compatible with 3-Conductor 3C NASCAR wired helmet jack. This Rugged car harness features the Total Shield and has a rugged red molded 3C jack, tough high bend test wire, universal 5-pin radio connection, and standard 3-pin push to talk jack. Also includes a molded Y block and Total Shield RF blocking. Compatible with the Rugged Products: Helmet Kit: HK-NF, HK-NK-PI or HK-NFC, Push-to-Talk: PTT-HM, PTT-VM2, and Radio Jumper: CJ-KEN, CJ-KEN-XL, CJ-HX370, CJ-ICOM, CJ-MIDLAND, CJ-MOTO, CJ-TALK, CJ-VERT, and CJ-VERTB.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Single Seat Short Course Car Harness without Radio Jumper
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired Single Seat Short Course Car Harness without Radio Jumper Universal is a RUGGED communication car harness. This product includes an 8 foot helmet cable and a 3 foot push to talk lead. It's compatible with a 4-Conductor (4C) RUGGED wired helmet jack. The harness has Total Shield cabling and high bend test, providing reliable performance for each race. Additional features include a blue RUGGED wired helmet jack, a tough high bend test wiring that offers durability, a universal 5-pin radio connection and a standard 3-pin push-to-talk jack. It also has a molded Y block and total shield RF blocking that helps reduce interference which enhances performance.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired XL Single Seat Car Harness with Pre-Wired 2-Pin Rugged Handheld Radio Connector
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired XL Single Seat Car Harness comes with a pre-wired 2-Pin Rugged Handheld Radio Connector, eliminating the need for a radio jumper. It is compatible with all Rugged brand radios and 2-Pin Kenwood style radios, and features a blue 4-Conductor RUGGED wired helmet jack for connection. The harness is designed for fast-paced communication, from racing to recreation, providing a reliable connection with just a radio plug-in, PTT lock-in, and helmet plug-in. This extra long harness includes a 9 foot helmet jack cable, 3 foot push to talk cable, and 15in radio lead. Durable and reliable, the RUGGED car harness boasts Total Shield for toughness and high bend test wiring for demanding environments. It also includes standard 3-pin push-to-talk jack, Hard-Wired 2-pin radio connection, Molded Y block and Total Shield RF blocking for reduced interference and enhanced performance.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired SPECIAL LENGTH Single Seat Car Harness without Radio Jumper
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired SPECIAL LENGTH Single Seat Car Harness without Radio Jumper is designed with standard connections and simplifies cabling, especially when the push to talk is mounted close on the dashboard or tubing. The 6 1/2 foot helmet jack cable, short push to talk adapter, and universal radio connection make for easy installation. It also has a blue 4-conductor RUGGED wired helmet jack, tough high bend test wiring for durability, universal 5-pin radio connection, standard 3-pin push-to-talk jack, molded Y block, and Total Shield RF blocking to reduce interference. With lengths of 6 1/2 feet to Helmet, and 9 inches to PTT and radio, it proves to be reliable for HK-OF, HK-OFSP, HK-OFSP3.5, and HK-UNI Helmet Kit, PTT-HM, PTT-VM2 Push-to-Talk, and CJ-KEN, CJ-KEN-XL, CJ-MOT-2, CJ-VERTB,CJ-HX370, CJ-ICOM, CJ-MIDLAND, CJ-TALK, and CJ-VERT Radio Jumper.

TITLE: Charging Cradle Base for RH5R Handheld Radio
DESCRIPTION: Charging Cradle Base for RH5R Handheld Radio is a replacement unit specially designed for RH-5R Handheld Radio. The 110V Wall Adapter is required for re-charging the radio.

TITLE: Charging Cradle Base for GMR2 Handheld Radio
DESCRIPTION: Charging Cradle Base for GMR2 Handheld Radio functions as a replacement charging base specific for GMR2 Handheld Radio. 110v Wall Adapter needed for charging operations of the GMR2 Handheld Radio.

TITLE: Charging Cradle Base for RDH16 Handheld Radio
DESCRIPTION: Charging Cradle Base for RDH16 Handheld Radio is a replacement charging cradle specifically designed for the RDH16 radio. To recharge the RDH16, this cradle necessitates the use of a 110v Wall Adapter.

TITLE: Charging Cradle Base for RDH-X Handheld Radio
DESCRIPTION: Charging Cradle Base for RDH-X Handheld Radio is a replacement charging cradle specifically for the RDH-X Handheld Radio. A 110v Wall Adapter is required to recharge the radio using this cradle base.

TITLE: Replacement Foam for AlphaBud  Challenger Earbud
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Foam for AlphaBud  Challenger Earbud is compatible with Challenger and AlphaBud earbuds. These are sold individually and not in pairs. Due to health laws, this item cannot be returned.

TITLE: Custom Challenger Ear Mold Speakers - MONO
DESCRIPTION: Challenger Custom Earbuds feature high-quality sound output, compact design, and comfortable fit. The earbuds have an in-built microphone for hands-free calls and are compatible with both Android and iOS devices. Equipped with Bluetooth technology, the earbuds allow wireless connectivity. The customizability aspect enables users to choose from a range of colors to match their style. With a battery life of up to 8 hours, these earbuds are perfect for long-term use. They come with a stylish portable case for safe storage and charging. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike.

TITLE: Challenger II Racing Foam Ear Bud Speakers with 1/8  Mono Plug
DESCRIPTION: Challenger II Racing Foam Ear Bud Speakers with 1/8in Mono Plug Professional Series are equipped with Knowles Hearing Aid speakers to provide clear race radio communications. These speakers utilize a hearing aid transducer instead of a standard speaker for unmatched clarity. With a rugged blue cabling and a 1/8in mono plug, these earbuds are made in the USA and have a cable length of 18 inches. Replacement foam earbud is available for sale individually. Note that due to health laws, this item is not returnable.

TITLE: Challenger Semi-Custom Molded Ear Bud Speakers with 1/8  Plug - Mono
DESCRIPTION: Challenger Semi-Custom Molded Ear Bud Speakers with 1/8in Plug are suitable for racing helmets, available in both mono and stereo. Designed after custom molds, they fit a range of ear sizes and offer superb audio quality alongside blocking environmental sounds. The Ear Bud Speakers come with Knowles Hearing Aid Speakers, rugged-duty cabling, a 1/8in mono or stereo audio plug, and 18 inches of cable length. They're made in the USA and, due to health laws, cannot be returned.

TITLE: Challenger Semi-Custom Molded Ear Bud Speakers with 1/8  Plug - Stereo
DESCRIPTION: Challenger Semi-Custom Molded Ear Bud Speakers with 1/8in Plug are suitable for racing helmets. The custom style mold is designed to fit a variety of ears and ensures great audio quality by blocking out environmental noise. These earbuds feature Knowles Hearing Aid Speakers and rugged duty cabling for durability. Additionally, these earbuds offer both mono and stereo audio output with an 1/8in audio plug and a cable length of 18 inches. Notably, this item is non-returnable due to health laws. Manufactured in USA.

TITLE: Small Adult and Kid s Headset Sizing Kit
DESCRIPTION: Small Adult and Kid's Headset Sizing Kit includes an adaptable headset for small adult and children's heads. The kit provides a pleasing fit and feel with a small sized powder-coated stainless-steel headband. It also has small foam ear seals and a replacement mic muff with a rubber o-Ring for comfort and long use.

TITLE: CB Radio jumper with 3.5 Output
DESCRIPTION: CB Radio jumper with 3.5 Output allows you to link your CB radio to your wiring harness, intercom, or cabling setup. Compatible with multiple 4-Pin radios like Cobra Uniden, Galaxy Connex, General Midland, Superstar Ranger, and Many Other. The jumper features a 3.5mm jack but need not be connected to all CB radios. For headsets or intercoms not receiving sound from the CB radio, connect the 3.5mm plug to the radio's external speaker port. The plug can remain disconnected otherwise.

TITLE: Icom Mobile Radio Jumper Cable
DESCRIPTION: Connect to Mobile Radio serves as a linking point between a mobile radio and intercom system, headset, or helmet kit. Compatible with many brands, one can pair any brand radio for complete communication. Jumpers are available for a wide range of radio manufacturers such as Kenwood, Motorola, PCI, and Vertex amongst others. The product can be used with radios including the Icom series, Cobra, Uniden, Galaxy, Connex, Motorola mobile radios with 16-Pin connections, Yaesu mobile radios, TYT, and many more. The product can be used with mobile radios prior to late 2016 and Midland MXT400 (GMRS) along with Motorola APX1500, APX4500, APX7500, APX8500, XTL1500, XTL2500, XTL5000, HMN1090, HMN1090A, HMN1090B, HMN1090C Mobile Radios. TITLE: 2 Ft Antenna Coax Extension Cable
DESCRIPTION: 2 Ft Antenna Coax Extension Cable extends the reach of your antenna with a 2' male to female configuration. Suited for all standard UHF coaxial cables, providing added length to your setup.

TITLE: 2 Ft Antenna Cable Extension for Mini 3/8 NMO Coax Cable
DESCRIPTION: 2 Ft Antenna Cable Extension for Mini 3/8 NMO Coax Cable offers a two foot extension specifically engineered for the Antenna Cable with Removable Mini 3/8 NMO Bulkhead Mount, providing extra length needed for some installations. Key features include zero performance compromises, the use of X1C race spec cable and heavy-duty triple shielding. Standard PL-259 UHF connectors are also provided. However, this cable's design does not permit cutting or stripping and is not compatible with a UHF-CONN-M.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - Race Series - 2 Foot
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - Race Series is purpose-built for racing and integrates heavy-duty triple shielding with X1C low-loss race-spec cabling, providing critical communication in harsh environments. It is compatible with almost all mobile radios such as Rugged Radios, Kenwood, Icom, but not with Motorola Mobile radios needing a mini UHF radio connector. The kit also features Male-to-Male connectors suitable for base camp setups from the radio to a bulkhead fitting.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - Race Series - 4 Foot
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - Race Series is designed for racing, featuring heavy-duty triple shielding and X1C low-loss race-spec cabling. Ideal for harsh environments, the cable kit delivers crucial communications and is compatible with almost all mobile radios such as Rugged Radios, Kenwood, Icom, excluding Motorola Mobile radios that need a mini UHF radio connector. TITLE: HD Flag Pole Antenna Coax Cable for Base Camp and Base Stations - 25 Foot
DESCRIPTION: HD Flag Pole Antenna Coax Cable for Base Camp and Base Stations is a thick, 0.4 inches diameter coaxial cable built for connecting a mobile radio to a distant mounted fiberglass antenna, such as a flag pole or trailer top. Suitable for any indoor or outdoor application where the antenna's distance exceeds what our standard antenna cables can reach. Designed primarily for our fiberglass antenna, but can also be used with our standard NMO style antennas using an adapter. Modification requests like custom length or connectors may incur a labor charge due to the cable's larger diameter and specific tools required. Available in 25' and 35' lengths.

TITLE: HD Flag Pole Antenna Coax Cable for Base Camp and Base Stations - 35 Foot
DESCRIPTION: HD Flag Pole Antenna Coax Cable for Base Camp and Base Stations, the thickest coaxial cable we carry at 0.4 inches in diameter, is designed for connecting a mobile radio to a distant fiberglass antenna, including placement atop a trailer or flag pole. Suitable for both indoor or outdoor applications, this cable ideally connects with our fiberglass antenna, but works with our standard NMO style antennas when using an adapter. Custom lengths or connectors could incur a labor charge due to the larger cable diameter and special tool requirement. Two standard lengths - 25' and 35' - are available.

TITLE: Can-Am Commander and Maverick Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - Dash Mount - 696 PLUS / G1 GMRS
DESCRIPTION: Can-Am Commander and Maverick Complete Communication Kit provides seamless conversation ability and excellent music listening. Suitable for Can-Am Commander 2010-2020 and Maverick 2012-2015, the Rugged 696Plus or STX intercom connects all passengers, allowing easy conversation with voice activation and music dimming when speaking. The system, powered by Bluetooth, permits easy pairing with phones and GPS. For high-quality audio, the intercoms are equipped with high-output amplifiers. The kit offers long-range communication with M1 or G1 2-way radios, equipped with high output amplifiers, finely tuned receivers, and waterproof housings. Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8in NMO Mount, Long Range Antenna, Radio/Intercom Mount, Active Filter, and Cable Ties.

TITLE: Crew Chief - H42 Spotter Headset and Rugged Handheld Radio Package - Single Radio with Nitro Bee X / R1 Business Band Handheld - Digital and Analog / Blue
DESCRIPTION: Crew Chief - H42 Spotter Headset and Rugged Handheld Radio Package is tailor-made for Crew Chiefs and spotters focusing on clear communications for NASCAR and IMSA circle track and road racing crew chiefs and spotters. The product pairs H42 headset with a handheld radio. The digital 16-channel RDH is an excellent choice for ultra-clear communication. Alternatively, there's the popular dual band R1 offering both digital and analog operation. For sound clarity and reliability, RDH16 with digital technology for ultra-clear communication is recommended. Being digital, it still allows analog mode for compatibility with standard analog radios. The R1 offers UHF and VHF operation. You can choose from three kit options: Single Radio, Dual Radio and Single Radio with Nitro Bee X. Features include an easy setup, a headset volume knob, a dynamic noise cancelling mic, UHF and VHF operation, radio accessories, and a button lock. The package includes an RDH16 UHF or R1 Dual Band Digital/Analog Handheld Radio, an H42 Behind the Head Headset, a Radio-to-Headset Coil Cord. The radio works with all VHF/UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies, as well as digital radios using the DMR platform.

TITLE: 100 Ft 3-Pin to 3-Pin Straight Cord for H85 Linkable Headsets

TITLE: 200 Ft 3-Pin to 3-Pin Straight Cord for H85 Linkable Headsets
