TITLE: 5-Pin Male to Male Adapter Cable
DESCRIPTION: 5-Pin Male to Male Adapter Cable is a 6' long straight adapter cord ideal for joining standard 5-pin cables. Notable features include Total Shield RF blocking and high bend test cable. It is compatible with all Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other offroad intercoms.

TITLE: 5-Pin Replacement Cable for HK-UNI Helmet Kit - Offroad
DESCRIPTION: 5-Pin Replacement Cable for HK-UNI Helmet Kit offers connectivity to intercom. This cable is compatible and conveniently connects to an HK-UNI helmet kit. Offering versions in STX or Offroad, it features a robust high bend test cable and a universal 5-pin headset plug.

TITLE: Mobile Radio Speaker Audio Attenuator
DESCRIPTION: Mobile Radio Speaker Audio Attenuator installs inline between the radio and intercom for better control of incoming transmission volume into your intercom system with helmets or headsets. With a built-in 10K resistor, this cable lowers audio volume from your mobile radio.

TITLE: 5-Pin Replacement Cable for HK-UNI Helmet Kit - STX Stereo
DESCRIPTION: 5-Pin Replacement Cable for HK-UNI Helmet Kit offers connection to your intercom, with availability in both STX and Offroad. It features a high bend test cable and a 5-pin headset plug designed for universal use.

TITLE: OFFROAD Headset / Helmet Adapter Cable to Rugged and Kenwood Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Headset / Helmet Adapter Cable offers compatibility with V3, R1, RH-5R, RDH16 or Kenwood 2-Pin radios. Using the 2-pin connector, you can connect your radio to OFFROAD helmet kit or headset. Enjoy radio traffic by plugging the OFFROAD connector (blue plug) into the helmet kit or headset. This straight cord is 7in in length.

TITLE: 6-Pin Intercom Port Extension Cable (Select Length) - 15  Feet
DESCRIPTION: 6-Pin Intercom Port Extension Cable (Select Length) features a Quick Lock 6-pin straight extension, making headset jack box connections to RRP800 intercoms easy. Pre-assembled, strain relieved cables ensure extreme durability. The addition of Quick Lock connectors maximize convenience. Incorporated Total Shield provides effective RF blocking, while high bend test cable highlights the product's flexibility. Also noted for the resistance to UV and chemicals.

TITLE: 6-Pin Intercom Port Extension Cable (Select Length) - 6  Feet
DESCRIPTION: 6-Pin Intercom Port Extension Cable (Select Length) conveniently connects headset jack boxes to RRP800 intercoms through Quick Lock 6-pin straight extension cable. They are pre-assembled and strain relieved, ensuring easy installation and extreme durability with the help of Quick Lock connectors. Notably, these cables are UV and chemical resistant, and they also feature Total Shield RF blocking. Furthermore, they have a high bend test proficiency, thereby indicating their robustness and durability.

TITLE: IMSA Wired 8  Foot Intercom Cable
DESCRIPTION: IMSA Wired 8' Foot Intercom Cable is an 8' straight extension cord designed for connecting IMSA configured helmet kits to intercoms. The key features of this product are Total Shield RF blocking and high-bend test straight cord. It offers IMSA connectivity and is compatible with all Rugged intercoms.

TITLE: Peltor Wired 8  Foot Intercom Cable
DESCRIPTION: Peltor Wired 8' Foot Intercom Cable is an 8' straight extension cord for connecting to Peltor configured helmet kits and headsets including 3M headsets requiring Peltor connections. This extension cord, necessary for use with all Rugged intercoms, has Total Shield RF blocking, ensuring durability with a high-bend test graded straight cord, and standard Peltor connectivity.

TITLE: Noise Reducing Isolator Cable For Cars With Active Suspension
DESCRIPTION: Noise Reducing Isolator Cable For Cars With Active Suspension isolates and removes electrical interference caused with Active Suspension in UTV's. This cable is compatible with RDM-DB, RM60, and all Rugged and non-Rugged brand intercoms. However, M1 Race Series Professional Radio do not require this cable as the function is already built into the M1.

TITLE: Icom IC-SAT100 Satellite Phone to Intercom - Straight Cable
DESCRIPTION: Icom IC-SAT100 Satellite Phone to Intercom - Straight Cable serves as the crucial connector between the Icom satellite phone and Rugged 5-pin intercom, providing seamless integration with your existing communications setup. Our Dual Radio Rocker Switch addition would let you effortlessly alternate between satellite and 2-way radio communications. Essential for maintaining contact in harsh desert environments, the straight cable shows strong compatibility with Icom IC-SAT100 Satellite Phone and 5-pin connection intercoms.

TITLE: iPhone 3.5 mm to Headset 5 Pin Connect Cable
DESCRIPTION: iPhone 3.5 mm to Headset 5 Pin Connect Cable features a locking connector and a gold-plated plug. It is configured for use with 5-pin headsets and includes a 4' foot straight cable. Suitable fitment includes iPhone to Rugged Radio's H15, H22, H26, H41, H42, or H60 headsets.

TITLE: IPhone 3.5mm 4C Plug Connect Cable for Intercom AUX Port
DESCRIPTION: IPhone 3.5mm 4C Plug Connect Cable for Intercom AUX Port can connect your iPhone to your intercom's rear AUX Port for making and receiving calls. This cable also serves as a music cable, allowing music streaming into your intercom. However, the music volume will not be automatically attenuated with intercoms that have VOX. For music volume attenuation with VOX intercoms, use #CS-MUSIC connected to the 3.5mm input port. This cable is exclusive to iPhones, some other cell phones, and select satellite phones.

TITLE: Drivers Listen Only Ear Buds Adaptor Cable to Rugged and Kenwood Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: Drivers Listen Only Ear Buds Adaptor Cable is a 3' straight cord scanner cable with a 3.5mm MONO audio input for listening to radio via ear buds. It is compatible with numerous radios such as the RuggedR1, RDH-X, V3, RH-5R, RDH16C, BaofengHandhelds (with 2-Pin Ports, including UV-5R), GarminRinoHYTTC620, TC700EX, and a range of Kenwood models from TK208 to TK3202. Additionally, it works with RelmRPV516A, RPV599A PLUS, RPU416A, RPU499A PLUS, SAMCOMFPCN30A Handheld, and WouxonHandhelds (with 2-Pin Ports).

TITLE: Replacement Main Cable for RA200 General Aviation Pilot Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Main Cable for RA200 General Aviation Pilot Headsets comprises a bare wire end suitable for experienced individuals installing it. This main cable, compatible with RA200 and various aviation headsets, provides a 3/16in mic plug and a 1/4in speaker plug. The molded Y block is another addition.

TITLE: Replacement Cable for Rugged RA950 Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Cable for Rugged RA950 Headsets is a main cable replacement with a 9V battery compartment designed specifically for Rugged Air RA950 ANR Headset. Unique features include a bare wire end meant for experienced individuals' installation.

TITLE: Replacement Mono/Stereo Cable for RA900 General Aviation Pilot Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Mono/Stereo Cable for RA900 General Aviation Pilot Headsets is the main cable for aviation headsets with mono/stereo switch. This contains a bare wire end, encouraging installation by experienced individuals. It notably includes a 3/16in mic plug and 1/4in speaker plug, with a molded Y block facilitating the mono/stereo switch.

TITLE: 3 Ft 3.5mm to 3.5mm Stereo Music Cable
DESCRIPTION: 3 Ft 3.5mm to 3.5mm Stereo Music Cable allows the connection of your music source to your headset or intercom with a 3.5mm jack. Main features include a 3' cable length and high bend test cabling, ensuring clear audio. Compatible with RRP 357, RRP 360, RRP 660, RRP 686, RRP 696Plus, RRP 242 LeadNav, Lowrance GPS, Magellan GPS, and Tablets.

TITLE: Audio Recording Cable for Rugged Intercoms with 3.5mm Aux Jack
DESCRIPTION: Audio Recording Cable for Rugged Intercoms with 3.5mm Aux Jack facilitates the connection of your Rugged intercom to a sound system or recording of in-car audio. Designed specifically for the 696 PLUS, it is compatible with any intercom or audio device with 3.5mm output, including RRP696 PLUS, RRP-STX, and STX-RS intercoms. It functions with any audio recording device with 3.5mm input, including GoPros. Perfect for capturing intercom, radio, and GPS directions whether you're filming races, recording at pits, or on a UTV excursion. The product line includes the CS-MUSIC-3CON, for intercom and radio; CS-REC-RH, for handheld audio; CS-REC-5PM-3.5, for mobile radio audio; CS-REC-6P-XL and CS-MUSIC-REC, for the 6100 intercom and radio with iPad or GPS audio; and the AUDIO-ISO-KIT, a Rugged Audio Control Hub featuring built-in filter for clear audio.

TITLE: Music Connect Cable for Intercom AUX Port
DESCRIPTION: Music Connect Cable for Intercom AUX Port allows connection of your music source and additional items like LeadNav, Lowrance GPS, Magellan GPS, and Tablets through the intercom AUX port on most Rugged and other brands of intercoms. It utilizes a 3.5mm port and includes a 6-foot cable that plugs into the 6-Pin intercom AUX port providing an easy way to connect and hear more from your intercom.

TITLE: Music Input and Audio Record Connect Cable for Intercom AUX Port
DESCRIPTION: Music Input and Audio Record Connect Cable for Intercom AUX Port allows you to capture intercom audio onto your GoPro Camera. By plugging the 6-pin connector into your intercom's rear AUX port, connecting the black 3.5mm plug into your music source, and plugging the 3.5mm red plug into a GoPro camera using a GoPro Mic Adaptor, you can capture all intercom chatter and excitement. The audio cable is compatible with any camera with a 3.5mm mic input port. Cable dimensions are 1ft to split 6ft for audio record and music. However, this cable doesn't work with RRP510 Intercoms. For filming race action, recording team radio traffic or capturing intercom, radio, and GPS turn by turn directions during a UTV excursion, this is the right audio record cable. It allows you to record audio from your Rugged intercom and connected two-way radio, handheld radio, mobile radio, intercom, connected two-way radio or even turn by turn iPad or GPS navigation audio using a GoPro or digital recorder. Compatible with GoPro cameras and legacy STX intercoms with a 6-pin AUX port, it makes recording crystal clear audio effortless. Also available is a Rugged Audio Control Hub, purpose-built for race teams, which not only records but also controls audio.

TITLE: Nitro Bee Xtreme Car Harness Adapter - 6 Inch
DESCRIPTION: Nitro Bee Xtreme Car Harness Adapter, an accessory cable from Rugged Radios, offers compatibility with Nitro Bee Xtreme. Enabling integration with a single-seat car harness and 2-way radio or 5-pin headset, it allows the driver to transmit and receive on a 2-way radio. In addition, the Nitro Bee Xtreme mutes 2-way radio audio when a Race Control call is received, thereby prioritizing Race Control audio to ensure no critical race communications are missed.

TITLE: Nitro Bee Xtreme Car Harness Adapter - 58 Inch
DESCRIPTION: The Nitro Bee Xtreme Car Harness Adapter enables integration with a single-seat car harness and 2-way radio or 5-pin headset. The driver, using this accessory cable, can transmit and receive. The Nitro Bee Xtreme provides Race Control audio, muting 2-way radio audio upon receiving a Race Control call, prioritizing race communications. This is only compatible with Nitro Bee Xtreme.

TITLE: Headset to Scanner (Nitro Bee Xtreme) Straight Cord - Short
DESCRIPTION: Headset to Scanner (Nitro Bee Xtreme) Straight Cord - Short provides a beneficial 2-pin connection for audio input and output. This cable is suitable for crew chiefs and spotters using the Nitro Bee Xtreme receiver on their headsets, Focussed on Nitro Bee Xtreme race receiver, the cord's short length prevens excess cable interference. Maintain a clean and functional connection with this cable.

TITLE: OFFROAD Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 12  Feet
DESCRIPTION: C-ICM-VAR, an intercom cable suitable for completing communication systems, is accessible in diverse lengths and connection styles to suit majority of headset or helmet kit arrangements.

TITLE: OFFROAD Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 16  Feet
DESCRIPTION: C-ICM-VAR is an intercom cable available in multiple lengths and connection types, suitable for most headset or helmet kit setups. This cable complements your communication system.

TITLE: OFFROAD Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 2  Feet
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Straight Cable to Intercom comes in a variety of lengths and allows direct connection of OFFROAD wired helmet kit or Ultimate headset to your intercom. Founder of Rugged Radios introduced the 5 pin connector, which has now become industry-standard. This straight cord offers a female OFFROAD nexus jack, compatible with many intercom manufacturers including Avcomm, MRC, Racer X, PCI, and more. You can use this cable to replace old headset cables on a sand car, dune buggy, or any car with a 5 pin intercom connection. For easy connection to other 5 pin headsets, opt for a CC-OFF or a CS-3H-OFF cable. Major features include Total Shield RF blocking OFFROAD Nexus plug, high-bend test straight cord, and universal 5 pin intercom plug. Various lengths are intended for different seat positioning.

TITLE: OFFROAD Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 6  Feet
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Straight Cable to Intercom provides direct connection to your intercom with a variety of lengths to choose from. The straight cord has a female OFFROAD nexus jack that plugs into your intercom. Originally introduced by the founder of Rugged Radios, the 5 pin connector has become an industry standard, compatible with intercoms from multiple manufacturers, including Avcomm, MRC, Racer X, PCI, and more. Perfect for replacing old headset cables on vehicles with a 5-pin intercom connection like sand car, dune buggy. Can be connected to other 5 pin headsets such as H22 or H42 via a CC-OFF or a CS-3H-OFF cable. Notable features include Total Shield RF blocking, OFFROAD Nexus plug, high-bend test straight cord, and universal 5 pin intercom plug. Available lengths include 1' for flush mount jacks, 12' for FRONT seat passengers, and 16' for REAR seat passengers.

TITLE: OFFROAD to 5-Pin Adapter (For Headset Direct Cables)
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD to 5-Pin Adapter enables connection of OFFROAD configured intercom cable to Rugged OFFROAD 5-pin components. This simple adapter allows for use of headset or wired helmet in the same vehicle. User-friendly plug-in-and-go design.

TITLE: OFFROAD Driver and Co-Driver Intercom Cable Bundle
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Driver and Co-Driver Intercom Cable Bundle features pre-labeled driver and co-driver intercom cables which connect directly to your intercom and listening device like wired helmet kit or Ultimate headset. The product, crafted thirty years ago, carries a 5 pin connector, an industry standard introduced by Rugged Radios. Compatible with a variety of intercom manufacturers' products; Avcomm, MRC, Racer X, PCI, among others, it's ideal for replacing old headset cables on any car with a 5 pin intercom connection. Choose from CC-OFF or a CS-3H-OFF cable for connections to other 5 pin headsets. The 12' lengths are for FRONT seat passengers and feature Total Shield RF blocking OFFROAD Nexus plug, high-bend test straight cord, Universal 5 pin intercom plug.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Headset or Helmet Kit Extension Cables - Straight Cord
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired Headset or Helmet Kit Extension Cables allows you to extend the length of your headset or helmet cables. It offers coiled or straight cord cable options. It features total shield RF blocking, a high bend test cord, and a wired NEXUS plug for durability. The coil cord total length is 43in coiled and up to 8' uncoiled, while the straight cord length is 3 feet. This product is compatible with all Rugged, PCI Race Radios, Avcomm, RacerX, and other OFFROAD intercoms but not suitable for use with stereo STX intercoms.

TITLE: Female OFFROAD Straight Cable to Male STX STEREO or TRAX Intercom Adapter
DESCRIPTION: Female OFFROAD Straight Cable to Male STX STEREO or TRAX Intercom Adapter connects your mono Rugged Radios headset or helmet kit to STX STEREO or PCI TRAX system. It features a Total Shield RF blocking, OFFROAD Nexus plug (female), STX STEREO / TRAX connection (male), a high-bend test straight cord, and a universal 5 pin intercom plug.

TITLE: Male OFFROAD Straight Cable to Female STX STEREO or TRAX Stereo Intercom Adapter
DESCRIPTION: Male OFFROAD Straight Cable to Female STX STEREO or TRAX Stereo Intercom Adapter facilitates connection between your STX STEREO or PCI TRAX Stereo headset, helmet kit, and our Rugged Radios mono OFFROAD connection. Key features include Total Shield RF blocking, OFFROAD Nexus plug (male), STX STEREO/TRAX connection (female), high-bend test straight cord, and a universal 5 pin intercom plug.

TITLE: OFFROAD 12  RACE SERIES Straight Cable to Intercom Driver and Co-Driver
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD 12' RACE SERIES Straight Cable to Intercom Driver and Co-Driver, purpose-built for racing, is a commendable choice for off-road races. This kit comprises heavy-duty triple shielding and fiber-weave jacketing. They form the critical link from your Rugged helmet kit to intercom. Additionally, these race cables can endure the rigors of racing and upkeep of an off-road vehicle. The kit includes features such as Driver and Co-Driver labeling on 5-Pin jacks and NEXUS jack, and 12' cable length. Expect this Race Kit intercom cabling to function optimally and resiliently even under severe conditions.

TITLE: Push to Talk (PTT) 3 Ft. Adapter for PTT-VM2 / PTT-HM
DESCRIPTION: Push to Talk (PTT) 3 Ft. Adapter for PTT-VM2 / PTT-HM 3' (3-Pin) includes a Push-to-Talk adapter cable. Key features include Total Shield RF blocking, a high bend test coil cord, and 3-pin female connectors at each end.

TITLE: Mobile Radio Audio Record Cable
DESCRIPTION: The product, Mobile Radio Audio Record Cable, is carefully engineered for media professionals and allows for the capture of incoming radio traffic from any Rugged mobile radio onto GoPro or digital recording devices. This functionality allows for recording of radio traffic in various situations, be it race action observation from a vehicle situated on a hill or from the pits. Connection is simple, with one end plugging into the 5-pin radio port of a mobile radio, and a 3.5mm plug into the recording device. For recording with a handheld, a different cable is recommended. This cable can also capture intercom, GPS instructions, and radio with the right cable. Additionally, audio from a Rugged intercom, two-way radio, and the Rugged handheld radio can also be recorded into a GoPro or digital recorder. This cable is also compatible with the 6100 intercom and radio and can record turn-by-turn navigation audio from an iPad or GPS device. Rugged Audio Control Hub not only records intercom, radio and navigation sounds but also cell or satellite phone audio, and has a built-in filter to reduce electrical disturbances and deliver clear audio.

TITLE: GoPro Connect Cable to Intercom AUX port
DESCRIPTION: GoPro Connect Cable to Intercom AUX port is an accessory to record intercom audio on a GoPro Camera. This 7-foot 6-Pin Accessory Port Audio Record Cable connects to the intercom's rear AUX port via the 6-pin connector and the 3.5mm plug into a GoPro 3.5mm Mic Adapter. This arrangement allows recording of intercom chatter on your GoPro, compatible with any camera equipped with a 3.5mm mic input port, but not with RRP510 Intercoms. A Molex Style Music and Audio Record Cable is recommended as an alternative. The product functionality extends to recording race action from a vehicle or team radio traffic from the pits, or on a UTV excursion. The audio record cable also adequately records audio from Rugged intercom and connected two-way radios, handheld radios, and mobile radios. It is specialized for use with 6100 intercom and radio, and is compatible with legacy STX intercoms with 6-pin AUX port. The GoPro Connect Cable also includes features to record turn-by-turn iPad or GPS navigation audio and Rugged Audio Control Hub with built-in filter for reducing electrical whine and delivering clear audio.

TITLE: Audio Recording Cable for Rugged Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: Audio Recording Cable for Rugged Handheld Radios is tailored for capturing incoming radio traffic from a Rugged handheld onto any audio recording mechanism such as a GoPro or a digital recorder. This cable, engineered specifically for media personnel, can be utilized ideally from any location  whether on a hill overseeing a race or at the pits. Consisting of a 2-Pin connector and a 3.5mm plug, the cable can be attached conveniently to the radio and the recording mechanism. This allows enhancement of production quality by inclusion of radio chatter in the story. Several other products to facilitate audio recording include Intercom and RadioRecord cables that capture audio from a Rugged intercom or a two-way radio, Handheld Audio cables to record from Rugged handheld radios, Mobile Radio Audio cables capturing from mobile radios, and specially developed 6100 Intercom and Radio cables that record from intercoms, radios, and navigation instruments such as an iPad or GPS. The Rugged Audio Control Hub accommodates race teams by recording intercom, radio, GPS navigation, cell phone or sat phone audio whilst delivering crystal clear audio by reducing electrical whine.

TITLE: Remote Head Intercom  2 Foot Extension Cable
DESCRIPTION: Remote Head Intercom 2 Foot Extension Cable is designed specifically for 696 PLUS and STX intercoms, allowing for mounting of intercom body out of sight by providing additional length.

TITLE: Adapter for Scanner to 5-pin Car Harness Headset or Intercom
DESCRIPTION: Adapter for Scanner to 5-pin Car Harness, Headset, or Intercom lets you monitor a channel while simultaneously communicating on another. Perfect for monitoring race control while conversing with your race team. It features a 3.5mm Connector for Nitro Bee or scanner use, a 5-pin Male Connector for 2-way radio functionality, and a 5-pin Female Connector compatible with car harness, headset or intercom.

TITLE: Headset to Scanner (Nitro Bee) Straight Cord - Short
DESCRIPTION: Headset to Scanner (Nitro Bee) Straight Cord - Short, known as CS-SCAN-S-2 scanner cord, perfect for crew chiefs with Nitro Bee receiver on their headsets, eliminates excess cable. Specifically designed for Nitro Bee single channel receiver, it ensures a clean, functional connection - utilizes right angle 3.5mm pin for Nitro Bee Receiver plug-in.

TITLE: SUPER SPORT Straight Cable to Intercom - 2 Position (Select Length) - 12  Feet
DESCRIPTION: SUPER SPORT Straight Cable to Intercom - 2 Position (Select Length) connects your SUPER SPORT wired helmet kit or headset straight to your Rugged Offroad Intercom. The lightweight design simplifies installation, featuring press-fit 3.5mm Dura-Link connectors for tight, secure, waterproof headset connections. The cable is sheltered by a fiber weave abrasion-resistant shield, keeping it light yet sturdy. A single cable provides two connections to SUPER SPORT Helmet kits or headsets. Includes Snap-Lock 3.5mm Dura-link Connectors, Premium Fiber-Weave Lightweight Cabling, and Durable Molded Y block, with 12 and 16 ft lengths available. Can be used with any Rugged Radios off-road intercom, except the RRP-STX Stereo intercom. Strictly used with SUPER SPORT helmet kits and headsets that feature 3.5mm Snap-Lock Dura-link connectors.

TITLE: SUPER SPORT Straight Cable to Intercom - 2 Position (Select Length) - 16  Feet
DESCRIPTION: SUPER SPORT Straight Cable to Intercom - 2 Position (Select Length) connects your wired helmet kit or headset directly to your Rugged Offroad Intercom. The SUPER SPORT Intercom Cable is lightweight for easy installation and features a press-fit 3.5mm Dura-Link connectors for tight, secure, waterproof headset connections with a snap-lock design. A fiber weave abrasion resistant shield keeps the cable durable and lightweight. One cable can connect to two SUPER SPORT Helmet Kits or Headsets. Features 3.5mm Dura-link Connectors, Premium Fiber-Weave, Lightweight Cabling, and Durable Molded Y block. 12' and 16' lengths are available for FRONT and REAR seat passengers respectively. Compatible with SUPER SPORT helmet kits and any Rugged Radios off-road intercom except RRP-STX Stereo intercom.

TITLE: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 12  Feet
DESCRIPTION: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom provides high fidelity true stereo sound, with heavy duty triple shielding enhancing the connection to your STX Stereo Intercom and STX Stereo wired helmet kit or headset. The cord is available in multiple lengths, with 12' typically for FRONT seat passengers and 16' for REAR seat passengers. The cable features an STX STEREO Nexus Plug and total Shield RF blocking which improves the sound quality. It is also compatible with Rugged Radios STX STEREO High Fidelity Intercom, Rugged STX STEREO helmet kits, headsets, and similar products from PCI Trax.

TITLE: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 16  Feet
DESCRIPTION: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom comes in a variety of lengths and allows direct connection between your STX STEREO wired helmet kit or headset and the STX Stereo Intercom. For audiophiles, the straight intercom cable features triple shielding and delivers high fidelity true stereo sound. The straight cord plugs into your Stereo Intercom providing a female STX STEREO nexus jack. This product, available in 12' and 16' lengths for front and rear seat passengers respectively, is compatible with Rugged Radios STX STEREO High Fidelity Intercom, Rugged STX STEREO helmet kits, headsets and other similar stereo intercoms like PCI Trax.

TITLE: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 2  Feet
DESCRIPTION: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom delivers high fidelity true stereo sound from your STX Intercom to your STX Stereo helmet kit or headsets. It features heavy duty triple shielding including STX STEREO Nexus Plug and Total Shield RF blocking. The straight cord plugs into your stereo intercom, providing a female STX STEREO nexus jack. Available in various lengths, 12' cords are popular for front seat passengers and 16' cords for rear seat passengers. It pairs well with Rugged Radios STX STEREO High Fidelity Intercom, Rugged STX STEREO helmet kits and headsets, and similar stereo intercoms and headsets, like PCI Trax.

TITLE: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom (Select Length) - 6  Feet
DESCRIPTION: STX STEREO Straight Cable to Intercom comes with heavy duty triple shielding, delivering high fidelity true stereo sound. Suitable to connect your STX STEREO wired helmet kit or headset directly to the STX Stereo Intercom, it features a STX STEREO Nexus Plug, and Total Shield RF blocking. These straight cables are available in a variety of lengths. A 12' length cable typically caters to FRONT seat passengers while a 16' length one is used for REAR seat passengers. It's compatible with Rugged Radios STX STEREO High Fidelity Intercom, Rugged STX STEREO helmet kits and headsets, and like PCI Trax.

TITLE: STX Driver and Co-Driver Intercom Cable Bundle
DESCRIPTION: STX Driver and Co-Driver Intercom Cable Bundle provides color coded driver and co-driver STX intercom cables for easy identification. This bundle connects your STX wired helmet kit or Ultimate headset directly to your intercom. Ideal for use on sand car, dune buggy or any car compatible with the STX Stereo intercom. Features include color coded driver and co-driver 5-Pin plug and NEXUS jack in a 12' length for FRONT seat passenger usage. Comes with a high-bend test straight cord and a Universal 5 pin intercom plug. Offers Total Shield RF blocking for STX Nexus plug, compatible with STX Stereo Intercoms.

TITLE: Packing Cube Bag for Tools Cables Accessories and More
DESCRIPTION: Packing Cube Bag for Tools, Cables, Accessories, and More by Rugged Radios is designed for excellent organization. Ideal for storing cables, tools, snacks, etc., the Cube fits neatly within the Rugged HS2 or HS4 headset bags. Its features include a single compartment, zipper closure, and nylon handle. The bag can store anything conveniently in a dual or four headset bag. With a size of 8in wide, 5.5in tall, and 3in deep, this bag sports an embroidered Rugged Radios Logo, ballistic nylon construction, and carry handle. Note that each bag is sold individually and tools are not included.

TITLE: CUBE 2 Packing Cube Bag for Tools Cables Accessories and More
DESCRIPTION: CUBE 2 Packing Cube Bag for Tools, Cables, Accessories, and More designed by Rugged Radios, is a compact gear cube, perfect for storing tools, cables, accessories, snacks, or trail essentials. Neatly fits in the Rugged HS2 Storage Bag either stacked or side by side. Durable ballistic nylon construction and a sturdy carry handle make CUBE 2 suitable for life on the road, at the track, or in the shop. Front patch strip for easy labeling and zippered closure for security. Size is 4in wide x 10.5in tall x 3in deep. Features Rugged Radios logo, top carry handle, hook-and-loop patch strip on the front for customization, and heavy-duty YKK zipper closure for secure storage. Four of these can fit in the Medium Storage Bag. Sold individually, other items shown not included.

TITLE: CUBE 3 Packing Cube Bag for Tools Cables Accessories and More
DESCRIPTION: CUBE 3 Packing Cube Bag is designed for storing tools, cables, comm accessories, snacks, or trail essentials. This compact gear cube can fit inside the Rugged HS2 Storage Bag alone or stacked. The bag is made with ballistic nylon, a sturdy carry handle, with a front patch strip for easy labeling, and a zippered closure for secure storage. It measures 8in wide  10.5in tall  3in deep, easy to pack and features an embroidered Rugged Radios logo that adds a professional touch. It also has a hook-and-loop patch strip on the front for customization and uses a heavy-duty YKK zipper closure. The bag is sold individually and fits perfectly in the Medium Storage Bag.

TITLE: Simpson Helmet D-Ring Hardware Kit
DESCRIPTION: Simpson Helmet D-Ring Hardware Kit can be installed on helmets utilizing all Simpson Safety Solutions SFI models such as Hybrid Pro, Hybrid Pro Rage, and R3. An additional D-Ring set allows usage with multiple helmets. The kit comprises of 2 D-rings, 2 screws, and 2 backing plates. Compatibility is solely for helmets pre-drilled for HNR (Head and Neck Restraint) devices.

TITLE: Long Range Antenna for Rugged V3 / RH5R Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: Long Range Antenna for Rugged V3 / RH5R Handheld Radios is a 1-piece Dual Band (VHF and UHF) antenna that increases range up to 30%, without necessitating an additional BNC connector. It's a No Ground Plane antenna that just screws onto the existing antenna mount via the SMA male connector. Increases your transmit distance, maximizing range and performance of your handheld radio, and is ideal for outdoor use, off-road racing and longer distances. Easy install, needing just to screw into the existing port. Compatible with both V3 and RH5R handheld radios. This antenna is not for use with the R1 radio. Also available in the V3 Long Range Upgrade bundle.

TITLE: Magnetic Mount Dual Band Antenna for Rugged Handheld Radios R1 RDH-X V3 RDH-16 RH-5R
DESCRIPTION: Magnetic Mount Dual Band Antenna for Rugged Handheld Radios R1, RDH-X, V3, RDH-16, RH-5R increases range and maximizes performance by relocating the outside antenna. Users can place the powerful magnetic base on a large metal surface such as a vehicle roof, securely connect the included BNC connector to the handheld radio, and attach to the antenna cablereadying for long-distance transmissions. Key features include a cable length of 9.5 feet, antenna height of 15.35 inches, and a 1.5in diameter base. The antenna supports dual band VHF / UHF and is fine-tuned for VHF and UHF Business Band Frequencies. The Dual Band antenna is purpose-built for the Rugged Radios R1, RDH-X, V3, RDH-16, and RH-5R handheld radios.

TITLE: Long Range Antenna for R1 / RDH-X / ABH7 Handheld Radio
DESCRIPTION: Long Range Antenna for R1 / RDH-X / ABH7 Handheld Radio extends radio range by up to 30% thanks to a precisely-tuned loading coil, machined aluminum base, high impact housing, and a HyperFlex stainless steel wire rope whip. Perfect for outdoor, off-road racing and longer distances. Compatible with Rugged Radios R1, RDH-X, and ABH7 handheld radios, this antenna boosts transmit distance and overall radio performance. Installation is simple, as it screws onto the existing antenna mount via the SMA connector, eliminating the need for an additional BNC connector. This Dual Band Ducky is 15in in length and offers an increased range with UHF and VHF bands.

TITLE: Deluxe Headset Head Pad Cushion
DESCRIPTION: Deluxe Headset Head Pad Cushion provides weight distribution over a wider area compared to traditional head pads. The length is more extensive, and it uses multiple 'Soft-Flex' foam cells for improved comfort. Known for superior comfort, it attaches easily thanks to a Velcro closure. Compatible with Rugged over the head and behind the head headsets.

TITLE: Nut Plate for Multi Mount Insert for Intercom and Radio
DESCRIPTION: Nut Plate for Multi Mount Insert for Intercom and Radio provides threaded inserts for mounting your radio and intercom to any flat dash, enabling easy access and serviceability. This DMU Nut Plate, which comes with M4x.7 x 10mm button head bolts (4), can be used in a prerunner, buggy, or race car. Application involves cutting an opening for the DMU Multi Mount, then securing the DMU nut plate behind the opening with double stick tape, making it ready for the Multi Mount system.

TITLE: Digital Speech Processor (DSP) *Quantity 2 Required for RRP6100 Intercom*
DESCRIPTION: Digital Speech Processor (DSP) is designed for RRP6100 Intercom, notably requiring two DSP chips due to independent circuitry. This product primarily eliminates background noise, considerably enhancing voice communications. Specifically beneficial in loud environment like in the case of offroad race car, sandcar, or offshore boat, the DSP focuses on filtering your voice for clear communications. Characterized by simple plug-in design, reduced wind noise disturbance, adaptive to changing background noise, low power consumption and easy self-installation. An optional accessory for all Rugged Radios Off-Road Intercoms, though not compatible with Aviation/Industrial intercoms, RRP660PLUS, RRP696, RRP696+, or WM2-FP6 Bluetooth Faceplate. Complex circuitry implies Rugged Radios' installation is advisable.

TITLE: Desktop Power Supply and Cabinet for Rugged Mobile Radios
DESCRIPTION: Desktop Power Supply and Cabinet for M1, RM45, & RM60 Mobile Radios provides a highly regulated output specifically designed for Rugged Radios, thereby offering clean, reliable power from a standard wall socket. The unit is highly filtered to suppress RFI (Radio Frequency Interference) and includes a detachable power supply cord, alongside features such as over-current, short-circuit, and over-voltage protection. Additionally, the included radio cabinet forms a functional desktop base station, ideal for home or RV use where 12V power supply access is limited. To set up, plug the power supply into a wall outlet, mount the antenna, and prepare to broadcast. The product suits best with mobile radios like M1, G1, GMR45, RM45, RM60, and RM50R Dual Band. Note, radio not included.

TITLE: Cloth Ear Covers for Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Cloth Ear Covers for Headsets are made of cool, breathable cotton that absorbs perspiration, providing comfort for your ears throughout the day. Suitable for all kinds of adventure, these washable ear covers keep your headset fresh. They feature an easy fit elastic band for quick installation. They come as a pair and are compatible with all Rugged, DRE, Avcomm, David Clark style aviation, racing, and safety headsets.

TITLE: Gel Ear Cups with Velcro Mounting
DESCRIPTION: Gel Ear Cups with Velcro Mounting offer an improved audio experience for helmet users. These Gel ear cups significantly reduce noise, optimizing communication with pit crew. Comfortable gel earseals are included for enhanced usability. The product requires Impact Cut Out Pads for use with Impact helmets. The Velcro mounting enables easy attachment, though some modification may be required for fitting them onto other types of helmets.

TITLE: Listen-Only Acoustic Ear Piece Tube with 3.5mm plug
DESCRIPTION: Listen-Only Acoustic Ear Piece Tube with 3.5mm plug is designed for long-term performance. Ideal for use on job sites, in construction, by police, security guards, safety and civil occupations. Providing hands-free, lightweight listening for concentration on job rather than equipment.

TITLE: Ear Mold Impression Kit for Custom-Fit Ear Bud Speakers
DESCRIPTION: Ear Mold Impression Kit for Custom-Fit Ear Bud Speakers ensures optimum comfort, improved listening quality, and reliable audio. The kit, ideal for serious racers, minimizes exterior noise and prevents likely falling out, as molds are shaped to your ear. Equipped with impression material, return your completed molds to Rugged Radios to finalize the transaction with an additional $185.00 for Custom Challenger Ear Bud Speakers. The molds and Challenger-II earbuds together provide exceptional racing audio performance. The kit includes a syringe, three sets of 2-part impression material, three pairs of Oto blocks, and impression instructions, but excludes Challenger-II Ear Buds.

TITLE: Rubber Ear Mold Sample Kit - Left Ear
DESCRIPTION: Rubber Ear Mold Sample Kit enables users to determine the optimal ear mold size from home, providing five pieces optimized for acoustics. These are available for the left or right ear. The kit incorporates a 1-1/16in large ear mold, a 1in medium ear mold, and a 15/16in small ear mold each for acoustic ear tube.

TITLE: Rubber Ear Mold Sample Kit - Right Ear
DESCRIPTION: Rubber Ear Mold Sample Kit, a solution for users to determine the ideal ear mold size, allows experimentation at home. The kit is available for both left or right side, containing five pieces. It incorporates Large Ear Mold for Acoustic Ear Tube with dimensions of 1-1/16in, a Medium Ear Mold of 1in, and the smaller 15/16in Ear Mold, all designed for use with an Acoustic Ear Tube.

TITLE: Replacement Foam Ear Seals for Headsets - Large
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Foam Ear Seals for Headsets provide improved comfort and enhance audio clarity by ensuring a proper ear seal. Fresh and comfortable, they replace old, stiff or worn out seals. With a comfortable foam construction, they're cleanable and sold as pairs. Two sizes - small and large, cater to all, ranging from a child or small adults to most adults. They demonstrate compatibility with all Rugged Radios headsets.

TITLE: Replacement Foam Ear Seals for Headsets - Small
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Foam Ear Seals for Headsets are ideal for replacing old, stiff, or worn out ear seals, enhancing comfort and audio performance. Made from comfortable foam, these ear seals come in two sizes: small for children or small adults, and large for most adults. Their design allows for easy cleaning and is compatible with all Rugged Radios headsets. Sold in pairs, they deliver improved headset comfort by providing a proper seal around the ear.

TITLE: Replacement Foam Ear Seals for RW-H52 Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Foam Ear Seals for RW-H52 Headsets are built specifically for RW-H52, offering comfortable leatherette earseals. These can replace old, cracked or worn out ear seals to improve audio performance and comfort. Their plush foam construction and cleanable exterior provide a proper ear seal. These are sold in pairs and are compatible with Rugged Radios RW-H52 headsets.

TITLE: Ultimate Comfort Gel Ear Seals for Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Ultimate Comfort Gel Ear Seals for Headsets are silicone based, offering comfort all day. Unlike other gel seals, these are resilient against squashing over time. With enhanced noise reduction, the seals resist cuts and abrasions due to TPU construction. Ideal for Rugged, DRE, Avcomm, and David Clark style aviation, racing, and safety headsets but not compatible with H28 Alpha Bass Headsets. For that specific type of headset, different ear seals should be ordered.

TITLE: Leather Ear Seals for AlphaBass Headset
DESCRIPTION: Leather Ear Seals for AlphaBass Headset is defined by leather construction that's longer lasting and abrasion resistant. Sold as a pair, these ear seals are fashioned and made for compatibility with Rugged Radios AlphaBass and aviation RA980 headsets. These rugged leather ear seals are described as being superior to both gel and foam options, and they aid in blocking out noise, thereby enhancing Noise Reduction.

TITLE: 90 Degree Elbow For Lapel Mic Ear Piece
DESCRIPTION: 90 Degree Elbow For Lapel Mic Ear Piece is designed for tubing of a lapel mic ear piece, with a 90-degree elbow feature.

TITLE: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes - Left Ear / Light Color
DESCRIPTION: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes are soft, flexible molds available for left or right sides and in three sizes. They are essential for maintaining audio performance and hygiene, and should be replaced monthly to avoid pathogens, bacteria, micro-organisms, and potential staph infections. Sharing ear pieces is not advised. Medium is commonly chosen size, but for uncertainty, a Sample Ear Mold Kit with all sizes and an acoustic tube is available.

TITLE: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes - Left Ear / Dark Color
DESCRIPTION: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes, soft and flexible, come in left or right sides and three different sizes. Critical for audio performance and hygiene, replacement of Ear Mold and acoustic tube is necessary. Changing ear molds monthly can help avoid pathogens, bacteria, micro-organisms, and various forms of staph infections. Sharing of ear piece is not recommended. Medium size is most popular, but for size uncertainty, consider a Sample Ear Mold Kit that includes all three sizes and an acoustic tube.

TITLE: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes - Right Ear / Light Color
DESCRIPTION: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes are soft, flexible ear molds available in left, right sides and three sizes. They are crucial for maintaining audio performance and hygiene. By changing your ear mold monthly, you can avoid pathogens, bacteria, micro-organisms, and various forms of staph infections. It is recommended not to share your ear piece. Medium is the most popular size, but a Sample Ear Mold Kit with all three sizes and an acoustic tube is suggested if unsure.

TITLE: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes - Right Ear / Dark Color
DESCRIPTION: Rubber Ear Mold Buds for Acoustic Tubes are soft, flexible ear molds available in both left and right sides across three sizes. Regular replacement of these ear molds and acoustic tube is key for maintaining optimal audio performance and hygiene. To avoid risk of infection caused by pathogens, bacteria, micro-organisms and various forms of staph, changing ear molds once a month is recommended and sharing of ear pieces should be refrained. Medium is the most popular size, but a Sample Ear Mold Kit including all sizes and an acoustic tube can be considered for uncertainty.

TITLE: ENDURO Moto Kit -  Includes Helmet Kit and Compact Harness Cable - without Radio
DESCRIPTION: ENDURO Moto Kit consists of a Helmet Kit and Compact Harness Cable. Clear in-helmet communications can be achieved using a short, lightweight cable for connection either with any Rugged or Kenwood 2-pin radio to a helmet kit directly. The innovative radio shoulder strap-mounting design (strap not part of the kit) eliminates movement limitations for the rider dismounting and mounting the bike. The Kit features include a direct cable-straight from Radio to helmet kit, with an optional Handheld Radio. Owning a Business License is a requirement for use.

TITLE: ENDURO Moto Kit -  Includes Helmet Kit and Compact Harness Cable - GMR2 PLUS
DESCRIPTION: ENDURO Moto Kit includes a Helmet Kit and a Compact Harness Cable for clear, in-helmet communication. A short, lightweight cable connects any Rugged or Kenwood 2-pin radio directly to a helmet kit. You can mount the radio on your shoulder strap for unrestricted movement on and off the bike but the strap is sold separately. Replacement parts are available. The kit comprises Helmet Kit Radio and an optional handheld radio. Business License is needed for purchase.

TITLE: ENDURO Moto Kit -  Includes Helmet Kit and Compact Harness Cable - R1
DESCRIPTION: The ENDURO Moto Kit features a Helment Kit and Compact Harness Cable which enables clear, in-helmet communications. With a lightweight cable, it can be connected directly to Rugged or Kenwood 2-pin radio for helmet use. It provides easy rider mobility, as the radio can be mounted on a shoulder strap and removed effortlessly (strap sold separately). This Kit also includes a Radio to helmet kit direct cable-straight, and an optional Handheld Radio. However, note that a Business License is required for use.

TITLE: Mini External Speaker for Mobile Radios
DESCRIPTION: Mini External Speaker for Mobile Radios is a portable audio accessory with excellent audio amplifying skills. Despite its small size that fits perfectly in a pocket, it can plug into any 3.5mm speaker outlet, making it ideal for high noise environments. The package includes an external speaker with a wired male 3.5mm plug and mounting brackets. The speaker specifications are 5 watts/8 ohm with dimensions of 5in x 3in x 2in and a cable length of 76in. To ensure radio traffic is heard in your headset or helmet kit while using this speaker with your radio, pair it with CJ-SPK-DC and SPLITTER-MONO-3.5 which will disable the radio speaker and pass the signal to the external speaker and your intercom. This setup is not compatible with Rugged Radios RDM-DB.

TITLE: XTREME Waterproof Speaker with 15 Watt Amplifier with Volume and Power Control
DESCRIPTION: XTREME Waterproof Speaker comes with a 15 Watt Amplifier and Volume and Power Control. This external waterproof speaker enables audio communication in noisy outdoors. With its 15-watt amplifier, clarity is ensured. Suitable for UTV's, chase trucks, base stations and all scenarios where outdoor audio communication is required. Comes with a male 3.5mm mono plug, 15' power lead for direct battery connection, and mountable with speaker hardware or bar mounts. Dimensions are 5in x 4in x 1in and Cable Length is 80in. The M1 and RDM-DB radios can use this speaker without additional adapters or cables. Use of CJ-SPK-DC and SPLITTER-MONO-3.5 is required with some old intercom and radio systems to ensure radio traffic in the headset or helmet kit.

Please avoid over-tightening the antenna to NMO connector.

Features include Frequency range of 27Mhz-3000Mhz, CTCSS/DCS Decoder, LCD Dim level setting, Frequency digital 0000.000 or 0000.0000, 0.2s Response time, Color Display, Auto power off, battery charging LED indicator, and an added function is Frequency Counter for DIGITAL Radio.
