TITLE: Desert Squadron - First Aid Kit
DESCRIPTION: Desert Squadron - First Aid Kit is vital for Race Cars, Chase Trucks, UTVS, and daily drivers. Its components include a quick-release buckle tourniquet, pairs of nitrile gloves, 4in and 2in compress bandages, a 3in elastic bandage, a triangle bandage, a 4 5yd gauze roll, burn cream, triple antibiotic ointment, hydrocortisone, antiseptic wipes, alcohol prep pads, medium butterfly closure bandages, 1in x 3in and 3/4 x 3in bandages, knuckle bandages, and 2in X 4in adhesive bandages. Desert Squadron First Aid Kits order presumes you have the required training and authorization to use contained medical supplies, with no liability for misuse assumed by Rugged Radios and Desert Squadron Inc.

TITLE: Flex Boom for M310 and M360 Electret Mics
DESCRIPTION: Flex Boom is a replacement headset designed for use with M310 and M360 Electret Mics.

TITLE: Flex Boom for H42/H22 Ultimate Headset and H43 Headset
DESCRIPTION: Flex Boom for H42/H22 Ultimate Headset and H43 Headset Replacement is geared for use with M101 Mics, coming complete with the required hardware. Its compatibility extends to H42-ULT, H22-ULT and H43-BLK-K headset models.

TITLE: Replacement Outer Foam for Headset Ear Domes
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Outer Foam for Headset Ear Domes only sells in single quantity. It operates with Rugged Radios and both over-the-head and behind-the-head headsets. It is sold as a single unit and not in pairs.

TITLE: Replacement Middle Foam for Headset Ear Domes
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Middle Foam for Headset Ear Domes provides single items, not in pairs, catering to individual headset eardomes.

TITLE: Replacement Inner Foam for Headset Ear Domes
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Inner Foam for Headset Ear Domes Inner Foam for Headset Eardome, sold individually, not in pairs.

TITLE: Replacement Speaker Foam for Helmet Kits - 32mm
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Speaker Foam for Helmet Kits - 32mm is a replacement speaker foam set ideal for Rugged Radios helmet kit. This set is perfect for those looking to switch helmet kits to a new helmet, or if the existing speaker foam is failing.

TITLE: Low Profile Bezel for Rugged Intercoms
DESCRIPTION: Low Profile Bezel for Rugged Intercoms is designed to reduce bezel thickness, accommodating fitment of the Radio Cover. The bezel installation occurs easily utilizing existing bolts in your Rugged intercom.

TITLE: Billet Panel Mount Bezel for Rugged Intercoms
DESCRIPTION: Billet Panel Mount Bezel for Rugged Intercoms offers swift, easy dash mount. Distinguished by an anodized black billet Rugged Radios face plate and including mounting hardware. Compatible with RRP362 Intercom, RRP660 Intercom, RRP660 Plus Intercom, RRP696 Intercom, RRP5050 Intercom, RRP6100 Intercom and SS-WM1 Intercom. Not included.

TITLE: Rugged G1 ADVENTURE SERIES Waterproof GMRS Mobile Radio
DESCRIPTION: The Rugged G1 ADVENTURE SERIES Waterproof GMRS Mobile Radio is engineered for racing and adventure, featuring an IP67 waterproof design and an all-aluminum chassis, providing Radio Frequency Interference (RFI) protection for superior performance. Key features include a large, easy-to-read display, programmable controls, and an intuitive interface. The package comes with an Accessory Hub, providing remote access to programming cable connection and a 3.5 mm external speaker output. The Rugged G1 has a Rugged Ready port for expansion with various accessories, from intercoms to headsets. The radio employs a Mitsubishi Transmit amplifier and a clear-hear Superheterodyne receiver, offering a stable transmission power of 41.4 Watts. Additional features include Dual Active Voice Enhancement technology for improved audio clarity and Bluetooth connectivity. The Rugged G1's dimensions are 5.5inW x 7inD x 1.5inH. The package includes the radio, hand mic, power harness, U-Bracket, and other mounting hardware. Compatibility extends to all GMRS radios and some FRS radios. Users must acquire a GMRS license.

TITLE: Rugged Rambler G4 GMRS Mobile Radio
DESCRIPTION: Rugged Rambler G4 GMRS Mobile Radio is designed for reliable performance in enclosed cab vehicles and can go the distance with over 46 watts of power. For even more protection, the G1 model offers full waterproof protection with an IP67 rating. This product features a large, clear, easy-to-read display and quick access to programmable controls with an intuitive user interface. The device is powered by a Mitsubishi transmit amplifier, ensuring stable, consistent power. The RIDEui design allows for simple navigation, setting customization, and access to advanced features. The product is compatible with RAM mounts through the integrated AMPS mounting system, and brings together power, innovation, and versatile AMPS mounting options, offering an optimal trail radio solution. Key features of this product include: powerful 46.8 watts, AMPLIFY 2.0 Stable Power, Mitsubishi Transmit amplifier, RIDEui intuitive menu system with LED display, AMPS mounting pattern (RAM compatible), 15 GMRS channels (1-7 & 15-22), 8 repeater channels, 259 privacy codes, adjustable High / Medium / Low power settings, Narrow / Wide bands, and adjustable brightness. It is compatible with all GMRS radios and can connect easily to intercoms, headsets, or any 5-pin accessory.

TITLE: Strain Relief Grommet for Headset Intercom & PTT Cables
DESCRIPTION: Strain Relief Grommet for Headset, Intercom & PTT Cables is a small grommet designed for cables. Its compact dimensions include a 1/4in length, 4/8in width, and a hole diameter of 1/8in.

TITLE: General Aviation Headset to 5-Pin Adapter
DESCRIPTION: General Aviation Headset to 5-Pin Adapter, designed to convert standard aviation plug connections to a 5-Pin connector, makes your headset compatible with mobile radios and intercom systems. Some applications may require adaptation like changing the mic. Rugged offers several options for mic adapting. User queries and assistance calls are welcomed.

TITLE: General Aviation Pilot Headset Extension Cable
DESCRIPTION: General Aviation Pilot Headset Extension Cable features a 6' length for extending your aviation communication cabling. Characterized by gold plated plugs and rugged air extension, it also demonstrates an impressive high bend test cabling for clear communications.

TITLE: General Aviation Pilot Headset Extension Splitter Cable
DESCRIPTION: General Aviation Pilot Headset Extension Splitter Cable, purpose built for aviation, facilitates connection of two headsets into one communication port thus enables easy and convenient expansion for multiple persons. Its key features include a 6' cable length and tough high bend test cabling to ensure clear communications.

TITLE: General Aviation to Helicopter Pilot Headset Adapter
DESCRIPTION: General Aviation to Helicopter Pilot Headset Adapter from Rugged, easily adapts your General Aviation headset to a helicopter, saving money by avoiding the need for a completely new headset. Features include a 3/16in mic jack and 1/4in speaker jack to Nexus 4 conductor U174. However, this adapter is specifically for use with general aviation headsets, and not compatible with Military impedance headsets.

TITLE: XL Ballistic Nylon Gear Bag
DESCRIPTION: XL Ballistic Nylon Gear Bag offers storage with a large interior compartment and an exterior map pocket. It serves as an all-purpose bag for all gear and accessories, race, and recreation equipment. The Rugged Duffel bag has a Rugged Radios screened logo. Dimensions are 18in high, 25in wide, 12in deep with features like a front zippered map pocket, top adjustable strap with buckle, end and top carry handle, and graphics on both sides. Helmet is not included.

TITLE: Gel Ear Seal Comfort Kit for Aviation Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Gel Ear Seal Comfort Kit for Aviation Headsets offers all day comfort with silicone gel ear seals. Unlike others that flatten over time, these seals maintain their form and successfully minimize noise, enhancing Noise Reduction. The kit is ideal for enhancing flight comfort or renewing a worn headset. Constituents include polyurethane construction thwarting cuts, abrasions with cool cotton cloth ear covers that reduce excess heat and a foam mic muff that further minimizes cabin noise. The mic muff fits M101, M102, E350, M350 mics, the kit comes with a pair of gel ear seals, cotton ear covers, and a Forma mic muff. It's compatible with most aviation headsets including Rugged Air, DRE, Avcomm, and David Clark.

TITLE: Gel Ear Seals Comfort Kit with Cloth Ear Covers & Mic Muff
DESCRIPTION: Gel Ear Seals Comfort Kit consists of (1 pair) Gel Ear Seals, (1) High Wind Mic Muff, and (1 pair) Cloth Ear Covers. The Rugged silicone gel ear seals conform well and block out noise, increasing Noise Reduction. The High Wind Mic Muff has a larger foam mass for improved audio clarity in high-wind noise environments. Cool cotton cloth ear covers reduce heat by absorbing perspiration, suitable for aviation and offroad headsets. The easy fit ear covers are equipped with an elastic band for quick installation. The kit enhances headset comfort and performance. Compatible with most Rugged Radio headsets, but not with H28 or H48 Alpha Bass Headsets.

TITLE: Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - 696 PLUS / G1 GMRS
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio offers an ultimate riding experience! With the Rugged 696PLUS or STX intercom, you can easily talk to passengers, listen to music, and keep in touch with other cars in your group. The intercom connects every passenger in the vehicle, facilitating seamless voice activation (VOX) dialogue and enjoyable music listening. With adjustable VOX control, music dims when you speak, ensuring all passengers can converse freely. Bluetooth powered intercom lets you pair your phone with ease. All Rugged intercoms come with a high-output amplifier for high fidelity audio. Enhanced music controls include volume and shuffle control directly from the intercom's faceplate. High output 2-way radios provide long-range communication. The M1 or G1 offer clear and reliable communication with other vehicles in your group; they feature high output amplifiers, finely tuned receivers, and IP67 waterproof housings, promising durability and reliability. The complete Polaris General communication kit includes: RRP696 PLUS or STX Stereo Intercom, two Helmet Kits, two Intercom Cables, Driver PTT, Passenger PTT, Powerful M1 Business Band or G1 GMRS Mobile Radio, 15' Ft. Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8in NMO Mount, Long Range Antenna, Radio/Intercom Mount, Active Filter, and two Packs of R-Wrap Reusable Cable Ties.

TITLE: Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - 696 PLUS / M1 VHF Business Band
DESCRIPTION: The product, Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio, fits Polaris General and is a complete communication system providing the ultimate riding experience. The Rugged 696PLUS or STX intercom in the kit allows all passengers in the vehicle easy conversation and high-quality music listening through its voice activation (VOX) feature. Bluetooth connectivity allows for easy pairing with your phone, GPS, or any other Bluetooth device. High-output amplifier in all Rugged intercoms assures high-fidelity audio. Enhanced music controls on the intercom faceplate allow volume and shuffle control. The kit also includes a choice between high output 2-way radios - M1 or G1, designed for long-range communication. These radios allow clear and reliable communication with other vehicles in your group and have a Push to talk feature. Both are built with high output amplifiers, finely tuned receivers, and IP67 waterproof housings, making it ready for any condition. The complete kit is easy to install and use, and comes with intercom cables, powerful M1 Business Band or G1 GMRS Mobile Radio, Antenna Coax Cable with mount, Long Range Antenna, Radio/Intercom Mount, Active Filter, and packs of R-Wrap Reusable Cable Ties.

TITLE: Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - STX Stereo / G1 GMRS
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio is suitable for Polaris General vehicles. It offers in-car conversation clarity, Bluetooth connectivity, long-range vehicle-to-vehicle radio communication, and features a Rugged Radios mount designed specifically for the Polaris. System provides communication in high-noise, off-road environments. Two radio options are available with the kit: M1 VHF Business Band or G1 GMRS, both are IP67 waterproof and built for off-road conditions. Intercom choices include the 696PLUS or STX for stereo music. Intercom styles are available in standard body or a tucked-away remote head version. Mounting options offer a custom, vehicle-specific fit looking built-in. Features include clear intercom audio, pairing to phones, GPS and other devices, VOX music-dimming, straightforward audio controls, long-range 2-way radio communication, and IP67 waterproof radio housing. Optional helmet wiring kits, headsets, and helmets are sold separately. The kit includes a communication kit, an intercom, waterproof mobile radio, intercom cables, driver/passenger PTT, antenna coax cable, antenna, active filter, cable ties, radio/intercom mount. Radio license is required.

TITLE: Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - STX Stereo / M1 VHF Business Band
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio is a complete communication system suitable for the Polaris General - perfect for easily talking to passengers, listening to music or staying in contact with other vehicles in a group. It employs the 696PLUS or STX intercom that connects all passengers in the vehicle, featuring voice activation (VOX) for conversation and music listening, with adjustable VOX control. The music automatically dims when you speak for clear conversation. The system is Bluetooth powered, and easily connects to GPS or any Bluetooth device. The kit is characterized by an enhanced music control, volume, and shuffle control from the intercom faceplate. It also includes a high output amplifier for impeccable music enjoyment and high-output 2-way radios (M1 or G1) for long-range communication. Weatherproof housings make this kit reliable in various conditions. It's easy to install and offers a comprehensive solution for vehicle conversation. The kit includes RRP696 PLUS or STX Stereo Intercom, two Helmet Kits, intercom cables, a Driver PTT, a Passenger PTT, a powerful M1 Business Band or G1 GMRS Mobile Radio, a 15' Ft. Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8in NMO Mount, a long range Antenna (either POINT5 or VHF 1/2 Wave), a Radio/Intercom Mount, an Active Filter, and two packs of R-Wrap Reusable Cable Ties.

TITLE: Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radio with Hand Mic
DESCRIPTION: BUNDLE - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS / FRS Two Way Handheld Radio with Hand Mic offers 22 GMRS channels, connecting to all other GMRS radios and enhancing communication. The GMR2 radio performs optimally with a tuned antenna and optimized transmitter, ensuring long-range communications and extended battery life. The kit includes a waterproof Rugged Radios Speaker Hand Mic for clear communications. Features include standard GMRS channels, a rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery, weather channels, an FM Radio, listen-only operation for VHF 136-174 mHz and UHF 400-480 mHz, a squelch suppression button, a flashlight, an A/B Switch for channel toggling, a 2-pin accessory port, and a backlit display. The kit provides a GMR2-PLUS radio, a waterproof hand mic, a belt clip, a charging cradle, and an AC adapter/charger, and is compatible with all GMRS radios, FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22. It is FCC and CE certified.

TITLE: Long Range Bundle for GMR2 Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: Long Range Bundle for GMR2 Handheld Radios includes a long-range antenna and a high capacity 3600mAh battery, extending the radio's range by 30% and doubling the battery life. The XL battery also features a built-in charging port for on-the-go charging with a USB charging cable. A perfect complement to your radio, suitable as a spare, backup, or in situations where extended battery life is critical. The bundle is compatible with the Rugged Radios GMR2 PLUS handheld radio but does not include the radio itself.

TITLE: Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radio - Grey
DESCRIPTION: Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS / FRS Two Way Handheld Radio connects universally to all GMRS radios and other walkie-talkies, both GMRS and FRS. The tuned antenna with optimized transmitter ensures long range performance and clear communications whilst preserving battery life due to a lower power transmission ability. The handheld radio offers standard GMRS channels, a rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery with USB charge port, weather channels, simplicity of FM Radio, VHF 136-174 mHz and UHF 400-480 mHz listen-only operation, squelch suppression button, flashlight, A/B Switch for channel toggling, a 2-Pin accessory port and a backlit easy-view display. Also included are a belt clip, charging cradle, AC adapter/charger, and an upgradable antenna. The radio is compatible with all GMRS radios such as Rugged G1, GMR45, GMR25, GMR2, Motorola, Midland, Uniden, and FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22. FCC and CE certifications received and GMRS License required.

TITLE: 2 Pack - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radios - Grey
DESCRIPTION: 2 PACK - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS / FRS Two Way Handheld Radios are perfect for maintaining communications with friends and family. The package comprises two of these GMR2 radios, which are compatible with all other GMRS radios, enabling you access to 22 universal connections with both GMRS and FRS walkie-talkies. The set is renowned for its built-in optimized transmitter and tuned antenna, facilitating long-range performance even at lower power, thus promoting crystal clear communications while preserving the battery's longevity. Other features of the GMR2 include standard GMRS channels, a rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery with USB charge port, weather channels, FM Radio, a listening-only operation for VHF 136-174 mHz and UHF 400-480 mHz, squelch suppression button, flashlight, an A/B Switch for channel toggling, along with a backlit easy-view display. Accessories include a belt clip, charging cradle, an AC adapter/charger, and removable antenna. The product is FCC and CE certified. It is also compatible with all GMRS radios including Rugged G1, GMR45, GMR25, GMR2, and FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22.

TITLE: 2 Pack - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radios - Safety Yellow
DESCRIPTION: The 2 PACK - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS / FRS Two Way Handheld Radios allow seamless communication with friends and family on the move through 22 universal channels, compatible with other GMRS and FRS radios. Equipped with an optimized transmitter and a tuned antenna, these radios deliver clear long-range communications and an extended battery life. Additional features include standard GMRS channels, a rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery, weather channels, FM Radio, squelch suppression button, flashlight, display with a backlight, removable and replaceable antenna and a 2-pin accessory port. The radios are compatible with optional USB charge cable and all GMRS radios including Rugged G1, GMR45, GMR25, GMR2, and FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22. These radios are FCC and CE certified.

TITLE: 2 Pack - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radios - Safety Orange
DESCRIPTION: 2 PACK - Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS/FRS Two-Way Handheld Radios are handheld radios that connect to all other GMRS radios, enabling universal communication. These radios have 22 channels and a tuned antenna for long-range performance. The GMR2 PLUS can transmit at a lower power, meaning clear, long-range communications with extended battery life. Features of the GMR2 PLUS include standard GMRS channels, rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery with USB charge port, weather channels, FM Radio, a squelch suppression button, a flashlight, A/B switch, an easy-view display, and a removable, replaceable, upgradable antenna. Compatible with all GMRS radios, including models from Motorola, Midland, Uniden, among others, and FRS radios on specified channels. The radios are FCC and CE certified.

TITLE: Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radio - Safety Yellow
DESCRIPTION: Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS/FRS Two Way Handheld Radio connects universally to all other GMRS radios ensuring, clear, long-range communications. Built with 22 channels, rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery and USB charge port, these radios come with a weather channel and FM Radio. Features such as listen-only operation for VHF 136-174 mHz and UHF 400-480 mHz, flashlight, backlit easy-view display and removable, replaceable, upgradable antenna deliver versatility and clear communications. The radio is compatible with GMRS radios from various manufacturers and FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22. A squelch suppression button and A/B switch for toggling between channels are included in features. A belt clip, charging cradle, and AC adapter/charger are part of the package.

TITLE: Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS and FRS Two Way Handheld Radio - Safety Orange
DESCRIPTION: Rugged GMR2 PLUS - GMRS/FRS Two Way Handheld Radio keeps you connected on the go and can talk to all other GMRS radios. It features an optimized transmitter and tuned antenna for long range transmission and extended battery life, 22 channels, including standard GMRS, weather channels and FM radio. It also allows for a listen-only operation on both VHF 136-174 mHz and UHF 400-480 mHz. Additional features include a squelch suppression button, a flashlight, an A/B Switch to toggle between channels, a backlit easy-view display, and an upgradable antenna. It comes with a rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery with a USB charge port and compatible with both GMRS and FRS radios.

TITLE: Rugged GMR25 Waterproof GMRS Mobile Radio
DESCRIPTION: Rugged GMR25 Waterproof GMRS Mobile Radio is a 25-watt radio ideal for use in Jeeps, UTVs, and open-cab vehicles, built to withstand the elements. With a range of 10-12 miles, it connects instantly with all other GMRS radios. The Rugged Ready Port enables connection to an intercom, headset, or a multi-radio box. Addition of other Rugged accessories is made simple with the 5 pin pigtail cable. A list of its features includes IP67 water resistance, Dual Watch Mode to monitor two channels simultaneously, adjustable Squelch, a Lock Function to prevent accidental button changes, and easy-view Backlight. It comes with a GMR25 radio, Hand Mic with Scosche Magentic MagicMount, universal U-Bracket radio mount, power cable with fuse holder, and a hardware pack. The radio is compatible with all GMRS radios and certain FRS radios.

TITLE: Base Camp - Base Station GMRS Tuned Fiberglass Antenna
DESCRIPTION: Base Camp - Base Station GMRS Tuned Fiberglass Antenna enhances GMRS radio by 20% for range, reception, and transmission. A 5 ft antenna addition improves your radio power. The antenna elevation, using a telescoping flagpole, improves the line of sight with your race vehicle. Tuned for GMRS Frequency Range 462-467 MHz (UHF) and high performance with 200 watts power rating. Highlighting low SWR, broader band, weatherproof, and flag pole mounting bracket. High Gain Mast diameter is 1-3/16in to 2-7/16in with a UHF Connector. A 35' HD coaxial cable and optional telescoping flagpole are recommended for best results.

TITLE: Magnetic Mount Antenna for Rugged GMR2 PLUS Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: Magnetic Mount Antenna for Rugged GMR2 PLUS Handheld Radios increases range and performance by relocating the antenna outside of your vehicle. Simply place the magnetic antenna base on a large metal surface, secure the included BNC connector to your handheld radio and attach the antenna cable. With a cable length of 9.5 feet, antenna height of 17.5 inches, total height of 18.25 inches, and 1.5in diameter base, the antenna is tuned specifically for GMRS/FRS Frequencies. The long range, magnetic mount antenna is purpose-built for Rugged Radios GMR2-PLUS handheld radios (sold separately).

TITLE: Long Range Antenna for GMR2 PLUS
DESCRIPTION: Long Range Antenna for GMR2 PLUS is a high impact housing antenna, equipped with a machined aluminum base, a precisely-tuned loading coil, and HyperFlex stainless steel wire rope whip. The antenna can increase your transmit and receive range by up to 30% for your handheld radio. This antenna is designed for the Rugged Radios GMR2 PLUS white label handheld, excluding the GMR2 black label legacy model with non-removable antenna. You don't need an additional BNC connector, as it easily screws onto the existing antenna mount through the SMA connector. It is 6-3/4in in length and an eminent choice for extended range applications.

TITLE: GO FURTHER BUNDLE - for V3 and RH5R Handheld Radios - Long Range Antenna  XL Battery  and USB Charging Cable
DESCRIPTION: GO FURTHER BUNDLE for V3 and RH5R Handheld Radios includes Long Range Antenna, XL Battery, and USB Charging Cable. The bundle enables the handheld to double its battery life, extend the range by 30%, and allows continuous charging via the USB cable. The long-range dual-band antenna boosts transmit distance by 30%, enhancing radio performance. The high capacity 3800mAh battery, fits V3 and RH-5R radios, doubling the standard battery life and ideal for race events requiring extended battery life. The USB charging cable provides capability to charge the radio from a standard USB port, plugging directly into V3 Handheld Radio charging port for power on-the-go. Compatibility is limited to Rugged Radios V3 and RH-5R handheld radios. Radio not included.

TITLE: 6 inch Ground Plane Disc for Antenna Mounting on Aluminum Fiberglass Plastic
DESCRIPTION: 6 inch Ground Plane Disc for Antenna Mounting on Aluminum Fiberglass Plastic is designed for vehicles with non-metal roofs and ground plane antennas. Optimal performance is achieved when mounted on top of the roof, with the antenna atop the disc, but it can be installed underside with potential performance decline. The disc has a diameter of 6in, an alloy construction, and 4 3/8in holes for incremental antenna positioning adjustment.

TITLE: Lowrance Point-1 GPS Antenna
DESCRIPTION: Lowrance Point-1 GPS Antenna features NMEA 2000 position and heading sensor ensuring accurate and rapid boat position and speed updates. With an integrated electronic compass with GPS, the antenna assures accurate heading for stable chart orientation in Heading Up mode, enhanced Course Over Ground at low speeds and radar overlay on the chart. Suitable for any marine environment, the waterproof antenna can connect to any HDS Gen2, HDS Gen2 Touch or Elite-7 display or any NMEA 2000 network. Other features include support for GLONASS, GPS, SBAS including WAAS/EGNOS/MSAS, 10 Hz Multi-GNSS updates, spat/pole mount, and a compact design. Items included are the antenna, N2K-T-RD Network T-Connector, and N2KEXT-15RD 15ft Network Extension Cable. Powering must be from Lowrance NMEA 2000 when linked with a Lowrance GPS unit.

TITLE: Garmin Wireless Backup Camera with License Plate Mount
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Wireless Backup Camera with License Plate Mount combines a clear view of the reverse path, a long transmission range ideal for longer vehicles, a wide field of view, and a tough design for adverse road conditions. The camera can be connected to your vehicle's reverse lights, with professional installation advised. Compatible with all Garmin Tread Models - Base, Overland, XL - Baja Chase, and XL - Baja Race Editions. Its signal reaches a 50' working range, suitable for longer vehicles like RVs, trucks, and trailers. On pairing with compatible Garmin Navigator, the camera offers 720p HD resolution. Field of view extends to 160-degrees and the IP67 weather-resistant design ensures durability. It also works with all Tread Models, RV 895, Garmin DriveSmart 66/76/86, dzl OTR610/OTR710/OTR810/OTR1010, RV/Camper 795/895/1095 and RVcam/CamperCam 795, CamperVan.

TITLE: Lowrance 7  Elite FS-7 without Transducer
DESCRIPTION: Lowrance 7in Elite FS-7 without Transducer provides high-performance and offroad navigation thanks to a 7-inch, high-definition multi-touch display. Preloaded with C-MAP Contour+ inland and coastal charts, there are also mapping options like C-MAP, Navionics and others. C-MAP Easy Routing and Navionics Autorouting improve navigation, as does the onscreen C-MAP Genesis Live. The touchscreen controls Power Pole anchors and Ghost Trolling Motor. Wireless, NMEA 2000 and Ethernet connectivity are integrated for maximum compatibility. The package includes a power only cable for HDS/Elite/Hook/Mark, a set of 3 x 3-amp fuses, bracket for HDS-7 LIVE / Elite FS-7 and Suncover for Elite FS7.

TITLE: Lowrance 9  Elite FS-9 without Transducer
DESCRIPTION: Lowrance 9in Elite FS-9, without Transducer, is ideal for high-performance and offroad navigation. Easy-use, with a 9-inch high-definition multi-touch display easy to view. Inclusion of features like preloaded C-MAP Contour+ inland and coastal charts, varying mapping options such as C-MAP, Navionics, C-MAP Easy Routing, Navionics Autorouting capabilities, High-resolution multi-touch touchscreen, integrated wireless, NMEA 2000 and Ethernet connectivity, touchscreen control of Power Pole anchors and Ghost Trolling Motor. Included are HDS/Elite/Hook/Mark power-only cable FUSE-1, Set of 3 x 3-amp fuses, HDS-9 LIVE / Elite FS-9 bracket, Elite FS9 Suncover. The unit requires a Point-1 External Antenna, sold separately.

TITLE: Garmin inReach Mini 2
DESCRIPTION: Garmin inReach Mini 2 is a compact satellite communicator that provides global satellite coverage and interactive SOS alerts. It allows two-way messaging and location sharing even without cellphone coverage. The device is compatible with the Garmin Explore app, which aids in navigation, waypoints, activities, and trip planning. The device also offers TracBack routing for easy trackback to starting point and comes with a digital compass for accurate heading information. It runs on a rechargeable lithium battery providing up to 14 days of use in 10-minute tracking mode. Other features include the InReach weather forecast service, unlimited cloud storage and trip planning, and compatibility with Garmin devices and apps like Garmin Messenger app and Garmin Pilot app. The device has a rugged and compact design, measuring 2.04 x 3.90 x 1.03 and weighing just 3.5 oz. It features a 0.9in x 0.9in display at 176 x 176 pixels resolution and is waterproof with IPX7 rating. The package includes a USB cable, carabiner, and documentation. It requires an active satellite subscription to access the Iridium network and communicate. Garmin inReach Mini 2 can be controlled remotely with other compatible Garmin devices.

TITLE: Lowrance LR-1 Bluetooth Remote Control for HDS LIVE - HDS Carbon
DESCRIPTION: Lowrance LR-1 Bluetooth Remote Control for HDS LIVE - HDS Carbon offers the ability to control your HDS LIVE or HDS Carbon display from anywhere on your boat. This user-friendly remote includes five user-programmable options and easy-to-use long- and short-press programming functionality. Key features are preprogrammed zoom in/zoom out and waypoint options and Bluetooth connectivity. You can mark waypoints without directly interacting with your display.

TITLE: 2 GB Micro SD Card with Adapter
DESCRIPTION: 2 GB Micro SD Card with Adapter is primarily targeted at heavy mobile users using cell phones, eBooks, tablet PCs or portable gaming consoles. This microSD card, by Transcend, offers an economical solution to increase storage space for expandable mobile devices. Notable characteristics include a mechanical write protection switch on the adapter, and an included microSD adapter for use in standard SD Card slots. It also features built-in Error Correcting Code (ECC) that identifies and rectifies transfer errors.

TITLE: Garmin Montana 700i Rugged GPS Touchscreen Navigators and Satellite Communicator
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Montana 700i Rugged GPS Touchscreen Navigators and Satellite Communicator provides adventurers with on- or off-road navigation coupled with global messaging and interactive SOS via inReach satellite technology. It features a full QWERTY keyboard, 18+ hours of lithium-ion battery life in GPS mode, and resistance to thermal, shock, water, and vibration. This robust navigator allows two-way messaging, interactive SOS, global connectivity, inReach weather forecast service, and comes equipped with routable topographic maps and BirdsEye Satellite Imagery. Notable additions include LED beacon flashlight, touchscreen, a virtual keyboard for custom messaging, and dog tracking (when paired to a compatible dog track system). Its dimensions are 3.6in x 7.2in x 1.3in, it weighs 14.5 oz and has rechargeable lithium-ion battery. Additional storage space available with a max 32 GB microSD card. Activities including sending route selection, waypoints to MapShare, automatic routing, and the exchange of locations with other inReach devices are supported.

TITLE: Garmin Montana Motorcycle/ATV Mount Kit and AMPS Rugged Mount with Audio/Power Cable
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Montana Motorcycle/ATV Mount Kit and AMPS Rugged Mount with Audio/Power Cable offers easy navigation while driving, by providing compatibility with both portrait and landscape modes. This kit, compatible with Montana 700, Montana 700i, and Montana 750i, features a rugged mount, hardware, an AMPS arm/ball socket, and cable with raw power, audio, and data wires.

TITLE: Lowrance NMEA 2000 Starter Kit
DESCRIPTION: Lowrance NMEA 2000 Starter Kit includes a network power cable, a 15-foot NMEA 2000 cable, two T-connectors and two network terminators, providing everything need to build a NMEA 2000 network.

TITLE: Lowrance GPS Power Cable PC-30
DESCRIPTION: Lowrance GPS Power Cable PC-30 is a replacement power cable compatible with all factory HDS and Elite HDI series GPS systems. The systems it works with include Lowrance HDS-7 Gen 3, Lowrance HDS-9 Gen 3, and Lowrance HDS-12 Gen 3.

TITLE: Lowrance Network Power Node
DESCRIPTION: Lowrance Network Power Node, a power cable specifically crafted for Lowrance Point-1 antenna. This package contains NMEA 2000 Power Cable and NMEA 2000 Network T connector.

TITLE: Garmin PowerSwitch for Tread GPS
DESCRIPTION: Garmin PowerSwitch for Tread GPS is a compact digital switch box providing centralized control of your vehicle's 12-volt accessories. This can be controlled via compatible Garmin Tread GPS or smartphone with Garmin PowerSwitch app. Accessories like light bars, horns, air compressors, locks and more can be managed. Installation is hassle-free with no interference with vehicle electronics or need to cut holes in the dashboard. This rugged switch box is IPX7 weather resistant, suitable for off-roading. Up to six switch outputs of 30 amps each can be accessed wirelessly. The on-screen switch panel is customizable with labels, icons, channel groups. Up to four Garmin PowerSwitch devices can be controlled from one display. Supports Apple CarPlay software feature and Android Auto connectivity. The compact dimensions allow flexible mounting options. Custom virtual switch panels for lighting systems can be created. Product dimensions are 4.9W x 1.3H x 3.0D, weighs 10 oz, waterproof to IPX7, with 6 switch outputs, max amps per output of 30 amps, total max amps 100, 2 hardware inputs, 2 controllers, and 4 devices can be paired.

TITLE: Garmin Tread 2
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread 2 is a rugged powersport navigator equipped with a 6 high-resolution, ultrabright, glove-friendly touchscreen. It can withstand extreme temperatures and harsh weather (rated IP67 for dust/water resistance), making it perfect for off-road adventures. Powered by an upgraded processor, it ensures faster performance, swift map drawing, and efficient route calculations. With OpenStreetMap, U.S. Forest Service Motor Vehicle Use Maps, Adventure Roads and Trails map content, you can get turn-by-turn navigation for unpaved roads and trails in off-road areas across North America.With subscription-free satellite imagery, view high-resolution overhead views of routes and terrain, snowmobile trails, as well as fuel stops, warming shelters, restaurants in selected areas within the U.S. and Canadian provinces. An Outdoor Maps+ subscription will give you access to premium content like slope angle, slope aspect, avalanche risk report, and more.The Garmin Tread 2 also offers a group ride mobile feature on the Tread app, through which you can sync your devices, tracks, routes, waypoints, and collections, as well as keep track of your friends riding positions. The device comes with built-in altimeter, barometer, compass and pitch/roll gauges (ABC Sensors) for navigation on tough terrain. It provides insights into public land boundaries and private land information for parcels larger than 4 acres.With Garmin Tread 2, you can easily share GPX files with other riders and receive spoken turn-by-turn directions for street navigation. You can pair this with your compatible Garmin GPS dog tracker and your smartphone to track and retrieve sporting dogs in the field, download live weather, storm alerts, animated radar, and more. The device also includes a preloaded directory of the Ultimate Public Campgrounds with over 46,000 camping locations across the U.S.Garmin Tread 2 has a built-in media player for controlling music on a smartphone, a group ride radio for location and voice communication, inReach technology for two-way text messaging and SOS, multiple mounting options and enables on-screen control for your vehicles 12-volt electronics with Garmins PowerSwitch digital switch box. The package includes Tread 2, tube mount kit, power cable, USB cable, and other documentation. Enjoy hands-free communication by pairing Tread with your helmet or headset enabled with BLUETOOTH technology.

TITLE: External Garmin GPS Antenna with Mount
DESCRIPTION: External Garmin GPS Antenna with Mount is a robust external antenna kept in a low-profile water-resistant housing. Known for its enhanced flexibility and potential for improved performance, this antenna additionally carries a 9.8 ft (3 m) long cable. It is compatibility extends to Tread - Overland Edition, Tread - SxS Edition, Tread XL - Baja Chase Edition, Tread XL - Baja Race Edition, and Tread XL - Overland Edition.

TITLE: Garmin Tread - Base Edition
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread - Base Edition is a robust powersport GPS navigator for all-terrain use. Featuring a glove-friendly 5.5 touchscreen, it's IPX7 weather-resistant, built to U.S. military standard 810 for thermal and shock resistance, and comes with a powered mount and wiring harness for easy installation on your powersport vehicle. The Tread app facilitates data syncing across various devices. Plus, direct-to-device BirdsEye Satellite Imagery downloads without needing a computer. In addition to preloaded topographic maps of North and Central America and detailed street maps of the same, it includes U.S. Forest Service Roads and trails and Motor Vehicle Use Maps for ATVs and motorcycles. With no subscription required, high-resolution satellite imagery is easily downloadable via Wi-Fi. The unit also features growing trail database with difficulty ratings for off-road riding areas across the U.S. Notably, it comes preloaded with iOverlander points of interest and Ultimate Public Campgrounds, offering routes to the best campsites without requiring a cell signal. Other features include public and private land boundaries access and multi-device syncing via the Tread app. It also has built-in sensors such as an altimeter, barometer, and compass. It can be paired with select Garmin GPS dog systems for dog tracking and compatible inReach global satellite communicators for two-way text messaging, interactive SOS, and weather. Finally, spoken turn-by-turn directions are available for on-road navigation, with driver alerts for curves, red light/speed cameras, and more. Its dimensions are 5.8W x 3.5H x 1D, and it weighs 9.2 oz. It has a rechargeable lithium-ion battery and 64 GB internal storage, expandable up to 256 GB via microSD.

TITLE: Garmin Tread XL - Baja Chase Edition - 10  Off-Road Chase Navigator
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread XL - Baja Chase Edition - 10in Off-Road Chase Navigator is built for high speed and performance, offering a reliable off-road navigation option with global satellite coverage for communication. The navigator allows team tracking with a built-in inReach technology, enabling users to monitor live positions of race vehicles and provides real-time communication for coordinating repairs, requiring an active inReach Flex Team subscription. Made for easy portability, The Tread Baja Chase Edition features a heavy-duty suction cup, vehicle power cable, and robust mounting hardware. It allows the user to import GPX data in advance for detailed course views ad the creation of custom pacenotes. The navigator can track a race vehicle in chase mode and is built for all-terrain use, with an IP67 rating for dust and water-resistance. It also comes preloaded with high-resolution BirdsEye Satellite Imagery for the North Baja Peninsula. Accessories include a suction cup mount, a vehicle power cable, a magnet-assisted mount, a USB-C cable, documentation, and capacity for a microSD card. The device has dimensions of 9.9inW x 7.8inW x 1.2inD, a display size of 8.5inW x 5.3inH, and weighs 32.8 oz. Its battery can last for up to 6 hours at 50% backlight and offers memory storage options up to 256 GB with a microSD card.

TITLE: Garmin 12 Volt Vehicle Power Cable
DESCRIPTION: Garmin 12 Volt Vehicle Power Cable serves as your in-vehicle charger when you're off-road. It powers up using a 12 volt adapter. Built for compatibility with Garmin Tread GPS.

TITLE: Tread XL Dock
DESCRIPTION: Tread XL Dock, meant for panel mounting of Garmin devices directly onto the dashboard or included bail mount. Includes bare wire cable and push-buttons for functions like zoom and pan. Compatibility extends to Garmin Tread XL Baja Chase Edition, Baja Race Edition, and Overland Edition.

DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread Handlebar Controller is designed for easy operation of your Garmin Tread GPS on various terrains. It has easy Map Switching for quick selection of preferred map layers, waypoint marking, and music control. It's designed for extremes, being rugged, IP67 water-resistant for adventurous rides, and uses wired power for optimal performance. The controller includes mounting options for various vehicle setups and fits handlebars of 7/8 inch, 1 inch, and 1-1/4 diameters. It's capable of map layer selection and music control, and is dust and water-resistant. Comes with a hardware mounting kit.

TITLE: External inReach Antenna
DESCRIPTION: External inReach Antenna, a robust external antenna, features a low-profile water-resistant housing. This antenna promises flexibility, improved installation options, and potential for enhanced performance. The included cable measures 9.8 ft (3 m) long. Compatibility extends to products such as Tread - Overland Edition, Tread - SxS Edition, Tread XL - Baja Chase Edition, Tread XL - Baja Race Edition, and Tread XL - Overland Edition.

TITLE: Garmin Locking Magnet-Assisted Mount
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Locking Magnet-Assisted Mount allows easy attachment of compatible Garmin Tread GPS for vehicle navigation. The mount features a 1.5 (38.1 mm) ball joint size and is compatible with Tread - Overland Edition, Tread XL - Overland Edition, Tread XL - Baja Race Edition, and Tread XL - Baja Chase Edition.

TITLE: Garmin Tread - Overland Edition - XL 10
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread - Overland Edition is a rugged all-terrain navigator designed for every part of your journey. Equipped with OpenStreetMap (OSM) and USFS Motor Vehicle Use Maps, it offers turn-by-turn trail navigation. Built-in iOverlander points of interest (POIs) provide guidance to find camp setup locations. Tread also features subscription-free BirdsEye Satellite Imagery displaying vivid aerial views of terrain. The navigator is compatible with the Tread app, enabling data synchronization with your other devices and route planning. The inReach technology furthers communication via global satellite. Designed specifically for all-terrain use, Tread is resilient even against harsh elements. The display is advantageous for both bright sunlight and pitch dark environments. You can mount the navigator either in portrait or landscape mode. It comes with preloaded topographic maps with 3D terrain for North and South America and even possesses detailed street maps with custom routing. You can access U.S public land boundaries and private land data for parcels more than 4 acres. High-resolution BirdsEye Satellite Imagery can be downloaded directly to your device using Wi-Fi. Other features include difficulty ratings for off-road riding areas, iOverlander points of interest, Ultimate Public Campgrounds, and built-in sensors like altimeter, barometer, compass, and pitch/roll gauges. The package includes Tread - Overland Edition, suction cup mount, vehicle power cable, locking magnet-assisted mount, USB-C cable, and documentation.

TITLE: Garmin Tread - Overland Edition - 8

It features a high-visibility ultrabright, glove-friendly touchscreen that can be mounted in portrait or landscape mode. For navigation, it uses turn-by-turn trail navigation with OpenStreetMap (OSM) and USFS Motor Vehicle Use Maps. It incorporates built-in inReach technology for global satellite communication, and comes preloaded with topographic maps with 3D terrain for North and South America, detailed street maps, U.S. public land boundaries, and point of interests from iOverlander. Users can also enjoy vivid aerial views with downloadable BirdsEye Satellite Imagery via Wi-Fi connectivity. It includes built-in sensors like an altimeter, barometer, compass, and pitch/roll gauges. It comes with a suction cup mount, vehicle power cable, locking magnet-assisted mount, and USB-C cable. Specs include dimensions of 8.1inW x 6.7inH x 1.2inD or 9.9inW x 7.8inH x 1.2inD, weight of 22.8 oz or 32.8 oz, and battery life up to 6 hours at 50% backlight. Memory storage is provided by a microSD card, with 64GB internal and 256 GB max microSD card.

TITLE: High-Current Power Cable for Garmin GPS
DESCRIPTION: High-Current Power Cable for Garmin GPS is a bare wire power cable perfect for your compatible Tread powersport GPS navigator or Group Ride Radio. Particularly required when using the zmo XT2. Features a 2-pin connector and measures 11.5 ft (3.5 m) in length. Instead of the cigarette lighter adapter, this item wires directly to battery power, with popularity among the overland and chase units. Compatibility includes Tread editions (Overland, SxS, Baja Chase), Tread XL (Baja Race, Overland), and Zumo XT2.

TITLE: Garmin Tread XL - Baja Race Edition - 10  Off-Road Race Navigator
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread XL - Baja Race Edition - 10in Off-Road Race Navigator is designed for high speed Baja trophy truck racing. It includes team tracking with inReach technology, delivering global satellite coverage and messaging capabilities for seamless team communication. With an ultrabright 10 glove-friendly touchscreen and easy push-button interaction available via Tread XL Dock, navigation is always at the user's fingertips. Import GPX data to view course start/end, racetrack line, all virtual checkpoints, and race mile markers. With prerunning tools, obstacles can be anticipated and navigated efficiently. Enhanced performance is assured with external GPS and inReach antenna, both enclosed in water-resistant housings. The Navigator is also IP67-rated for dust and water resistance, mounted securely either directly on the dashboard or with the included bail mount. High-resolution downloadable BirdsEye Satellite Imagery provides vivid overhead views, while the North Baja Peninsula imagery comes preloaded. Included accessories feature Tread XL Baja Dock, two power cables, two external antennas, a USB-C cable, and documentation. The Navigator has a dimension of 9.9inW x 7.8inH x 1.2inD and weighs 32.8 oz. Battery life spans 6 hours at 50% backlight and one hour at 100% backlight. It supports a maximum of 256 GB external storage via a microSD card (not included) and has 128 GB internal storage.

TITLE: Garmin GPS Suction Cup Mount
DESCRIPTION: Garmin GPS Suction Cup Mount attaches your Tread XL 10-inch GPS for straightforward vehicle navigation. Efficiently suctions to the windshield or any smooth, flat surface. Features a ball joint size of 1.5 (38.1 mm).

TITLE: Garmin Tread Tube Mount
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread Tube Mount offers an adjustable tube mount and mounting arm for secure placement of compatible Garmin items (sold separately). Features a 1.5 (38.1 mm) ball joint size fitting a tube from 1.5 inches to 2.5 inches in diameter.

TITLE: Garmin Tread 2 Overland and SXS - Overland - Suction Cup Mount
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread 2 Overland and SXS is an all-terrain navigator suitable for true expeditioners which features an 8 high-resolution, ultrabright and glove-friendly ultrabright touchscreen purpose-built for rugged off-grid expeditions. Offering selectable Overland Edition with 12V plug power, suction cup mount, SXS Edition with hardwired power and bar mount, it provides turn-by-turn navigation for unpaved roads and high-definition digital elevation maps, with preloaded maps for North and South America, City Navigator maps, and a preloaded directory of Ultimate Public Campgrounds for more than 46,000 camping locations across the U.S. Connectivity with Wi-Fi technology allows subscription-free satellite imagery downloads for high-resolution overhead views, with support for Outdoor Maps+ for ongoing access to premium content like burn zones and night lights. The Tread app enables route planning, ride discoveries, friend location tracking, and live weather radar viewing while its pair to the Garmin PowerSwitch digital switch box offers convenient control of 12-volt electronics. Built-in altimeter, barometer, compass and pitch/roll gauge allow for tough-terrain guidance. Optional pairing with the Group Ride Radio accessory and a compatible inReach satellite communicator, enables location sharing, voice communication, two-way messaging and interactive SOS functions. Snowmobile trail content from select U.S. and Canadian provinces, trail difficulty ratings for off-road riding areas in the U.S., and integration with a compatible Garmin GPS dog tracker are also available. The purchase includes either a suction cup mount and 12V power, or bar mount with hard wire power, locking magnet-assisted mount, a USB cable and documentation depending on the selected edition.

TITLE: Garmin Tread 2 Overland and SXS - SXS - Standard Mount
DESCRIPTION: Garmin Tread 2 Overland and SXS offers an 8 high-resolution, ultrabright, glove-friendly touchscreen navigator built for extreme temperatures and weather. Two editions with different mounting options and power sources are available: Overland with 12V plug power and suction cup mount, and the SXS with hardwired power and bar mount. The navigator has turn-by-turn navigation for unpaved roads and trails with OpenStreetMap, U.S. Forest Service Motor Vehicle Use Maps, and Adventure Roads and Trails map content. It also features preloaded topographic maps of North and South America, private and public land info, campgrounds, snow trails, and City Navigator maps of North America with custom street routing. Subscription-free satellite imagery is also available for download directly to the device for overhead route views, and support for Outdoor Maps+ is provided for access to premium map content. It comes with a preloaded directory of Ultimate Public Campgrounds, a compatible smartphone app for route planning and friend tracking, sensors for altimeter, barometer, compass and pitch/roll gauges, and a heavy-duty suction cup with robust magnet-assisted locking mount. It can be paired with the compatible inReach satellite communicator for two-way messaging and interactive SOS, and a Garmin PowerSwitch digital switch box for on-screen vehicle electronics control. Track sporting dogs in the field by pairing it with your compatible Garmin GPS dog tracker. In the package, you will find the Tread 2 GPS, a suction cup mount and 12V power (with Tread 2 Overland only), a bar mount and hard wire power (with Tread 2 SXS only), a locking magnet-assisted mount, a USB cable, and Documentation.

TITLE: Ground Rods for Fiberglass Base Camp Antenna
DESCRIPTION: Ground Rods for Fiberglass Base Camp Antenna consists of 3 ground rods ideal for a fiberglass antenna setup. With the length of 21 5/8 inches, these rods are perfect for addition or replacement in an existing antenna system. Regardless of the Base Antenna variants - GMRS, UHF or VHF, these rods work exceptionally well. They fetch the best results when utilised with Fiberglass Antenna and Telescoping Flagpole.

TITLE: INEOS Grenadier Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - G1 Waterproof

Offering rugged performance and reliable communication for every kind of adventure, the kit is engineered to work seamlessly with the Grenadier's layout. Key features include a vehicle-specific radio mount designed to effortlessly integrate with the Grenadier interior, a custom antenna mount location optimized for overland accessories, trail-tested components, and clean installation with no cutting or fabrication required. This kit is compatible with Rugged's most trusted GMRS mobile radios, all trims and model years Ineos Grenadier (2022 and newer), and all GMRS radios from other manufacturers including Motorola, Midland, Uniden, and more. This radio kit provides rugged durability, easy installation, and universal GMRS compatibility.

TITLE: INEOS Grenadier Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - Rambler G4
DESCRIPTION: INEOS Grenadier Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit is purpose-built for all Ineos Grenadier model years. Engineered to work seamlessly with the Grenadier's layout, the kit includes options for Rugged mobile radios, custom mounting solutions, and no-compromise installation. It features vehicle-specific radio mounts that integrate cleanly with the vehicle interior, custom antenna mount locations optimized for overland accessories, and durable components built for harsh environments. Compatible with Rugged's GMRS mobile radios and equipped for easy installation, this radio kit even works with FRS radios on certain channels and with GMRS radios from Motorola, Midland, Uniden, and more.

TITLE: INEOS Grenadier Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - GMR25 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: INEOS Grenadier Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit is an upcoming, new GMRS radio solution for Ineos Grenadier models, designed for dependable, rugged performance in a variety of adventures. Suitable for exploration of the backcountry, trail chasing in the desert, or group travel, this kit is designed to align seamlessly with the Grenadier's unique layout. Compatible with all GMRS radios, including other manufacturers. This radio kit offer rugged durability while ensuring universal GMRS compatibility. Ideal for enthusiasts and outdoor adventurers, providing dependable communication in remote areas.

TITLE: MRC Grudge Open Face Helmet - UTV Play Helmet - Large / Wired

The built-in Mirrored Sun Shade helps protect from sun glare and fatigue. Designed for universal comfort, its proven head-form ensures a pressure-free, enjoyable experience. It also possesses speaker pockets for easy fitting of most helmet headsets. The package comprises the helmet itself and a MRC helmet bag.

MRCs composite fiberglass shell construction minimizes neck tension. DESCRIPTION: MRC Grudge Open Face Helmet - UTV Play Helmet is a lightweight, open-face, comms compatible unit that takes inspiration from classic rally looks. TITLE: Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint - Large
DESCRIPTION: The Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint offers an updated take on the popular Hybrid Pro Rage model, benefiting from a proprietary DuPont carbon/polymer construction that results in a 20% weight reduction. The modern and streamlined design includes defined shoulder wings for harness stability, standard sliding tethers and a multi-tether system for maximum movement without compromising safety. This SFI-rated model remains minimalist, sitting on your back for easy vehicle exit, and requires no seat modifications. It also features the patented SAS system: the lower straps connect directly to the vehicle's lap-belt via quick-release loops for optimal positioning. Unfettered side-to-side head movement is permitted by the sliding tethers, and the quick-release D-Ring Anchor is easy to attach to existing helmet points.

TITLE: Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint - Medium
DESCRIPTION: Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint, an evolution of the popular Hybrid Pro Rage, offers proprietary DuPont carbon/polymer construction giving it a 20% weight reduction. The sleek design features defined shoulder wings to keep the harness steady, with a standard sliding tether and multi-tether system for full movement range without protection compromise. The SFI-rated Hybrid maintains a minimalist design on your back for quick vehicle exit and no seat modifications are necessary. SAS (Seatbelt Anchor System) feature ensures lower device straps connect directly to the vehicle's lap-belt. Additional comfort is created by SAS straps pulling down on the front device straps. The restraint also offers unrestricted side-to-side head movement thanks to sliding tethers. Easy install D-ring anchors to helmet Head/Neck Restraint points. It is SFI 38.1 Certified, has a 20% decrease in weight from older models, and is available with a patent-pending multi-tether system.

TITLE: Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint - Small
DESCRIPTION: Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint, the next evolution of the Hybrid Pro Rage, uses a proprietary DuPont carbon/polymer construction, holding a 20% weight savings over Pro Rage but maintaining a sleek design. Associates shoulder wings for harness placement and standard sliding tethers with multi-tether system offer comprehensive movement without compromising protection. It's SFI-rated and has a minimalist design for quick vehicle exit, without the need for altering seats. Comes with SAS (Seatbelt Anchor System) for better positioning with quick-release loops. Allows for unrestricted side-to-side head movement through sliding tethers and features easy to install quick-release D-ring. Technically, it is SFI 38.1 certified and has a reduction in weight over earlier models with patent pending multi-tether system and DuPont carbon polymer construction.

TITLE: Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint - Extra Large
DESCRIPTION: The Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint uses a DuPont carbon/polymer construction, resulting in a 20% weight reduction from the Hybrid Pro Rage model. The SFI-rated restraint features a minimalist design that eases quick exits from the vehicle. TITLE: Simpson Hybrid Sport Head & Neck Restraint - Extra Small

TITLE: IMSA 4C Helmet Kit to NASCAR 3C Car Harness Adapter

TITLE: IMSA 4C Helmet Kit to OFFROAD Plug Adapter

Black connects to IMSA 4C Wired Helmet and Blue attaches to OFFROAD Radio Harness. For OFFROAD to IMSA Adapter options, consider the OFFROAD to IMSA Adapter.

TITLE: Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 Radio Mount

TITLE: Polaris Xpedition - Radio and Remote Head Intercom Mount Kit - For Radio and Remote Head Intercom

Both selections provide hardware and a radio power extension cable, but the full kit additionally provides a remote head intercom extension cable and a radio-to-intercom extension cable. The mount is recommended for use with the 696 Plus Remote Head Intercom only.

Intercom compatibility includes Rugged Radios RRP696PLUS Remote Head and STX Remote Head.

TITLE: Can-Am Maverick R Top Mount Kit

This kit is compatible with a range of Rugged Radios models, including M1, G4, G1, GMR45, RM45, and RM60.

TITLE: Polaris RZR PRO XP - Turbo R - Pro R - Remote Head Mount Kit

TITLE: Polaris RZR PRO XP RZR Turbo R and RZR PRO R Dash Mount Radio and Intercom - Rugged M1/G1/G4/RM45/RM60/GMR45 with Switch Holes

The compatible radios are Rugged Radios M1 / G1 / G4 / GMR45 / RM45 / RM60 and this kit perfectly fits Polaris RZR PRO XP, RZR Turbo R, and RZR PRO R.

TITLE: 2025 Polaris RZR Pro XP Pro R and Pro S Radio Mount
DESCRIPTION: 2025 Polaris RZR Pro XP, Pro R, and Pro S Radio Mount fits 2025 Polaris RZR Pro XP, RZR Turbo R, RZR Pro R, and Pro S, presenting a clean, easy installation for a two-way mobile radio. Note that these Lower Accessory Panels require 12V Plug relocation. The package includes a Radio Mount, Rocker Switch Adapter, Pulse Bar power adapter, and Mounting Hardware. It is compatible with Rugged Radios M1, G1, GMR45, RM45, RM60, and RDM-DB.

TITLE: Can-Am Maverick X3 Remote Head Mount Kit
