TITLE: Polaris RZR XP - Radio and Remote Head Intercom Mount
DESCRIPTION: Polaris RZR XP - Radio and Remote Head Intercom Mount, designed specifically for the 2024 Polaris RZR XP, holds your mobile radio and 696 Plus Remote Head Intercom under the dash. A power adapter enables seamless connection of the Active Filter Power to the Polaris Pulse Bar. Kit includes mount hardware and power adapter. Compatible with the Polaris RZR XP (2024 without optional heater kit). Works with various Rugged Radios including M1/G1/GMR45/RM45/RM60 and RDM-DB. Recommended for use solely with the 696 Plus Remote Head Intercom.

TITLE: Polaris Xpedition - Radio and Remote Head Intercom Mount Kit - For Radio Only
DESCRIPTION: Polaris Xpedition - Radio and Remote Head Intercom Mount Kit is purpose built for the 2024 Polaris Xpedition ADV/XP, specifically designed for holding your M1, G1, or GMR45 radio and 696 Plus Remote Head Intercom under the dash. A power adapter for connecting the Active Filter Power to the Polaris Pulse Bar is included. The kit comes in two options: one with extras for radio and remote head intercom or radio only. The full kit contains radio mount, radio-to-intercom extension cable, remote head intercom extension cable, radio power extension cable, power adapter, and hardware. The radio only version contains radio mount, external speaker mount (speaker not included), radio power extension cable, power adapter, and hardware. Recommended for use only with the 696 Plus Remote Head Intercom.

TITLE: 2024 Yamaha YXZ Mount for Mobile Radio and 696 Rocker Intercom
DESCRIPTION: 2024 Yamaha YXZ Mount for Mobile Radio and 696 Rocker Intercom supports Rugged Radios M1, G1, RM60, or GMR45 Mobile Radio, offering convenience with rocker switch holes, making it suitable for remote head intercom, remote PTT's, or other switch controls. Noteworthy features are its three rocker switch holes, black powder coated finish, and steel construction. It doesn't forget to include switch control stickers and mounting hardware. This product matches Yamaha YXZ (2024). Compatible radios include Rugged Radios M1 / G1 / G4 / GMR45 / RM45 / RM60 and intercoms like Rugged Radios RRP696PLUS Remote Head, and STX Remote Head. Note: Radio and switches not part of the package.

TITLE: Impact Noise Cancelling Ear Cups
DESCRIPTION: Impact Noise Cancelling Ear Cups enable higher noise cancellation in helmets. They are lightweight and come with a velcro attachment for convenient installation. For fitting in an Impact helmet, Impact Ear Cup Cut Out Pads are mandatory.

TITLE: Impact Ear Cup Cut Out Pads - Standard
DESCRIPTION: Impact Ear Cup Cut Out Pads, designed to accommodate Impact Noise Cancelling Ear Cups, offer standard size for maximum comfort. The installation process is simple with Velcro. Impact Noise Cancelling Ear Cups are required.

TITLE: Impact Ear Cup Cut Out Pads - Thin
DESCRIPTION: Impact Ear Cup Cut Out Pads are designed to accommodate Impact Noise Cancelling Ear Cups. They are offered in a standard size for comfort, and install easily with Velcro. They require Impact Noise Cancelling Ear Cups.

TITLE: Impact Helmet Hardware Kit
DESCRIPTION: Impact Helmet Hardware Kit is designed for shield installation on all Impact helmets. To avoid stripped screw threads, Impact suggests hardware replacement after a few shield changes.

TITLE: Impact Racing Helmet Shield - Amber
DESCRIPTION: Impact Racing Helmet Shield is recommend for periodic replacement of any cracked or worn-out helmet shields. As direct replacements, they are most compatible with Impact Racing helmets. Offering varieties in amber, clear, light smoke, and dark smoke. Compatible with the IMPACT 1320 Helmet.

TITLE: Impact Racing Helmet Shield - Clear
DESCRIPTION: Impact Racing Helmet Shield, direct replacements for Impact Racing helmets, are recommended for periodic replacement. Your helmet shield might be cracked or worn-out, and if you're tired of this, these shields are the solution. With availability in multiple shades including amber, clear, light smoke, and dark smoke, they are compatible with the IMPACT 1320 Helmet and multiple others.

TITLE: Impact Racing Helmet Shield - Dark Smoke
DESCRIPTION: Impact Racing Helmet Shield, recommended as a periodic replacement for worn-out or cracked helmet shields, these are direct substitutes specifically for Impact Racing helmets. Offered in amber, clear, light smoke, and dark smoke, the shields function well with the IMPACT 1320 Helmet and similar models.

TITLE: Impact Helmet Shield Replacement Foam
DESCRIPTION: Impact Helmet Shield Replacement Foam is a straightforward peel and stick foam for your Impact helmet, functioning as a direct replacement to keep your shield sealed, preventing dirt and dust from entering.

TITLE: Impact Racing Helmet Shield - Light Smoke
DESCRIPTION: Impact Racing Helmet Shield is designed as a direct replacement for worn-out or cracked helmet shields, specifically for Impact Racing helmets. Available in amber, clear, light smoke, and dark smoke options. Compatible with the IMPACT 1320 Helmet and numerous others.

TITLE: Impact Velcro RACE Helmet Dust Skirt - Large/XL
DESCRIPTION: Impact Velcro RACE Helmet Dust Skirt offers valuable thermal protection and reduces wind noise to your communication system. It's available as a do-it-yourself Velcro attachment, manufactured from a soft knit Nomex, thus providing protection from heat transfer while reducing dirt and debris ingress. This skirt pairs well with Impact 1320 helmets. Featuring a 2-layer tapered-in design, this skirt can be easily tucked into the driving suit, reducing interference with head restraint. Designed to comply with the SFI Foundation's 3.3/5 or 3.3/10 Specification, this USA made accessory suits all full-face helmets. Helmet not included.

TITLE: Impact Velcro RACE Helmet Dust Skirt - Small/Medium
DESCRIPTION: Impact Velcro RACE Helmet Dust Skirt offers thermal protection and reduces wind noise interference with communication systems. The soft knit Nomex makeup provides heat protection and prevents dirt and debris entry, thereby enhancing driver experience. Made in the USA, the 2-layer skirt design allows easy tucking into the driving suit. The Impact helmet skirt doesn't interfere with frontal head restraint. As an attachable feature, this helmet skirt is compatible with full face helmets, particularly, with the Impact 1320 model. This manufacturer's product fulfills the SFI Foundation's 3.3/5 or 3.3/10 Specification. Helmet not included.

TITLE: XStack Tear Offs for Impact Simpson Shark Vudo Invader Sting Ray Devil Ray - 10209C
DESCRIPTION: XStack Tear Offs for Impact, Simpson Shark, Vudo, Invader, Sting Ray, Devil Ray - 10209C is a Racing Optics helmet system with patented laminated tearoff technology. With a 2 mil thickness and 10-layer tearoff stack, this product is ideal for all dirt racing applications. Each sleeve contains 3 stacks of 10 tearoffs, totaling 30 tearoffs per sleeve. The use of optical grade Mylar tearoffs laminated into stacks results in increased visibility by reducing reflected light between layers. The Manufacturer Part Number of the product is 10209C and it includes ten clear, 2 mil laminated tearoffs. This model is compatible with Simpson Shark Super Shark, VUDO, Invader, Valor, Sting Ray, Devil Ray, Desert Devil, Impact 1320, Impact Air Draft Super Sport, Spider Wizard, and Euro Sport.

TITLE: XStack Tear Offs for Impact Vapor Air Vapor Charger Super Charger Draft - 10230C
DESCRIPTION: XStack Tear Offs for Impact Vapor, Air Vapor, Charger, Super Charger, Draft - 10230C Racing Optics offers a system with patented laminated tearoff technology. This 2 mil thick, 10-layer tearoff stack is ideal for all dirt racing applications. Each sleeve brings 3 stacks of 10 tearoffs, totaling 30 tearoffs a sleeve. The tearoffs are optical grade Mylar assembled in stacks to enhance visibility through increased light transmission and reduction of reflected light between layers. The product features Manufacturer Part Number: 10230C and comes packaged with clear 10 laminated tearoffs of 2 mil. Suitability extends to models including Impact Vapor, Air Vapor, Charger, Super Charger and Draft.

TITLE: IMSA Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with R1 Radios
DESCRIPTION: IMSA Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with R1 Radios provides both digital and analog communication. It is designed to enhance clarity, flexibility, and reliability in various racing environments. The kit includes the R1 dual-band digital/analog radio and the upgraded H42 Behind-the-Head headset for improved noise isolation and comfort. The kit also features IMSA 3-Conductor Configuration, plug-and-play installation, clear audio through AlphaBud mono earbud, and added protection in form of a ballistic nylon radio belt and an aluminum handheld radio box. The kit also has equipment for both driver and crew with separate components for each. For example, the driver setup includes things like R1 dual-band radios, IMSA 4C wired communication harness, Velcro-mounted steering wheel push-to-talk button, and AlphaBud mono earbud. The crew setup has items like R1 dual-band radios, H42 Behind-the-Head headset, handheld radio coil cord for crew headset connection, and ballistic nylon crew radio belt. The R1 is compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios on the same frequencies. However, long-range antennas remain exclusive to the High-Performance kit.

TITLE: IMSA Driver and Crew Chief Long Track Racing Kit with RDH16 Radios
DESCRIPTION: IMSA Driver and Crew Chief Long Track Racing Kit with RDH16 Radios is the professional's choice for long-distance communication, equipped with ultra-clear digital audio and superior durability. The kit consists of a high-performance RDH-16 UHF digital radio that offers unmatched clarity and range, beneficial for long-track racing. The race-ready setup also incorporates an H42 Behind-the-Head headset for optimum noise isolation. Enhanced communication is delivered with external driver and crew antennas that ensure a stable connection at any distance. The kit includes an IMSA 4-Conductor Configuration for professional IMSA communications, a plug-and-play installation, clear audio via an AlphaBud mono earbud, and long-track upgrades such as external long-range antennas and race-grade coax cable for additional protection. The RDH-16 radio is compatible with all UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies. Providing maximum performance and range, this kit is set out for teams aiming for powerful communication and clarity on the track.

TITLE: IMSA Driver Only Racing Communication Kit with R1 Radio
DESCRIPTION: IMSA Driver Only Racing Communication System with R1 Radio offers both digital and analog communication for various racing environments enhancing clarity, flexibility, and reliability. The R1 dual-band digital/analog radio improves communication quality and durability. Notable features include an IMSA 3-Conductor Configuration, R1 Dual-Band Digital/Analog Radio, Plug-and-Play Installation, and Clear Audio from an AlphaBud mono earbud. The kit also provides added protection with an aluminum handheld radio box and free storage bag. The product contains an R1 dual-band (VHF/UHF) digital/analog handheld radio, an IMSA 4C wired communication harness, helmet kit, radio jumper, steering wheel push-to-talk button, AlphaBud mono earbud for the driver, free medium storage bag, and a universal mounting radio box. Compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios on the same frequencies.

TITLE: IMSA Driver Only Long Track Racing Communication Kit with RDH16 Radio
DESCRIPTION: The High-Performance IMSA Wired Driver Only Kit includes RDH-16 UHF digital handheld radio, IMSA 4C wired communication harness, IMSA 4C wired helmet kit, radio jumper, Velcro-mounted steering wheel push-to-talk button, AlphaBud mono earbud, aluminum handheld radio box with universal mounting, medium storage bag, and a driver long-range antenna. The kit is optimized for enhanced durability and exceptional long-distance communication with its clear digital audio. It also offers plug-and-play installation, promoting a race-ready setup and clear audio via AlphaBud mono earbud. The kit is further optimized for IMSA communications and is compatible with all UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies. Options are available for those on a budget with The Entry Level Kit and The Most Versatile Kit for high flexibility.

TITLE: IMSA Driver Only Communication Kit with V3 Radio
DESCRIPTION: IMSA Driver Only Communication Kit with V3 Radio is a budget-friendly, reliable choice for grassroots racers and weekend warriors, thanks to its V3 dual-band analog radio ensuring essential in-race communication. Offering clear analog communication, this kit isn't inclusive of digital or long-range capabilities. Its features include an IMSA 4-Conductor Configuration wired for standard IMSA communication setups and an AlphaBud mono earbud for crisp driver communication. Easy installation via plug-and-play is another attractive aspect. The kit consists of a V3 dual-band analog handheld radio, an IMSA 4C wired communication harness and helmet kit, a radio jumper, a Velcro-mounted PTT button, and a ballistic nylon radio bag. Compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies.

TITLE: IMSA Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with V3 Radios
DESCRIPTION: IMSA Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with V3 Radios offers an affordable, easy-to-set-up communication solution for grassroots racers. The kit includes a dual-band analog radio, Helmets with alpha-bud mono earbuds, handheld radios, harnesses, and bags for radios. Communication is clear thanks to the V3 Dual-Band Analog Radio and the H41 Behind-the-Head Headset. A highlight is the IMSA 4-Conductor Configuration tailored for standard IMSA setups. Notably, the kit doesn't provide digital capabilities, long-range antennas, or the superior H42 headset found in advanced kits. The radio is compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies, including RDM-DB, M1, RDH-X, R1, V3, RM60, RH5R, RDH16, as well as Icom, Motorola, and Kenwood business band radios.

TITLE: IMSA 4C Harness to Stilo Helmet Coil Cord Adapter
DESCRIPTION: The IMSA 4C Harness to Stilo Helmet Coil Cord Adapter seamlessly connects IMSA configured communication wiring with wired Stilo helmets. An easy process, plug the white plug into the Stilo helmet comms jack, and the black plug into an IMSA style harness. Now you're ready to race with Stilo Wired Helmet and IMSA Radio Harness Compatibility.

TITLE: Jack Box Headset Stations for RRP800 Fire & Safety Intercoms - Single Position Jack Box
DESCRIPTION: Jack Box Headset Stations for RRP800 Fire & Safety Intercoms are Quick Lock jack boxes featuring Firecom 5-Pin jacks and straightforward install daisy chain connectors. These allow two more positions or pump panels. Three models available: Single Position Jack Box Headset Station, Single Position Jack Box Headset Station with dual PTT, and Dual Position Jack Box Headset Station. Features include PTT functions, in-vehicle communication, Nexus 5 conductor TJ105 jack for Firecom-style headset plugs, Quick Lock locking connections, aluminum extrusion construction, built-in panel mount design and self-tapping screws. Configuration allows headsets to connect directly, enabling transmit. Rugged Quick Lock jack boxes offer speedy, reliable installation, configurable and expanded from 2 positions to 6 positions and to pump panels. No soldering or RF interference involved with 6, 10, or 15 ft. Quick Lock pre-assembled cables.

TITLE: Jack Box Headset Stations for RRP800 Fire & Safety Intercoms - Single Position Jack Box with Dual PTT
DESCRIPTION: Jack Box Headset Stations for RRP800 Fire & Safety Intercoms feature Rugged Quick Lock jack box, Firecom 5-Pin jacks, and easy install daisy chain connectors for adding two more positions or pump panels. Three models include: Single Position Jack Box Headset Station, Single Position Jack Box Headset Station with dual PTT, and Dual Position Jack Box Headset Station. The Jack Box provides PTT functions, allows in-vehicle communication, listening only radio function, and direct connection for PTTHeadsets. It is built with an aluminum extrusion, in/out 6-pin jacks, and a built-in panel mount design for easy installation. Configurations regarding Jack Box without PTT are also available. These ensure listen-only capability for crew and should not be linked to Jack Boxes with PTT. Fast and easy setup is ensured by Rugged Quick Lock jack boxes.

TITLE: Jack Box Headset Stations for RRP800 Fire & Safety Intercoms - Dual Position Jack Box
DESCRIPTION: Jack Box Headset Stations for RRP800 Fire & Safety Intercoms includes a Rugged Quick Lock jack box with Firecom 5-Pin jacks and connectors for daisy chain installation and expansion. Available in Three Models: Single Position Jack Box Headset Station, Single Position Jack Box Headset Station with dual PTT, and Dual Position Jack Box Headset Station. The Dual PTT Jack Box enables PTT functions for each radio. The extension jack box enables in-vehicle communication with a listen-only radio function. Construction utilizes aluminum extrusion and includes a built-in panel mount designed with self-tapping screws. Configuration options include Jack Box with and without PTT. Rugged Quick Lock jack boxes facilitate quick and reliable installation without soldering and RF interference.

TITLE: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep Wrangler JK JKU JL and Gladiator JT - JK - Radio/Hand Mic Mount
DESCRIPTION: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep JK JKU and JL accommodates R1, V3, GMR2, GMR2 PLUS, RH-5R radios and other handhelds using a belt clip. You can mount your radio to the grab bar on your Jeep Wrangler. Opt either for the radio-only attachment or a hand mic/radio fashion. Attributes of this item include: light weight construction, black anodized finish and included mounting hardware (installation requires a 10mm wrench). This mount does not need cutting or drilling. Vehicle compatibility includes Jeep JK/JKU (from 2010 to 2017) and Jeep JL (from 2018 to 2023). However, it is not suitable for the 2024 JL. Always ensure your radio has a belt clip for attachment.

TITLE: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep Wrangler JK JKU JL and Gladiator JT - JK - Radio-Only Mount
DESCRIPTION: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep JK JKU and JL is designed to attach to the grab bar of Jeep Wrangler and work with handheld radios, such as R1, V3, GMR2, GMR2-PLUS, RH-5R, and many others that use a belt clip. With options to choose between the radio-only attachment or a hand mic/radio configuration, this mount benefits from light weight construction and a black anodized finish. Inclusion of mounting hardware makes installation simple (10mm wrench needed), cutting or drilling are not required. Compatible vehicles are Jeep JK/JKU from 2010-2017 and Jeep JL from 2018-2023. Not for 2024 JL and radios without a belt clip.

TITLE: GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler TJ LJ and JK - JK 2-Door (11-18) and TJ (97-06) and LJ (04-06) / G1 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: Jeep Wrangler TJ, LJ, JK, JKU and Rubicon Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit provides excellent connection on adventures, available in GMR25, G4, and G1 models offering unmatched clarity and reliability, best suited for tough trails and remote locations. Excellent range and clarity, sturdy GMRS antenna designed for harsh environments, ensuring peak performance and signal boost owing to the low-loss, double-shielded antenna cable. Installation requires no special tools or expertise, all necessary hardware and mounts are included. Unique antenna mount location avoids roof racks and tents, perfect for a Jeep. Built-in connectivity for pigtail cables, allowing easy integration with intercoms, headsets, and any 5-pin accessories. Can communicate with all GMRS and FRS radios, ensuring compatibility with brands like Motorola, Midland, Uniden, among others. The kit contains waterproof G1, durable G4, or the waterproof GMR25 radio options, premium GMRS antenna, 13 heavy-duty antenna cable, driver-side antenna mount custom-made for Jeep models, and a mobile radio mount designed for Jeep interiors. Compatible with Jeep Wrangler JK 2-Door (2007-2018), Jeep Wrangler JKU 4-Door (2007-2019), Jeep TJ SE, Sport, Rubicon (1997-2006), Jeep LJ Unlimited, Rubicon (2004-2006), and all GMRS radios including Rugged G1, GMR45, GMR25, GMR2, GMR2 PLUS, and radios from Motorola, Midland, Uniden.

TITLE: GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler TJ LJ and JK - JK 2-Door (11-18) and TJ (97-06) and LJ (04-06) / Rambler G4
DESCRIPTION: Jeep Wrangler TJ, LJ, JK, JKU and Rubicon Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit offers rugged communication on every trip. Available in GMR25, G4, and G1 models, the radios maintain excellent contact for miles with top-notch clarity and reliability. Suitable for the harshest trails and landscapes, the kit guarantees constant reach for overlanding, rock crawling, or simply driving the open road. The GMRS-specific antenna, designed for harsh conditions, enhances performance and signal strength. Installation is straightforward, requiring no specialist tools. All necessary equipment is included for setup. The antenna mount location avoids roof racks and tents, ideal for your Jeep. Connect easily with intercoms, headsets, and 5-pin accessories through the built-in Rugged Ready pigtail cable. The kit offers wide compatibility, working with all GMRS and FRS radios, including brands such as Motorola, Midland, and Uniden. Each kit comes with the choice of the robust waterproof G1, durable G4, or waterproof GMR25 models, a premium GMRS tuned antenna, a rugged 13 cable with brass NMO mount, a custom Jeep compatible driver-side antenna mount, and a mobile radio mount designed for Jeep interiors.

TITLE: ULTIMATE GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler JK
DESCRIPTION: ULTIMATE GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler JK connects you on all trails with Rugged Radios Jeep Communication Kit, designed for the Jeep Wrangler JK 2-Door (20112017). This kit, combining the GMRS G4 Mobile Radio and GMR2 PLUS Handheld, provides trustworthy communication for climbs, crawls, and campsites. Exceptional range and clarity ensure clear communication miles into any terrain. Installation is swift and easy with all hardware and mounts included. Adventure-ready placement with antenna and radio mounts tailored for Jeep JK interiors and a GMR2 PLUS Handheld for spotting, recovery, or out-of-vehicle communication. Kit includes: GMRS G4 Mobile Radio, GMR2 PLUS Handheld Radio, GMRS-Tuned Antenna, Heavy-Duty 13 Antenna Cable with NMO Mount, Driver-Side Antenna Mount and Mobile Radio Mount. Compatible with all GMRS radios and FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22.

TITLE: GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler TJ LJ and JK - JK 2-Door (11-18) and TJ (97-06) and LJ (04-06) / GMR25 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: Jeep Wrangler TJ, LJ, JK, JKU and Rubicon Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit includes radios such as GMR25, G4, and G1 and is designed for tough trails and remote landscapes for clear, reliable communication. The GMRS-specific antenna delivers peak performance even in harsh environments, coupled with a double-shielded antenna cable that improves signal strength. The installation is uncomplicated, requiring no special tools, with the entire hardware and mounts included for an effortless setup. The antenna mount location is optimized to avoid interference with roof racks and tents. The mobile radio kit also integrates with intercoms, headsets, or 5-pin accessories via the Rugged Ready pigtail cable. It is universally compatible with all GMRS and FRS radios, including brands such as Motorola, Midland, Uniden and others. The kit contains a waterproof and durable radio, heavy-duty antenna cable with a nickel-plated brass NMO mount, a mobile radio mount designed for Jeep interiors, and a custom-fit driver-side antenna mount compatible with Jeep models like Jeep Wrangler JK 2-Door, Jeep Wrangler JKU 4-Door and others. With these features, this radio kits fits outdoor enthusiasts and adventurers offering them reliable communication.

TITLE: GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler TJ LJ and JK - JK 2-Door (07-10) and JKU 4-Door (07-19) / G1 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: Jeep Wrangler TJ, LJ, JK, JKU and Rubicon Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit offers rugged communication for every adventure. With models GMR25, G4, and G1, communication with unmatched clarity and reliability within miles is assure regardless of rock-crawling, overlanding, or merely cruising the open road. The kit pairs an exceptional range with clear signals, and a robust GMRS antenna that can withstand tough environments. With a low-loss, double-shielded antenna cable, signal strength and clarity is amplified. A simplified installation process is accompanied by all necessary mounts and hardware. The antenna mounting positions away from roof racks and tents, seamlessly finding a spot on your Jeep. This kit, with an in-built Rugged Ready pigtail cable, can be integrated with intercoms, headsets, and 5-pin accessories. It works with all GMRS and FRS radios, making it compatible with leading brands. The kit includes several models of waterproof radios, a rugged antenna, 13 heavy-duty antenna cable with a brass mount, vehicle-specific mount, and a driver-side antenna mount crafted for Jeep models. It is compatible with Jeep Wrangler JK 2-Door (2007-2018), JKU 4-Door (2007-2019), Jeep TJ SE, Sport, Rubicon (1997-2006), and LJ Unlimited, Rubicon (2004-2006). Also, accommodates all GMRS radios from manufacturers including Motorola, Midland, and Uniden. Perfectly suited for outdoor enthusiasts, the kit combines rugged durability, easy installation, and universal GMRS compatibility for confident communication across tough terrains, landscapes, and remote zones. The kit is a trustworthy partner for going anywhere.

TITLE: GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler TJ LJ and JK - JK 2-Door (07-10) and JKU 4-Door (07-19) / Rambler G4
DESCRIPTION: Jeep Wrangler TJ, LJ, JK, JKU and Rubicon Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit offers rugged communication, available in three powerful models  GMR25, G4, and G1. These radios maintain contact for miles with unmatched clarity and reliability. The product is intended for toughest trails and remote landscapes. The kit features Exceptional Range and Clarity, allowing connection with friends miles away. The Reliable Rugged Tuned GMRS Antenna with double-shielded cable enhances signal strength and clarity. Included is a Quick and Simple Installation setup. The Adventure-Ready Antenna Mounting location optimises avoidance of roof racks and tents, ideal for a Jeep. Built-In Connectivity allows easy integration with intercoms, headsets, or any 5-pin accessories. It also offers Universal Compatibility with all GMRS and FRS radios, making it workable with top brands like Motorola, Midland, and Uniden. The kit includes Radio Options, a Premium GMRS Tuned Antenna, Heavy Duty Antenna Cable, Driver-Side Antenna Mount, and Mobile Radio Mount. It's compatible with various Jeep models along with all GMRS radios from manufacturers including Motorola, Midland, Uniden, and more. An adventurous essential for rough terrains and open landscapes.

TITLE: ULTIMATE GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler JKU
DESCRIPTION: ULTIMATE GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler JKU combines GMRS G4 Mobile Radio and the GMR2 PLUS Handheld, delivering reliable communication for every climb, crawl, and campsite. The kit promises exceptional range and clarity with quick installation - no special tools required. Adventure-ready placement with specifically designed antenna and radio mounts for Jeep JKU interiors is a key characteristic. The kit includes GMRS G4 Mobile Radio, GMR2 PLUS Handheld Radio, GMRS-Tuned Antenna, Heavy-Duty 13 Antenna Cable with NMO Mount, vehicle-specific antenna and radio mounts. It is compatible with Jeep Wrangler JKU 4-Door (20102017) and all GMRS radios. Offers rugged durability, easy installation, and universal GMRS compatibility. GMRS Radio license required.

TITLE: GMRS Mobile Radio Kit for Jeep Wrangler TJ LJ and JK - JK 2-Door (07-10) and JKU 4-Door (07-19) / GMR25 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: The Jeep Wrangler TJ, LJ, JK, JKU and Rubicon Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit ensure connection during every adventure. Available are GMR25, G4, and G1 models, designed for harsh trails and remote areas. Exceptional range and clarity are ensured through reliable, rugged tuned GMRS Antenna, designed for extreme environments and providing peak performance. This kit communicates with all GMRS and FRS radios, including top brands like Motorola, Midland, Uniden, and more. It's reliable for enthusiasts and outdoor adventurers.

TITLE: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep Wrangler JK JKU JL and Gladiator JT - JL/JT - Radio/Hand Mic Mount
DESCRIPTION: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep JK JKU and JL fits R1/V3/GMR2/GMR2 PLUS/RH-5R radios. Mount this to your Jeep Wrangler grab bar. Works with a range of handheld radios using a belt clip. You can choose radio-only attachment or hand mic/radio configuration. The mount comes in a lightweight design with black anodized finish. Mounting hardware is included, requiring a 10mm wrench for installation. There's no cutting or drilling required. The mount is compatible with Jeep JK/JKU (2010-2017) and JL (2018-2023). Note that the radio must have a belt clip for attaching to this mount and it isn't compatible with the 2024 JL.

TITLE: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep Wrangler JK JKU JL and Gladiator JT - JL/JT - Radio-Only Mount
DESCRIPTION: Handheld Radio Grab Bar Mount for Jeep JK JKU and JL attaches to your Jeep's grab bar and fits radios like R1, V3, GMR2, GMR2 PLUS, and RH-5R. Choose either the radio-only attachment or a hand mic/radio configuration. Light in weight, the mount has a black anodized finish and includes mounting hardware  a 10mm wrench is needed for installation. No cutting or drilling necessary. Compatible with Jeep JK/JKU (2010-2017) and Jeep JL (2018-2023), but not the 2024 JL. The radio must have a belt clip to be attached to the mount.

TITLE: Dual Headset or Helmet Jack - Bar Mount - Offroad
DESCRIPTION: Named the Dual Headset or Helmet Jack - Bar Mount, this product allows for custom installations and easier cable management. The Dual Jack Mount, which bolts to Rugged Bar Mounts, provides multiple options for jack position configuration. This enhances convenience by eliminating the need for reaching for difficult cables. Designed for Offroad Cables (blue jacks) and STX Stereo Cables (grey jacks), the package includes a Billet Headset / Helmet Dual Jack Bar Mount, two Set screws - Allen 1/16in, and a single Bar Mount Screw - Allen 8/32in. Note that cables and bar mount are sold separately. Referenced sizes for UTV Bar Mount Tube including brands are Arctic Cat Wildcat, Can-Am Commander/Maverick, Honda Big Red, Kawasaki Teryx, Polaris ProR, Turbo R, Pro XP, and Yamaha Rhino.

TITLE: Dual Headset or Helmet Jack - Bar Mount - STX Stereo

TITLE: Pyrotect MIDAIR RACE Helmet Wired OFFROAD - Large
DESCRIPTION: Pyrotect MIDAIR RACE Helmet Wired OFFROAD is an SA2020 rated helmet designed for off-road, circle track, or kart racing. It has a unique mid-air inlet location that optimizes airflow to the shield, helping clear fog or dust and providing more room in the vehicle. The elevated location of the mid-air inlet leads to clearer communication, as air does not interfere with the front-facing microphone. For a top-tier fresh air experience, pair this helmet with a MAC3.2 Air Pumper System. The Alpha Audio Helmet Kit offers maximum audio performance. The helmet's unique six pad interior system can be resized for a perfect fit and features corrugated ridges for better heat transfer. Designed with a Composite Tri Weave Vacuum bagged, autoclave cured lightweight shell, it ensures durability and strength; while maintaining a light weight. The helmet can be attached to most neck restraint systems and offers a superior field of vision. It features a fire retardant Nomex interior and complies with Snell SA2020 standards. Available sizes range from Small to XX-Large.

TITLE: MAC-1X 1-Person High Output Helmet Air Pumper (Pumper Only)
DESCRIPTION: MAC-1X 1-Person High Output Helmet Air Pumper has a single potent motor nested within a washable dry media filter, reducing the size. It mounts with exclusive half clamp bar mounts, available in various tubing sizes, and air speed regulation can be done by an optional Variable Speed Controller. The air pumper's key features include a single helmet outlet, weighing just 1.65 pounds, size of 6inT x 4.5inW x 4.5inD, low current draw, 6061 billet alloy construction, Outerwear particulate pre-filter wrap, high duty cycle life motor, waterproof power connector, wiring harness, and a 12' power cord. Attachments such as Dual bar mounts are sold separately.

TITLE: MAC-1X Single Person High Output Helmet Air Pumper (Bundle)
DESCRIPTION: The MAC-1X Single Person High Output Helmet Air Pumper (Bundle) is a compact unit with a powerful motor, which is housed within the filter. The air pumper is fitted on tubing sizes with exclusive half-clamp bar mounts. It can have complete control of airspeed via an optional Variable Speed Controller. The MAC-1X employs a purpose-built washable dry media filter, which eliminates dust, and comes with an Outerwear particulate wrap. It is lightweight at 1.65 pounds, with dimensions of 6inT x 4.5inW x 4.5inD. Built from 6061 billet alloy, it has a low current draw, waterproof power connector and wiring harness, a hose, and 12' power cord are included. Mounting options are sold separately.

TITLE: MAC Air 2-Person Helmet Air Pumper (Pumper Only)
DESCRIPTION: MAC Air 2-Person Helmet Air Pumper, designed for comfort and dust control during activities such as desert racing, dune cruising and short course track racing. Constructed with an injection-molded ABS polymer housing, and combined with a high static pressure fan, this pumper enhances airflow and outperforms competitors in terms of pressure and volume. The pumper uses a dual filtering system, with uniform micro opening external pre-filter, for optimal performance and preventing premature clogging. Both washable filters can be easily cleaned with water post-race. The pumper can be conveniently mounted using half clamp bar mounts. Notable features of MAC Air Pumper include 2 Person helmet outlet, washable dry media air pre-filter, a foam intermediate filter, particulate pre-filter wrap, high duty cycle life motor, waterproof power connector and a 12' power cord.

TITLE: MAC Air 2-Person Helmet Air Pumper (Bundle)
DESCRIPTION: MAC Air 2-Person Helmet Air Pumper (Bundle) is designed to keep users cool, eliminate dust, and promote comfort. Ideal for desert racing, dune cruising, or short course track, this pumper is built with an injection-molded ABS polymer housing for amplified airflow. Its high static pressure fan makes it produce more pressure and volume than other available pumpers. A dual filtering system heightens performance, prevents early clogging, and filters dust and debris through uniform micro openings before reaching the internal filter. Both filters can be cleaned with water post-race. With an inclusive VSC (Variable Speed Controller) you can access and adjust the pumper's airflow volume more easily. The MAC Air bundle comes with two super lightweight expandable pumper hoses, a washable dry media air pre-filter, a foam intermediate filter, a particulate pre-filter wrap, a high duty cycle life motor, a waterproof power connector, and a 12' power cord. It includes a Universal Bar Mount and is built to race.

TITLE: MAC Air 4-Person Helmet Air Pumper (Pumper Only)
DESCRIPTION: MAC Air 4-Person Helmet Air Pumper is constructed using injection-molded ABS polymer housing, optimized for increased airflow. Operating with a high static pressure fan, this model outperforms other helmet pumpers in pressure and volume. Using a dual filtering system, MAC Air enhances performance and avoids premature clogging. The micro openings in the external pre-filter catch most dust and debris before reaching the internal filter. Both filters are washable and reusable. This model has a 4-person helmet outlet, a high duty cycle life motor, a waterproof power connector, and a 12' power cord. Mounting can be achieved with exclusive half clamp bar mounts. MAC Air is built to race.

TITLE: MAC Air 4-Person Helmet Air Pumper (Bundle)
DESCRIPTION: The MAC Air 4-Person Helmet Air Pumper (Bundle) is designed for dust control and comfort during activities such as desert racing and sand dune cruising. Made from injection-molded ABS polymer, the housing optimizes airflow, working with a special high static pressure fan. This combination creates a higher pressure and volume output than other helmet pumpers, utilising a dual filtering system for enhanced performance. The external pre-filter has micro openings to capture most dust and debris before reaching the internal filter. Both filters can be cleaned with water. Ease of mounting is facilitated by the included half-clamp bar mounts that fit most tubing sizes. The bundle comes with a Rocker Switch Variable Speed Controller (VSC) that can adjust the airflow volume, a waterproof power connector, a 12' power cord, four lightweight expandable hoses fitting the MagLock Helmet Air Kit, and washable pre-filter and intermediate foam filters.

TITLE: Rocker Switch Variable Speed Controller (VSC) for MAC Helmet Air Pumper - Complete Switch & Wiring Harness
DESCRIPTION: Rocker Switch Variable Speed Controller for MAC Helmet Air Pumper comes with a complete switch and wiring harness. This controller enables easy adjustment of air flow in the pumper without excessive use of dash space. Acting as both the on/off switch and power control for pumper speed, this tool is an essential upgrade for controlling MAC helmet air pumper air flow. Users with existing VSC can opt to buy only the Switch Upgrade. The controller fits MAC Air, MAC-1X, or MAC3.2 Pumper Systems and standard rocker switch panel holes measuring .830in x 1.45in. Included are integrated waterproof 8in Power Lead and Pumper Lead wiring and plugs, plus a 15' wiring harness for power and pumper control with waterproof connectors.

TITLE: Ultra Flex Expandable Helmet Air Pumper Hose - 1 to 3 Feet
DESCRIPTION: 1 to 3 Ft MAC-X Expandable Ultra Flex Helmet Air Pumper System Hose by Rugged Radios is a super lightweight expandable pumper hose, updated to fit the MagLock Helmet Air Kit. It's the perfect solution for a shorter pumper hose length, and works on existing pumpers and helmets. The hose, capable of stretching between 1-3 ft, collapses back to original shape when unused. With enhanced flexibility allows multiple point adjustments between the blower system and helmet. It has durable cufflink ends ensuring tight connection to the helmet and pumper system. Compatible with MAC Pumper series, and Parker Pumper and other models. Hose's inside diameter is 1.25in. Pumper system and helmet not included.

TITLE: Ultra Flex Expandable Helmet Air Pumper Hose - 2 to 6 Feet
DESCRIPTION: Expandable Helmet Air Pumper Hose is super lightweight, only half a pound, with an expandable hose stretching between 2-6ft and collapsing back manually to the original shape when not in use. Now compatible with threaded cuffs for the MagLock Helmet Air Kit, the new design seamlessly works with existing pumpers and helmets. The enhanced flexibility ensures multiple point adjustments between the blower system and helmet. Having durable cufflink ends, which stay tightly connected to the helmet and pumper system, the hose remains secure even during the harshest racing environments. While being designed for the MAC Pumper series, this hose also fits Parker Pumper and other popular models. The inside diameter of the hose is 1.25in. The Pumper system, MagLock, and helmet are not included.

TITLE: MAC Air Helmet Pumper Mounting Brackets
DESCRIPTION: MAC Air Helmet Pumper Mounting Brackets are engineered to fit the MAC Air Helmet Air Pumper and can be securely mounted in multiple angles with the filter facing up or down, using existing bolt holes on the back of the pumper body. These brackets, made of stainless steel, are black light-textured powder-coat finished for durability. They offer customizable angle for perfect placement and are compatible with MAC Air Helmet Air Pumpers, including older Rugged Pumper systems like the MAC3.2-HP, Parker Pumper, and other models. No pumper system or mount hardware is included in the package.

TITLE: MAC-XC Magnetic Quick-Release for Helmet Air Pumper - MAC-XC only
DESCRIPTION: MAC-XC Magnetic Quick-Release for Helmet Air Pumper employs Scosche magnets for quick connect/disconnect to a coupler base mounted on your roll bar. The kit includes a Magnetic Hose Coupler, a 12-36in expandable pumper hose and Whip Mount and Bar Mount (not included with MAC-XC only purchase). The product features a simple, strong magnetic connection and easy break away. A variety of UTV bar mount tube sizes are supported, including Arctic Cat Wildcat, Can-Am Commander/Maverick, Honda Big Red, Kawasaki Teryx, Polaris ProR, Yamaha Rhino Cage, and Yamaha Wolverine RMAX, among others.

TITLE: Adjustable Whip / Flag Mount Base / MAC XC Mount
DESCRIPTION: The Adjustable Whip / Flag Mount Base / MAC XC Mount is an adjustable whip/flag mount for ATV and OFFROAD vehicles. The mount can be rotated 360, providing 24 locking positions for the optimal angle for MAC-XC, whips and flags. Bar mount is required. Size options for various UTV bar mounts are available: Arctic Cat Wildcat 1.75in, Can-Am Commander/Maverick 2in, Honda Big Red 1.625in, Kawasaki Teryx Perimeter 1.875in, Polaris ProR, Turbo R, Pro XP Main 'C' Pillar 2in, Yamaha Rhino Cage 1.75in, Yamaha Wolverine RMAX Perimeter Tubing 2in, and more.

TITLE: MAC-XC Plug for Magnetic Hose Coupler
DESCRIPTION: MAC-XC Plug for Magnetic Hose Coupler uses a hold-tight press fit design that is easy to insert and remove. This plug keeps debris out of the MAC-XC and during single-rider use, diverts air pressure to one side for increased flow. It also comes with a tether hole for safekeeping.

TITLE: Scosche MagicMount Magnetic Surface
DESCRIPTION: Scosche MagicMount Magnetic Surface enables powerful magnetic mounting for cell phones, external speakers, hand mics, and more. The package includes a Surface Magnetic Mount measuring 2.25in x 2.25in, two MagicPlates, and an alcohol cleaning wipe. Scosche offers a three-year warranty.

TITLE: Can-Am Commander and Late Model Maverick Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - Glove Box Mount - 696 PLUS / G1 GMRS
DESCRIPTION: The Can-Am Commander and Late Model Maverick Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - Glove Box Mount is compatible with Can-Am 2018+ Maverick Trail, 2019+ Maverick Sport, and 2021+ Commander. The communication system, provided by either the 696PLUS or STX intercom, enables users to connect with everyone in the vehicle, listen to music, and maintain communication with other cars nearby. Enabled by Bluetooth, it easily connects to GPS or any Bluetooth-supporting device. The intercom is built with a high-output amplifier for high fidelity audio. Superior music controls allow direct shuffle and volume control from the intercom. Offering long range communication through high output 2-way radios, M1 or G1, you can easily converse with other vehicles in your group. Both radios have high output amplifiers, finely tuned receivers, and are waterproof. The kit includes a RRP696 PLUS or STX Stereo Intercom, two helmet kits, optional headsets and wired helmets, intercom cables, steering wheel and grab bar PTT, powerful M1 Business Band or G1 GMRS Mobile Radio, 15-foot antenna coax cable with mount, long range antenna - POINT5 or VHF 1/2 wave, and radio/intercom mount with active filter.

TITLE: Can-Am Commander and Late Model Maverick Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - Glove Box Mount - 696 PLUS / M1 VHF Business Band

The intercom allows voice activation conversation and music listening. Because of its Bluetooth functionality, pairing your phone becomes convenient. The intercom also offers enhanced music controls directly from the faceplate. The kit also includes high-output 2-way radios, the M1 or G1, for easy and reliable communication with other vehicles. Both radios come with high output amplifiers, finely tuned receivers, and IP67 waterproof housings. The Can-Am Maverick Trail, Sport, or Commander communication kit ensures easy installation and usage. It further includes RRP696 PLUS or STX Stereo Intercom, two Helmet Kits, two Intercom Cables, a Steering Wheel Driver PTT, a Grab Bar Passenger PTT, either a M1 Business Band or G1 GMRS Mobile Radio, 15' Ft. Antenna Coax Cable, Long Range Antenna, Radio/Intercom Mount, and Active Filter among other components.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired RACE SERIES Motorcycle Harness without Radio Jumper
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired RACE SERIES Motorcycle Harness without Radio Jumper Universal OFFROAD Race Moto harness features Rugged Total Shield for clear communication, even in challenging conditions such as racing the Baja 1000. High bend test wire and a 5 pin radio connection offer durability and versatility, while the quick release push-to-talk plug adds convenience. The Dura-Link Seal, a new design on all Rugged helmet kits, seals the connection between the intercom cable and helmet kit plug against water, mud, and dirt that could affect audio performance. Cable Thickness is 4.47mm. Compatible with Helmet Kit HK-OFSP-AA or HK-OFSP-3.5-AA and Push-to-Talk PTT-MC-VM, PTT-MC-BM, PTT-MC-PERCH, PTT-MC-PERCH-XL, alongside various Radio Jumper models.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired MOTO MAX Motorcycle Harness with Pre-Wired 2-Pin Rugged Handheld Radio Connector

Specifically designed RCA OFFROAD body harness minimizes additional cables, integrating the radio jumper directly. Ideal for desert plays and Baja 1000 racing, this harness features a Rugged Total Shield for clear communication. It includes a high bend test wire, an inline jumper for Rugged and Kenwood 2 Pin connector radios, quick release RCA plug for PTT, and a molded Y block. It also offers Total Shield RF blocking, and a cable thickness of 4.47mm. Compatible with Helmet kits HK-OFSP-AA, HK-OFSP-3.5-AA, HK-UNI, and PTT-MC-VM-RCA, PTT-MC-RACE-RCA. The harness works with all current Rugged radios and those with Kenwood 2 Pin connectors.

TITLE: Motorcycle Harness SUPER SPORT for Rugged Handheld Radios

This replacement part for SUPER SPORT Moto Kits also includes a quick-release RCA Push-To-Talk button connector and a molded Y block. It is compatible with all Rugged handheld radios and radios using a standard K2 accessory connector like Kenwood, Wouxon, Baofeng, among others.

TITLE: BT2 Harness Kit Only

TITLE: Cloth Mic Muff Microphone Cover

Compatible with various mics: S3, S4, S5, EM56, M560, DM21, M101, M102, E350, M350. Another option for smaller mics is MICMUFF-F-S.

TITLE: Foam Mic Muff Microphone Cover
DESCRIPTION: Foam Mic Muff Microphone Cover blocks out wind, optimal for fast open vehicles without a wind shield. Compatible with M101, M102, E350, and M350 mics. For smaller mics, refer to #MICMUFF-F-S.

TITLE: Small Foam Mic Muff Microphone Cover

TITLE: Replacement Mic Muff and Ear Foam for H10 Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Mic Muff and Ear Foam for H10 Headsets is a 3-piece kit including replacement foam for both speakers and mic, kid for torn, worn, or missing mic muffs and ear foam on Rugged Radios H10 series. TITLE: Replacement Microphone Wire for H15 H22 H42 Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Microphone Wire for H15, H22, H42 Headsets is perfect for wire boom behind the head and over the head headsets. Ideal for headset replacements or backups, offering sustained functionality.

TITLE: MagLock Helmet Air Kit
DESCRIPTION: MagLock Helmet Air Kit simplifies the connection of your helmet pumper hose using a magnetic break-away design for swift connect/disconnect. Universal helmet and air hose fitment make this suitable for all vehicles, including trophy trucks and UTV's. Ditched duct tape or zip ties, 20lbs of force ensures a powerful air-tight seal that disconnects only when necessary. The construction uses lightweight nylon-infused ABS, resilient to motorsports' rigors and recreation. Developed in California with patented technology, this kit has fire resistance. The package contains a Hose Side, Helmet Side, Magnetic Dock, Magnetic Dust Cap, and needs a new Rugged Radios Pumper Hose with threaded ends.

TITLE: MagLock Air Helmet Side Only Kit
DESCRIPTION: MagLock Air Helmet Side Only Kit is designed to connect to the pumper inlet on your helmet for easy connection to your hose. The kit is MagLock equipped and includes a Magnetic Dust Cap specifically for the helmet side.

TITLE: MagLock Hose Side Only Kit
DESCRIPTION: MagLock Hose Side Only Kit is a component of the MagLock Helmet Air Kit. This kit has the unique feature of threading directly onto Rugged Radios MAC-X Hose. Additionally, it can function with PCI and Parker Pumper hoses after slight modification. The kit contains a Hose Side Magnetic Dock.

TITLE: MagLock Magnetic Roof Dock
DESCRIPTION: MagLock Magnetic Roof Dock, magnetically connects your hose to the roof. Prevents dust and dirt from blowing, also provides a convenient, easy-to-reach hose location. Eliminates the need to search for the hose end. Secures easily with adhesive backing or a pre-drilled hole for screw mounting, allowing a clean, debris-free pumper hose when not in use. Hose not part of the product.

TITLE: MagLock Magnetic Dust Cap
DESCRIPTION: MagLock Magnetic Dust Cap keeps your MagLock inlet sealed when not in use. Specifically tailored for the MagLock Helmet Air Kit, this magnetic dust cap connects easily to the pumper inlet. Magnetic Dust Cap is included.

TITLE: Blank Morale Patch Kit: White Blue Red & Pink Patches
DESCRIPTION: Blank Morale Patch Kit includes white, blue, red, and pink patches. These patches are self-fastening with hook and loop design, allowing secure attachment to materials such as our headset bags or any other item with a hook and loop surface. Four patches form part of the kit. Personalization with a preferred permanent marker is also encouraged.

TITLE: Mid Air Nozzle for MRC Stage One Helmet

TITLE: Polaris RZR 570 800 900 Mount for Rugged Radios and Intercom
DESCRIPTION: Polaris RZR 570, 800, 900 Mount for M1 / G1 / RM60 / GMR45 Radio and Rugged Intercom enables a quick, easy installation of your intercom and mobile radio. Installation involves simply bolting to factory holes under the dash. Compatibility extends to all RZRs 570's, 800's and XP900's until 2014, and the 2012 RZR with power steering; however not 2015 or later RZR XP900. Unique one-piece construction and inclusion of mounting hardware further ease setup. Compatible with multiple Rugged Radios models including M1, G1, GMR45, RM45, RM60, RDM-DB, RRP357, RRP360, RRP362, RRP364, RRP660, RRP660PLUS, RRP686, RRP696, RRP696PLUS, RRP5050, RRP6100, and STX. Radio and Intercom are not part of package.

TITLE: A Pillar Ditch Lights Antenna Adapter for Overlanding Adventure
DESCRIPTION: A Pillar Ditch Lights Antenna Adapter for Overlanding Adventure can be bolted to your current A-Pillar lightening, offering an off-road friendly antenna location. The adapter, made from high strength steel and finished with a tough powder coat, has an easy adjust design. This adapter is compatible with most A-Pillar or ditch light mounts and designed proudly in Arroyo Grande California. Easily bolt on and connect your antenna to be ready for your overlanding adventure.

TITLE: Antenna Mount for New Ford Bronco Driver Side View Mirror
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Mount for New Ford Bronco Driver Side View Mirror is a high-strength billet aluminum item with a black anodized finish. Specifically designed for off-road and adventure use, it keeps the antenna clear of roof racks and overhead tents, ensuring a precise fit for your new Ford Bronco (2021-current). Please note, for antenna cable and mount routing, drilling a hole in the side view mirror housing is required. Unfortunately, it does not fit Bronco Sport.

TITLE: Horizontal Roll Bar Antenna Mount
DESCRIPTION: Horizontal Roll Bar Antenna Mount, with an adaptable mechanism, can mount to any 1.5in to 2in roll bar. This offers antenna mounting options for most horizontal roll bars. Crafted with black powder-coated stainless steel, combining durability and aesthetics. Comes with two hose clamps for secure mount. A 3/8in hole offers standard NMO antenna mounting.

TITLE: A-Pillar Antenna Mount Ford F-Series Chevy GMC Silverado Dodge Ram - Driver Side
DESCRIPTION: A-Pillar Antenna Mount Ford F-Series Chevy GMC Silverado Dodge Ram offers a precise fit antenna mount for Ford, Chevy, or Dodge trucks. Features include high strength steel, direct bolt-on installation, tough powder coat finish, and off-road friendly placement. Options include drivers side A Pillar Mount, passenger side A Pillar Mount, or both driver and passenger mounts with one Adapter Plate. The mount is compatible with Dodge Ram (2009-2018), Ford F-Series / Raptor, GMC Sierra, Silverado, and Silverado 3500 HD. This universal mount may require slight trimming or modification of molding and/or trim pieces depending on make and model.

TITLE: A-Pillar Antenna Mount Ford F-Series Chevy GMC Silverado Dodge Ram - Passenger Side
DESCRIPTION: A-Pillar Antenna Mount Ford F-Series Chevy GMC Silverado Dodge Ram offers precise fit for Ford, Chevy, or Dodge trucks. Designed for off-road overland with direct bolt-on fitment to factory mounting points, no drilling required. Provides option for driver side or passenger side a-pillar mount with easy bolt-on installation and antenna connection. If A-Pillar or ditch lights present, universal antenna mount PN# MT-ANT-ADPT can be purchased. Composed of high-strength steel with tough powder coat finish, available as either a driver side, passenger side or both mounts with one adapter plate. Vehicle compatibility is wide, including Dodge Ram, Ford F-Series/Raptor, GMC Sierra, and Silverado. Some slight trimming or modification may be required.

TITLE: Antenna Mount for Ford F Series Trucks and Broncos
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Mount for Ford F Series Trucks and Broncos is a complete mounting solution specifically developed for square body F-Series Ford trucks and Broncos. The key features include Billet NMO mount and 7' NMO Cable with UHF Female Connector. This is compatible with Ford Bronco (1980-1996), Ford F150 (1980-1996), Ford F250 (1980-1997) and may fit other Ford cars and trucks. The antenna is however not included.

With its simple bolt-on connection, you can fasten your antenna and embark on your journey. This mount can only be used with Toyota Tacoma 1st Gen (1995-2004).

TITLE: Toyota Tundra A-Pillar Antenna Mount (2022-Present) - Driver Side
DESCRIPTION: Toyota Tundra A-Pillar Antenna Mount (2022-Present) offers adventure-friendly antenna mounting locations for easy installation, ideal for overland and adventure rigs. Bolt-on and connect your antenna for high strength steel, direct bolt-on installation, and a tough powder coat finish. This antenna mount enables precise fitment to factory mounting points, eliminating the need for drilling. You have the option to choose a driver side or passenger-side a pillar mount. The antenna mount is compatible with Toyota Tundra (2022-Present). Designed proudly in Arroyo Grande California.

TITLE: Toyota Tundra A-Pillar Antenna Mount (2022-Present) - Passenger Side
DESCRIPTION: Toyota Tundra A-Pillar Antenna Mount (2022-Present) allows easy installation and is perfect for overland and adventure rigs. Bolt-on installation and connection of your antenna is straightforward. This high strength steel antenna mount, with a tough powder coat finish, offers precise fitment to the factory mounting points without drilling requirement. Mount options include both driver side or passenger side a pillar. This mount designed in Arroyo Grande California is friendly to offroad placements and only compatible with Toyota Tundra models from 2022 onwards.

TITLE: A-Pillar Antenna Mount for Ford Transit Vans - Driver Side
DESCRIPTION: A-Pillar Antenna Mount for Ford Transit Vans offers a precise fit designed to be off-road overland friendly. It offers direct bolt-on fitment to the factory mounting points with no drilling required. Users can select between driver side or passenger side a-pillar mount, connecting the antenna fast and simply. The features include high strength steel, direct bolt-on installation, tough powder coat finish, and off-road friendly placement. This mount is compatible with the 4th Generation Ford Transit Van (2014 - present).

TITLE: A-Pillar Antenna Mount for Ford Transit Vans - Passenger Side
DESCRIPTION: A-Pillar Antenna Mount for Ford Transit Vans provides a precise fit for your vehicle, designed for off-road overland use. Direct bolt-on installation to factory mounting points eliminates the need for drilling, enabling easy and quick setup. Choose between driver side or passenger side a-pillar mount. It's made from high-strength steel and features a tough powder coat finish. This mount fits the 4th Generation Ford Transit Van (2014 - present).

TITLE: Third Brake Light Mount for Ford Bronco and Ford Trucks
DESCRIPTION: Third Brake Light Mount for Ford Bronco, F150, and F250 works with KC Hilites Cyclone 2.0 lights. Constructed of billet aluminum, this mount replaces the standard third brake light on OBS versions of these Ford vehicles. Compatible models include Ford Bronco (1992-1996), Ford F150 (1992-1996), and Ford F250 (1992-1997). Note that KC Hilites Cyclone V2 lights and mounting hardware are sold separately; recommended hardware is M10x20mm with washers and nylon locking nuts. Package includes billet aluminum mount and laser-cut gasket. Fitment may vary for other Ford cars and trucks.

TITLE: Can-Am Commander Intercom and Radio Mount - Rugged GMR25
DESCRIPTION: Can-Am Commander Intercom and Radio Mount supports Rugged Radios intercom and mobile radio installation in a Can-Am Commander or Can-Am Maverick. The package includes mounting hardware and a support brace. Notably, the product's dimensions are W 7-3/4in, H 4-1/2in. The mount is only compatible with older Can-Am Commander and Maverick models and not CanAm X3. It supports radios like Rugged Radios M1, G1, G4, GMR25, GMR45, RM45, RM60, RDM-DB, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, and Motorola models. The product also fits intercom models from Rugged Radios. Notably, the package does not contain a radio or an intercom.

Compatible with older Can-Am Commander and Maverick models, excluding the CanAm X3, the mount supports various radios like Rugged Radios M1, G1, G4, GMR25, GMR45, RM45, RM60, RDM-DB, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, Motorola CM300D and Motorola/Vertex VX2200. Intercom compatibility includes Rugged Radios RRP357, RRP360, RRP362, RRP364, RRP660, RRP660PLUS, RRP686, RRP696, RRP696PLUS, RRP5050, RRP6100, and STX. Radio and Intercom are not included.

TITLE: Custom Mount Development
DESCRIPTION: Custom Mount Development is the name of the product.

DESCRIPTION: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio provides ease in swapping your radio type in the vehicle and custom installation configurations, without removing the main mount. TITLE: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio - Icom F5021
DESCRIPTION: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio works with multiple Rugged Radios Multi Mounts and installations. This feature enables easy swap of radio types in vehicles without removing main mount. Also functional as standalone radio/intercom mounts for custom configurations. Convenient for easy installation and quick service access. Intercom compatibility includes various models of Rugged Radios. Radio compatibility includes models from Rugged Radios, Icom, Kenwood, and Motorola.

TITLE: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio - Kenwood TK7360
DESCRIPTION: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount enables easy swapping of radio types in your vehicle without removing the main mount. This product can also be used as standalone radio/intercom mounts for custom installation configurations. Compatible with Rugged Radios intercoms such as RRP357, RRP360, RRP362, RRP364, RRP660, RRP660PLUS, RRP686, RRP696, RRP-STX, RRP5050, and RRP6100.
