TITLE: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio - Motorola CM300D / Vertex VX2200
DESCRIPTION: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio is engineered for easy installation and quick service access. Upon installation in the main mount, the Multi Mount Insert enables straightforward swapping of your radio type in your vehicle without removing the main mount. You can also utilize the Multi Mount Inserts as standalone radio/intercom mounts for unique installation configurations. They're compatible with various Rugged Radios intercoms, including RRP357, RRP360, RRP362, RRP364, RRP660, RRP660PLUS, RRP686, RRP696, RRP-STX, RRP5050, and RRP6100. Suitable radio options involve Rugged Radios M1, RDM, RM60, RM45, GMR45, G4, GMR25, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, Motorola CM300D, and Vertex VX2200.

TITLE: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio - Rugged Radios RDM
DESCRIPTION: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio is designed for use with Rugged Radios Multi Mounts. When housed in the main mount, the Insert allows for easy radio type swapping in your vehicle without taking out the main mount. Additionally, these Inserts can function as standalone radio/intercom mounts for personalized installation configurations. The product is engineered for straightforward installation and speedy service access. It is compatible with numerous Rugged Radios intercoms and multiple mobile radio options including Rugged Radios M1, RDM, RM60/RM45/GMR45/G4/GMR25, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, Motorola CM300D and Vertex VX2200.

TITLE: Dual Radio Multi Mount Insert
DESCRIPTION: Dual Radio Multi Mount Insert allows easy servicing of your vehicle by using Rugged Radios Multi Mounts, even without the need for removing the main mount. They can also function independently as radio/intercom mounts for custom installation configurations. This product is compatible with specific Rugged Radios intercoms and a number of mobile radio options, specifically Rugged Radios M1, GMR45, RM60, and RM45. It is designed for quick service access and simple installation.

TITLE: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Rugged Radios with Rocker Switches
DESCRIPTION: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Rugged Radios with Rocker Switches is designed for use with Rugged Radios Multi Mounts or custom installation configurations. It provides four rocker switch slots for MAC Air Helmet Air Pumper Variable Speed Controller (VSC) or other accessory installation. The insert promotes quick and easy installation, service access without removal of the main mount. This mount is compatible with Rugged Radios M1 / G1 / G4 / RM60 / RM45 / GMR45. Note that rocker switches or switch plugs are not included with the mount.

TITLE: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio - Rugged Radios M1 / G1 / G4 / RM60 / RM45 / GMR45
DESCRIPTION: Multi Mount Insert or Standalone Mount for Intercom and Radio; for use with Rugged Radios Multi Mounts. Allows an easy swap of radio type in vehicle without removing the main mount. Can be used as standalone radio/intercom mounts for custom installation configurations. Compatible with Rugged Radios intercoms RRP357, RRP360, RRP362, RRP364, RRP660, RRP660PLUS, RRP686, RRP696, RRP-STX, RRP5050, RRP6100. Works with Rugged Radios M1, RDM, RM60/ RM45/ GMR45/ G4/ GMR25, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, Motorola CM300D, Vertex VX2200. Engineered for easy installation and quick service access.

TITLE: G4 AMPS Mounting Bracket
DESCRIPTION: G4 AMPS Mounting Bracket is specially made for Rugged Radios G4, offering additional AMPS mounting options for your GMRS radio. The mount's features include stainless steel construction and a black powder coated finish. The package includes the stainless steel mount and hardware. The mount is compatible with the Rugged Radios G4 Mobile Radio.

TITLE: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom - Rugged GMR25
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom ensures clean and easy installation for two-way mobile radio and Rugged intercom. The multi-mount plate, with 5 switch holes, replaces the removed center dash cover plate and is secure with 4 screws. Insert the radio and intercom into the plate, slide them into the mount and secure with screws. Compatible radios include Rugged Radios M1, G1, GMR25, GMR45, RM45, RM60, RDM-DB, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, Motorola CM300D, and Motorola/Vertex VX2200. Intercom compatibility extends to Rugged Radios RRP357, RRP360, RRP362, RRP364, RRP660, RRP660PLUS, RRP686, RRP696, RRP696PLUS, RRP5050, RRP6100, and Rugged Radios STX.

TITLE: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom - Icom F5021
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom is an easy-install mounting system. Eliminate center dash cover plate, and slice the dash directly down from the large opening. The Multi-Mount plate, complete with 5 switch holes, fits right back where the cover plate was, using 4 screws. Once the Two-way mobile radio and Rugged intercom are in the insert, secure it into the mount using another 4 screws. Compatibility-wise, this kit works with several models from Rugged Radios, Icom, Kenwood and Motorola/Vertex range. Not only for radios but it also fits intercoms from the Rugged Radios RRP and STX series.

TITLE: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom - Kenwood TK7360
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom provides a clean installation for Two-way mobile radio and Rugged intercom. The kit comprises a Multi-Mount plate with 5 switch holes for easy securement. Removal of the center dash cover plate and cutting the center dash behind allows simple installation. Compatible radios include Rugged Radios M1 / G1 / GMR25 / GMR45 / RM45 / RM60 / RDM-DB, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, Motorola CM300D and Motorola/Vertex VX2200. Compatible intercoms range from Rugged Radios RRP357 to Rugged Radios STX. The installation process is simplified by loading the radio and intercom into the insert, then securing with screws.

TITLE: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom - Motorola CM300D and Motorola/Vertex VX2200
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom offers simple, clean installation for a Two-way mobile radio and Rugged intercom. With a user-friendly installation process, the Multi-Mount System replaces the center dash cover plate, secured by 4 screws and has 5 switch holes. Then place the Two-way radio and intercom into the insert and secure them. Compatible with Rugged Radios M1 / G1 / GMR25 / GMR45 / RM45 / RM60 / RDM-DB Icom F5021 Kenwood TK7360 Motorola CM300D, Motorola/Vertex VX2200 and Rugged Radios ranging from RRP357 to STX intercom models.

TITLE: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom - Rugged RDM
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom provides a clean installation for Two-way mobile radio and Rugged intercom. Installation involves removing the center dash cover plate, cutting the center dash from the large opening straight down, placing the Multi-Mount plate into the removed cover plate's position, and securing with 4 screws. Two-way radio and intercom are then loaded into the insert which is secured in the mount with 4 screws. Compatible radios include Rugged Radios M1, G1, GMR25, GMR45, RM45, RM60, RDM-DB, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, and Motorola models CM300D and VX2200. Compatible intercoms encompass Rugged Radios models RRP357, RRP360, RRP362, RRP364, RRP660, RRP660PLUS, RRP686, RRP696, RRP696PLUS, RRP5050, RRP6100, and STX.

TITLE: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom - Rugged M1/G1/G4/RM45/RM60/GMR45
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom is a simple and clean system providing easy installation for your Two-way mobile radio and Rugged intercom. It entails removing the center dash cover plate and cutting the large opening at the center dash behind it. The Multi-Mount plate integrates into the space, secured with 4 screws. After loading the Two-way radio and intercom into the insert, slide the insert into the mount and secure it with the screws. This product is compatible with various Rugged Radios, Icom F5021, Kenwood TK7360, Motorola CM300D and Motorola/Vertex VX2200 radios, and a range of Rugged Radios intercoms.

TITLE: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom - Rugged M1/G1/G4/RM45/RM60/GMR45 with Switch Holes
DESCRIPTION: Polaris General Multi Mount Kit for Radio and Intercom offers a straightforward installation for a Two-way mobile radio and Rugged intercom. Removal of the center dash cover plate is easy, followed by cutting the center dash from the large opening down. The Multi-Mount plate, with five switch holes, replaces the removed cover plate, secured with four screws. The Two-way radio and intercom are loaded into the insert, which is then slid into the mount and secured with four screws. Compatible Radios include, among others, Rugged Radios M1, G1, GMR45, RM45, RM60, and Motorola CM300D. The kit is also compatible with various Rugged Radios intercoms, including the RRP357, RRP360, RRP364, RRP660, and the RRP686.

TITLE: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 - Intercom
DESCRIPTION: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 offer custom installation with an array of accessory choices. These include the capability to add 5 Rocker Switches, relocate the factory 12-Volt plug, and options to incorporate a Switch Pros 8 or 12 button controller. Two Flush Jack Mounts and three switches can also be installed. The panels are ideal for mounting a rocker switch remote head intercom or a Rugged Radios race or recreation intercom. The product comes with selected Lower Accessory Panel Mounting Hardware. All other accessories, including switches, are sold separately. Compatible only with Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2.

TITLE: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 - Jack Mount
DESCRIPTION: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 allow customization with numerous accessory options. They possess the capacity for adding 5 Rocker Switches and a hole to relocate the factory 12-Volt plug, perfect for mounting Rocker Switch remote head intercom. You can add a location for Switch Pros 8 button controller, Switch Pros 12 button controller, or 2 Flush Jack Mounts with 3 switches. They are suitable for the integration of a Rugged Radios race or recreation intercom. Lower Accessory Panel Mounting Hardware is included, but switches and other accessories are sold separately. Panels are bespoke designed for the Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2.

TITLE: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 - Switch Pros 12
DESCRIPTION: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 can be customized with various accessory options. Options include adding 5 Rocker Switches, a hole for the factory 12-Volt plug, spots for a Switch Pros 8 button controller or a Switch Pros 12 button controller, or 2 Flush Jack Mounts with three switches. There's also an option to add a Rugged Radios race or recreation intercom. The product packaging contains the selected Lower Accessory Panel and mounting hardware. Please note, switches and all other accessories are sold separately. Compatibility extends only to Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2.

TITLE: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 - Switch Pros 8
DESCRIPTION: The Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 offer diverse customization options. Options include adding 5 Rocker Switches plus a hole to relocate the factory 12-Volt plug, creating an ideal spot for your rocker switch remote intercom. Other customizations include adding a location for Switch Pros 8 or 12 button controller with a hole to relocate the factory 12-Volt plug, adding 2 Flush Jack Mounts and 3 switches, and adding a Rugged Radios race or recreation intercom. The Lower Accessory Panels include mounting hardware. Note, switches and accessories sell separately. These panels are only compatible with the Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2.

TITLE: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 - Rocker Switch
DESCRIPTION: Lower Accessory Panels for Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2 allow customization with numerous accessory options. One can add 5 Rocker Switches, providing a location for relocation of factory 12-Volt plug, perfect for mounting rocker switch remote head intercom. Another feature includes location for Switch Pros 8 button controller, and Switch Pros 12 button controller. Additionally, 2 Flush Jack Mounts and 3 switches can be added which are also ideal for mounting rocker switch remote head intercom. Attachment of Rugged Radios race or recreation intercom is also possible. Mounting hardware is included with these panels but switches and other accessories are sold separately. They are compatible solely with the Kawasaki Teryx4 and Teryx5 H2.

TITLE: Intercom Block Off Plate for Multi Mounts
DESCRIPTION: Intercom Block Off Plate for Multi Mounts lets you block off the intercom area in the Rugged Multi Mount simply. It is the perfect solution for cases where only an intercom is running in a SXS, UTV or adventure vehicle. Also, it provides an easy way to upgrade to an intercom in the future. You just need to attach this block off plate to your current mount using the two included bolts. It is compatible with all Rugged Mounts having a standard intercom slot (Non Panel Mount) and comes with mounting hardware.

TITLE: Slide-In Intercom Mount
DESCRIPTION: Slide-In Intercom Mount, meant for Rugged Radios remote head intercom bodies, provides secure mounting in all orientations. This mount allows the intercom to simply slide into place and stay secured with the included two bolts. The package includes the Slide-In intercom mount along with mount hardware. Compatible with Rugged Radios Remote Head Intercoms.

TITLE: Switch Panel Intercom Insert
DESCRIPTION: Switch Panel Intercom Insert seamlessly fits into the intercom slot on Rugged Radios Multi Mount inserts, allowing for additional three rocker switches to manage all accessories. Highlighting a black powder-coated finish, retention of durability and sleek look are assured. Steel construction guarantees long-lasting performance. The package includes one switch panel intercom insert and a set of mounting hardware for easy installation. Compatible with all Rugged Radios Multi Mounts featuring an intercom slot.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount for Rugged Intercoms
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount for Rugged Intercoms is a lightweight, powder coated, stamped steel bracket, offering a simple installation for popular intercoms. The durable and secure mounting made of black anodized stamped steel suits various dashes. Bolts accompany the intercom for mounting. Fits the following intercom types: 360, 362, 660, 660PLUS, 686, 5050, 6100, 696. The intercom isn't part of the package. Size: 5-11/16in W x 2-10/16in H.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount for GMR25 / ABM25 Mobile Radios
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount for GMR25 / ABM25 Mobile Radios, made for Rugged Radios GMR25 / ABM25, is a lightweight, stamped steel bracket. It features a black powder coated finish that is easy to install and comes with all necessary mounting hardware. The steel construction is durable and has outside dimensions measuring 5-1/8in x 2-5/8in. However, the radio is not part of the package.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount for GMR25 / ABM25 Mobile Radios with Switch Hole
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount for GMR25 / ABM25 Mobile Radios with Switch Hole is designed for Rugged Radios GMR25 / ABM25 waterproof radio. A lightweight, powder coated, stamped steel bracket makes installation clean and simple. A switch hole on the right side can accommodate any remote head intercom switch or standard switch for controlling accessories like power, comms, or lights. It is black with a powder coated finish, fits GMR25 / ABM25 radio and standard switch. The product is built using steel construction and comes with mounting hardware. Note, radio is not included.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount with Switch Hole for Rugged Intercoms
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount with Switch Hole for Rugged Intercoms is a lightweight, powder coated, stamped steel bracket that simplifies installation for various intercoms. The mount spotlights an intercom and switch position that can be flipped to relocate the switch. This black anodized, secured mounting is suitable for a range of dash designs. The intercom fastens to the faceplate with the provided bolts. The mount fits 360, 362, 364, 660, 660PLUS, 686, 696, 696 PLUS, STX, 5050, and 6100 Intercom with dimensions of 7in W x 2-5/16in H. Intercoms are not included.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount for Icom F5021 Radios
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount for Icom F5021 Radios is a lightweight, steel construction bracket with a black powder coated finish. This mount is easy to install due to its lightweight nature and comes with included mounting hardware. Exclusively designed for Icom F5021 Mobile Radio.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount for Kenwood TK730 Radios
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount for Kenwood TK730 Radios is a lightweight, steel bracket with a black powder coated finish, ensuring it's durable and aesthetically pleasing. Easy to install with included mounting hardware, designed specifically to accommodate Kenwood TK730 Mobile Radio.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount for RDM-DB Digital Mobile Radio
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount for RDM-DB Digital Mobile Radio is specifically designed for the Rugged Radios RDM-DB digital mobile radio with a clean and straightforward installation. This is a light-weight, steel constructed bracket, coated with black powder finish. Mounting hardware is included in the package, however, radio is not included.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount with Switch Hole for Rugged Radios
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount with Switch Hole for Rugged Radios is a powder-coated, stamped steel bracket that's lightweight and made for a simple installation. It has a radio mount plus a switch mount that can be flipped for either side positioning. It's black anodized, providing durable and secure mounting for different dashes. Bolt-included faceplate usage for radio mounting is also possible. Compatibility includes M1, G1, GMR45, and RM60.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount with Two Switch Holes for Rugged Radios
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount with Two Switch Holes for Rugged Radios is a lightweight, powder coated, stamped steel bracket designed for simple installation. It features a radio with two switch mount locations for quick access to accessory equipment. The durable, black anodized, stamped steel provides secure mounting for various dashes. Radio fastens to faceplate via included bolts. Compatible with M1, G1, GMR45, and RM60 radios.

TITLE: In-Dash Mount for Rugged Radios and Intercom
DESCRIPTION: In-Dash Mount for M1 / G1 / RM60 / GMR45 Radios comes with a lightweight, black powder coated, stamped steel bracket facilitating simple installation. The package includes mounting hardware and fits dimensions of 7in x 2-3/8in. The Panels function with the Multi-Mount System for Polaris Pro XP, RZR Turbo R, and RZR PRO R but are not compatible with the optional RCM-DMU for the ProR kit. Note: switches, PTTs, and other accessories are sold separately.

TITLE: Lower Accessory Panel for Polaris RZR PRO XP RZR Turbo R and RZR PRO R Dash Mount Radio and Intercom - Rocker Switch
DESCRIPTION: Lower Accessory Panel for Polaris RZR PRO XP, RZR Turbo R, and RZR PRO R Dash Mount Radio and Intercom allows for customization with many accessory options. You can add 6 Rocker Switches, a Switch Pros 8 button or 12 button controller, an 8 circuit Touchscreen SPOD or Switch Panel SPOD, 2 Flush Jack Mounts, a Scosche M8RIX controller or a Rockford Fosgate controller. Also, it lets you relocate the factory 12-Volt plug and add 2 Hole Mount PTTs. It comes with mounting hardware but switches, PTTs, and all other accessories are sold separately. Some limitations apply regarding compatibility with PTT-HM-SC-12, MT-PRO-SPDOD-B, MT-PRO-SPOD-T, and MT-PRO-SP8, for which PTT extensions or the PTT-HM-SC is suggested. The lower accessory panels only work with the Multi-Mount System for Polaris Pro XP, RZR Turbo R, and RZR PRO R but not with the optional RCM-DMU for the ProR kit.

These panels only work with the 2025 Polaris Mount. The RCM-DMU isn't compatible with the 2025 mount lower accessory panel.

TITLE: Lower Accessory Panel for 2025 Polaris RZR Pro XP Pro R and Pro S Radio Mount - Switch Pros 8

Note that switches, PTTs,and other accessories are sold separately. TITLE: Replacement 3.5mm Music Jack for Intercoms
DESCRIPTION: Replacement 3.5mm Music Jack for Intercoms is a replacement part specifically designed for intercom systems. This part provides connectivity options for music playback. Its 3.5mm specification ensures compatibility with a range of audio devices. The item serves as a reliable replacement or upgrade for existing intercom music jacks.

TITLE: NASCAR Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with R1 Radios
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with R1 Radios provides improved communication flexibility and clarity across racing platforms. This wired NASCAR communications kit designed for digital and analog communication features R1 Dual-Band Digital/Analog Radio and H42 Behind-the-Head Headset for better noise reduction. The product includes added protection with a ballistic nylon radio belt and an aluminum handheld radio box. This kit features clear audio and offers simple, reliable setup with plug-and-play installation. The kit also includes a driver kit with a communication harness, helmet kit, AlphaBud mono earbud, and a steering wheel push-to-talk button. The crew kit includes the same radio, an upgraded BTH headset, a handheld radio coil cord, and a quick-release buckle belt. Works with all VHF/UHF business band radios, compatible with many commercial radio brands.

TITLE: NASCAR Driver and Crew Chief Long Track Racing Kit with RDH16 Radios
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR Driver and Crew Chief Long Track Racing Kit with RDH16 Radios offers ultra-clear digital audio and superior durability for long-distance communication. Preferred for long-track racing, the RDH-16 UHF digital radio delivers clarity and range. The H42 Behind-the-Head headset provides superior noise isolation. Long-track upgrades like external driver and crew antennas ensure seamless communication. Features include NASCAR 3-Conductor Configuration, high-power UHF radio RDH-16, noise reduction headset H42, plug-and-play installation, clear audio from the AlphaBud mono earbud, and long-track upgrade with external long-range antennas. Additional protection is provided through the ballistic nylon radio belt and aluminum handheld radio box. The kit comprises RDH-16 UHF digital handheld radios, driver & crew long-range antennas, NASCAR 3C wired communication harness, radio jumper, Velcro-mounted PTT button, AlphaBud mono earbud, and radio box with universal mounting. The RDH-16 is compatible with all UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies.

TITLE: NASCAR Driver Only Racing Communication Kit with R1 Radio
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR Driver Only Racing Communication System with R1 Radio is a kit designed to deliver optimal digital and analog communication for racing teams. With the R1 dual-band digital/analog radio, it brings improved clarity and reliability across various racing environments. The equipment includes an R1 dual-band handheld radio, a NASCAR 3C wired communication harness, a NASCAR 3C wired helmet kit, and a radio jumper. It also features a Velcro-mounted steering wheel push-to-talk (PTT) button, a driver AlphaBud mono earbud, an aluminum handheld radio box, and a storage bag. The R1 is compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios on the same frequencies.

TITLE: NASCAR Driver Only Long Track Racing Communication Kit with RDH16 Radio
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR Driver Only Long Track Racing Communication Kit with RDH16 Radio provides ultimate long-distance communication through ultra-clear digital audio, and superior durability. The RDH-16 UHF digital radio featured in this kit offers clarity and range ideal for long-track racing. The professional NASCAR communications are optimized through NASCAR 3-Conductor Configuration. The kit includes a high-power UHF radio for improved range and clear audio achieved by AlphaBud mono earbud. The kit comes with an external kit upgrade for long-track comprising long-range antennas and race-grade coax cable. Additional features include plug-and-play installation, aluminum handheld radio box, and a free storage bag. The RDH-16 UHF digital handheld radio, NASCAR 3C wired communication harness, NASCAR 3C wired helmet kit and other essential components are included in the kit. The RDH-16 is compatible with all UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies.

TITLE: NASCAR Driver Only Communication Kit with V3 Radio
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR Driver Only Communication Kit with V3 Radio is an entry-level wired kit aimed at grassroots racers and weekend warriors. Offers reliable and cost-effective communication via V3 dual-band analog radio for essential in-race communication. It doesn't provide digital capabilities or long-range antennas. Its features include NASCAR 3-Conductor Configuration, Plug-and-Play Installation, and Clear Audio with the AlphaBud mono earbud. The kit includes V3 dual-band analog handheld radio, NASCAR 3C wired communication harness and helmet kit, radio jumper, Velcro-mounted steering wheel push-to-talk button, AlphaBud mono earbud, and ballistic nylon radio bag. Compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios on the same frequencies.

TITLE: NASCAR Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with V3 Radios
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with V3 Radios is an Entry Level Wired kit designed for reliable, cost-effective communication for grassroots racers and weekend warriors. This kit features the V3 dual-band analog radio for essential, in-race communication, an H41 Behind-the-Head headset for noise reduction and clear audio, and plug-and-play installation for a quick and easy setup. However, it lacks digital capability, long-range antennas, and the H42 premium headset. Included in this kit are V3 dual-band handheld radios, a NASCAR 3C wired communication harness and helmet kit, and a Velcro-mounted steering wheel push-to-talk button, among other components for both the driver and crew. It is compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies, including Icom, Motorola, and Kenwood business band radios.

TITLE: NecksGen Quick Release Helmet Hardware Kit
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen Quick Release Helmet Hardware Kit is a replacement kit compatible with helmets pre-drilled for HNR (Head and Neck Restraint). The kit, typically used for the NecksGen Original and NecksGen REV, packs: (2) M6-1.0 X 12mm bolts, (2) Quick Release, (2) Backing Plates, and (1) 4mm Hex Key.

TITLE: NecksGen REV2 LITE Head & Neck Restraint - Large
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen REV2 LITE Head & Neck Restraint is a superior safety gear from NecksGen designed for 3in shoulder harnesses. It provides unparalleled comfort with no pressure on the collar bone, thanks to its yoke-less design. This head and neck restraint displays a thin build that doesn't obstruct head movement or interfere with your helmet in any way. The REV2 Lite comes with a new adjustable tether system for improved safety, featuring rubber grip pads and high belt guides for secure placement. This lightweight gear, weighing only 1.2 lbs, has the same level of protection as the NecksGen Original and REV. Available in two sizes, the package includes quick-release helmet hardware, a tool kit, bonus decals, and SFI Foundation 38.1 Spec approval.

TITLE: NecksGen REV2 LITE Head & Neck Restraint - Medium
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen REV2 LITE Head & Neck Restraint represents advanced safety, offering superior comfort with the absence of a frontal yoke, ensuring no body or collar bone pressure. With a slim design promoting furthest scope of head mobility, it assures no helmet interruptions from front or back. Additional features of the REV2 Lite include an adjustable tether system, rubber grip pads, and high belt guides for sturdy positioning during multiple impacts. It maintains the same protection level and certifications as the NecksGen Original and REV, and is lightweight at 1.2 lbs. Available in two sizes, the NecksGen REV2 Lite accommodates all driver sizes. Quick release helmet hardware, a toolkit, and bonus decals come with each purchase. Sizes vary from medium, fitting necks up to 6 and large, suitable for necks wider than 6. SFI Foundation 38.1 Spec approved, but helmets are not included. Made with pride in the USA.

TITLE: NecksGen REV2 LITE Head & Neck Restraint - Small
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen REV2 LITE Head & Neck Restraint is a safety product offering advanced features for increased comfort while maintaining top-notch safety. The absence of a frontal yoke reduces pressure on the body and collarbone, with its thin design allowing unhampered head motion. This restraint, suitable for 3in shoulder harnesses, incorporates an adjustable tether system, rubber grip pads, and elevated belt guides for multidirectional impact scenarios. Despite only weighing 1.2 lbs, REV2 LITE maintains the requirements of NecksGen Original and REV certifications. Available in two sizes, medium and large, to fit different drivers. The package contains quick-release helmet hardware, a tool kit, and bonus decals. It's important to note that helmets are not part of this offering. SFI Foundation 38.1 Spec approval has been granted to all REV2 LITEs.

TITLE: NecksGen REV2 Carbon Head and Neck Restraint - Large
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen REV2 Carbon Head and Neck Restraint, the lightest available, carries the same certification and safety as all NecksGen restraints. The product's design is simple, small, and easy to use, maintaining similarities with the popular REV2 Lite. The adjustable tether enables quick slack and range of motion set-up, simplifying usage and eliminating concerns over seat angles or chest straps. The product fits most drivers, adjusting to suit teens and older, with a 3in harness width featured on all sizes. Quick release helmet hardware is included with all NecksGen restraints.

TITLE: NecksGen REV2 Carbon Head and Neck Restraint - Medium
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen REV2 Carbon Head and Neck Restraint is a leader in safety, providing a lightweight option for all users. The design is simple, small, and easy to use, maintaining the same certification and safety as all other NecksGen products. Notably, the adjustable tether provides easy adjustment of slack and range of motion without worrying about seat angles or straps around your chest. Just put your belts on and go! NecksGen REV2 Carbon accommodates most drivers, teens and up, with a 3in harness width. Additionally, quick release helmet hardware is always included with all NecksGen neck restraints.

TITLE: Military Grade Nexus Replacement Jack TJ-102
DESCRIPTION: Military Grade Nexus Replacement Jack TJ-102 In-Line Jack is equipped with Contacts Molded Into a Plastic Body especially configured for Larger Cable Diameter. This includes 4 conductors and is suitable for ruggedized commercial military use with an overall width and height of .828 in and length of 2.312 in. It boasts a contact diameter of .285 in and shell material of plastic. Nickel Plated Beryllium Copper serves as the contact material and adheres to MIL-C-9177 standards. The product incorporates pre-tinned over nickel plating terminals with contact resistance of < .02 O and insulation resistance > 1,000 mO. The dielectric withstanding voltage is M9177/3-1 U-92A/U and insertion force maximum is 13 lb with withdrawal force between 6 to 10 lb.

TITLE: NecksGen UTV Helmet Support for Recreation - Adult Medium
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen UTV Helmet Support aims for long-ride comfort and stability. Unpleasant experience with bouncing, bobbling, and swaying helmets can be eliminated by using this foam collar support. It aids in reducing muscle strain and preventing discomfort. This product, nonetheless, is not designed as a head and neck restraint, and does not provide protection in a crash-like scenario. Best suited for non-racing fields such as dunes or trails, the UTV Helmet Support curbs the bobble-head effect. NecksGen is a trusted name in head and neck restraint safety. The ideal fitment can be established through a simple three-step process: measuring neck diameter, a helmet bottom to shoulder top measurement, and finally by selecting the optimal option using the dimensions chart. Further considerations include whether the collar should cushion the chin or the helmet, tighter hold or maintaining natural head movement.

TITLE: NecksGen UTV Helmet Support for Recreation - Youth Medium
DESCRIPTION: NecksGen UTV Helmet Support for Recreation provides stability and comfort for long UTV rides. After long hours of bobbling and swaying, the weight of helmets can cause muscle strain, soreness, and discomfort. NecksGen's foam collar, designed for comfort, supports your helmet to help maintain focus on the road. This product is beneficial if you're not racing and need extra support the UTV Helmet Support helps prevent bobble-head effect. It is crucial to note that unlike a head and neck restraint, this collar does not protect in crash situations. For proper fitments, you need to measure your neck diameter and the distance from the bottom of your helmet to the top of your shoulder. These measurements help determine the best collar size using the UTV Helmet Support dimensions chart. Choices include the youth size collar for adults wanting chin cushioning, the thicker version for tighter head hold, and the thinner version for greater movement.

TITLE: NASCAR 3C Helmet Kit to IMSA 4C Car Harness Adapter
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR 3C Helmet Kit to IMSA 4C Car Harness Adapter adapts a NASCAR helmet kit to an IMSA car harness. Please note, NASCAR helmet kits are common grounded and may not be compatible with all radios. If unsure, please call.

TITLE: Nitro Bag for Nitro Bee Xtreme
DESCRIPTION: Nitro Bag for Nitro Bee Xtreme is purpose-built. This product holds your Nitro Bee Xtreme and has a split top for simple earbud or cable access. Designed for quick race official access and inspection, it features a rugged ballistic nylon construction and bright rubber Nitro Bee patch. Mounting options are plentiful thanks to a hook and loop strap that wraps around bars up to 1.75in. Additional loops permit zip tie mounting anywhere, vertically or horizontally. This bag offers unlimited storage and mounting solutions.

TITLE: Nitro Bee Xtreme UHF Race Receiver
DESCRIPTION: Nitro Bee Xtreme UHF Race Receiver, is designed for ease of use and loud clarity. An ideal choice for dirt track, circle track, road racing drivers, teams, and track officials, particularly where one-way race receiver is mandated. Nitro Bee Xtreme can also be utilized as training aid, providing one-way communications directly into a rider's helmet. This receiver distinction includes its included stereo earbuds and electronic speaker amplifier for superior voice clarity, fast USB charging and long lasting Lithium-ion battery, and a function that gives Race Control audio priority. It uses UHF Frequencies between 400-480mHz, both analog and digital, offers a clear backlit display, simple interface, an adjustable tone codes, the ability to scroll through preprogrammed channels or program your own, and a button lock to prevent accidental changes. The package includes Nitro Bee Xtreme UHF Race Receiver, Clear Hear Stereo Ear Buds, USB-C to USB charge cable, and a Belt / Harness Clip. This receiver works with UHF 400-480mHz frequencies and is pre-programmed with Rugged Radios UHF frequencies. A three year warranty is also offered.

TITLE: Sportsman Foam Earbud Speakers - Mono and Stereo - Mono
DESCRIPTION: Sportsman Foam Earbud Speakers - Mono and Stereo are foam ear-bud speakers suitable for racing helmets and scanners. They provide clear audio in noisy settings and help attenuate background noise. Their features include a mono or stereo connection, a 3.5mm molded plug, and clear audio speakers. Another notable aspect is their extra length cable of 48 inches. These speakers abide by Health Laws, meaning they cannot be returned.

TITLE: Sportsman Foam Earbud Speakers - Mono and Stereo - Stereo
DESCRIPTION: Sportsman Foam Earbud Speakers - Mono and Stereo offers clear audio in loud environments with its foam ear bud speakers designed for racing helmets and scanners. Customers get to enjoy quality listening experience that drowns out background noise. These buds come with a mono or stereo connection, a 3.5mm molded plug, clear audio speakers, and an extra-long, 48 inches cable. However, note that due to Health Laws, the item cannot be returned.

TITLE: Nitro Bee Xtreme Helmet Mount
DESCRIPTION: Nitro Bee Xtreme Helmet Mount allows for convenient and secure placement of your Nitro Bee Xtreme on your helmet. Its simple design with 3M Dual Lock fasteners ensures a firm hold, keeping the mount in place. Locking tabs provide added stability, ensuring your Nitro Bee stays secure even during intense racing scenarios, allowing you to concentrate solely on winning. Excess cables will be removed, providing a clutter-free setup.

TITLE: NMO Bar Mount Universal Antenna Bracket
DESCRIPTION: NMO Bar Mount Universal Antenna Bracket is a heavy duty construction providing additional mounting options to frame tubes. This rugged bracket works with tubes between .5in and 1in in diameter. Capable of mounting your NMO antenna either vertically or horizontally, it comes with a stainless steel mount and hardware.

TITLE: NMO Bulkhead with UHF Female Connector
DESCRIPTION: NMO Bulkhead with UHF Female Connector allows quick linking and removal of the antenna cable between your radio and antenna, offering additional mounting options for places that require thicker mounts, like roofs. The 3/4in height suits almost every vehicle and serves all race cars especially. With the NMO-Bulkhead, there's no need for a soldered or permanently installed NMO cable to finish your radio connection. The adapter comes with a 5/8in mounting hole diameter. If a cable ever gets damaged, it can be easily replaced and re-attached to the NMO Bulkhead. This product also reduces cable clutter in applications with infrequent radio usage like chase trucks. Compatible with Male-to-Male end coax cable: NMO-RACE-12C.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable Cap for NMO Mounts
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Coax Cable Cap for NMO Mounts provides rugged protection against various harmful elements like rain, mud, debris, and physical damage. Useful during vehicle storage without antenna, this ABS polymer threaded cap protects the NMO Mount. Critical to communications performance, it aids in keeping the NMO Mount rust and damage-free. Designed for race cars.

TITLE: NMO Bulkhead with Mini UHF Female Connector
DESCRIPTION: NMO Bulkhead with Mini UHF Female Connector replaces the bulkhead mount found in the 15 Ft Antenna Cable with Removable Mini 3/8 NMO Bulkhead Mount. This replacement features a mini coax connector and a traditional 3/8in NMO mount.

TITLE: 15 Ft Antenna Cable with Removable Mini 3/8 NMO Bulkhead Mount
DESCRIPTION: 15 Ft Antenna Cable with Removable Mini 3/8 NMO Bulkhead Mount offers zero performance compromises and ideal for almost any application, including UTV kits. Comes with X1C low-loss race-grade cabling and a one-piece, nickel-plated antenna mount for critical communication in harsh environments. The removable mini bulkhead simplifies cable management and servicing. Also includes standard PL-259 UHF connectors, a maximum mounting surface thickness of 7/16in, and a mounting hole diameter of 3/8in. Compatible with Rugged Radios, Kenwood, Icom mobile radios, and most mobile radios with a standard PL-259 connector. Note: Cable design doesn't support cutting or stripping.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8 NMO Mount - 13 Feet
DESCRIPTION: 13 Ft Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8 NMO Mount, upgraded with durable cabling and a nickel-plated brass NMO mount, is superior for secure, weather-tight connections. This popular 13' NMO cable mount option has a crimped NMO connection, offering reliability and durability. This cable functions for VHF and UHF applications and requires a 3/8in thread hole. For mounting applications on a thicker roof up to a 1/2in thick, a thicker NMO mount is effective. Over-tightening of the NMO nut or antenna to the NMO connector is not advisable.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8 NMO Mount - 15 Feet
DESCRIPTION: 15 Ft Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8 NMO Mount, a popular NMO cable mount option, now has durable cabling, a nickel-plated brass NMO mount, and 15' of total cable length. The Rugged Radios coax cable features a crimped NMO connection, creating a secure, weathertight connection for reliability and durability. Appropriate for VHF and UHF applications, this cable mount requires a 3/8in thread hole. It is suitable for mounting applications where a thicker roof is present, requiring an NMO mount up to a 1/2in thick. Over tightening of the NMO nut or antenna to the NMO connector is discouraged.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8 NMO Mount - 17 Feet
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8 NMO Mount is a preferred NMO cable mount option, upgraded with durable cabling and a nickel-plated brass NMO mount from Rugged Radio. The cable has a crimped NMO connection, providing a secure, weathertight connection for reliability and durability. The cable is suitable for VHF and UHF applications and requires a 3/8in thread hole. When using, you ideally want the coax cable length to run the distance from your radio to the antenna without leaving any excess cabling. Excess cable should run straight and not be coiled or overlapped. Rugged offers both 13', 15' (most popular for UTV applications) and 17' options. NMO antenna stud is not solid metal and can be damaged if overtightened.

TITLE: 15 Ft Antenna Coax Cable with BNC Connector and 3/8 NMO Mount
DESCRIPTION: 15 Ft Antenna Coax Cable with BNC Connector and 3/8 NMO Mount stands out as a handy tool for handheld radios. This 15' cable comes with a BNC Connector that pairs well with NMO Mount. For those in need of a radio antenna type conversion to match this configuration, an adapter can be found on our Antenna Connectors page. However, please ensure not to overtighten the antenna to the NMO connector.

TITLE: 3/8  NMO Antenna Mount - Replacement Nut
DESCRIPTION: The 3/8in NMO Antenna Mount - Replacement Nut comprises a 3/8in nickel plated NMO Brass Replacement Mounting Nut, plastic insert and o-ring. This product, sold individually, stands out for its unique features and quality.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - RACE SERIES - by Rugged Radios - 12 Foot
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - RACE SERIES - by Rugged Radios is purpose-built for racing and comes in 7', 9', and 12' lengths. With features such as heavy-duty triple shielding, X1C low-loss race-spec cabling, and a one-piece nickel plated antenna mount, it is designed for critical communications in harsh environments. Highlights include zero performance compromises, high-Vis cable jacketing, and standard PL-259 UHF connectors. Maximum mounting surface thickness is 7/16in, and it has a mounting hole diameter of 5/8in. It's compatible with Rugged Radios Mobile Radios, Kenwood Mobile Radios, Icom Mobile Radios, and most mobile radios with a standard PL-259 connector.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - RACE SERIES - by Rugged Radios - 7 Foot
DESCRIPTION: The Antenna Coax Cable Kit - RACE SERIES - by Rugged Radios is purpose-built for racing, available in 7', 9', and 12' lengths. This kit features heavy-duty triple shielding, X1C low-loss race-spec cabling, and a nickel-plated antenna mount, engineered to deliver critical communications in harsh environments. The high-vis cable jacket and standard PL-259 UHF connectors complement this kit, with maximum mounting surface thickness of 7/16in and mounting hole diameter of 5/8in. This kit is compatible with Rugged Radios Mobile Radios, Kenwood Mobile Radios, Icom Mobile Radios, and most mobile radios with a standard PL-259 connector.

TITLE: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - RACE SERIES - by Rugged Radios - 9 Foot
DESCRIPTION: Antenna Coax Cable Kit - RACE SERIES - by Rugged Radios, specifically designed for racing, offers three length options; 7', 9', and 12'. This kit showcases heavy-duty triple shielding, X1C low-loss race-spec cabling, and a one-piece nickel-plated antenna mount created to sustain critical communications in extreme conditions. Key features include zero performance compromises, heavy-duty NMO antenna mount, High-Vis cable jacketing, standard PL-259 UHF connectors, and a maximum mounting surface thickness of 7/16in. The mounting hole diameter is 5/8in. This kit is compatible with Rugged Radios Mobile Radios, Kenwood Mobile Radios, Icom Mobile Radios and most mobile radios featuring a standard PL-259 connector.

TITLE: 7 Ft Antenna Coax Cable Kit with BNC Connector for handheld radios - by Rugged Radios
DESCRIPTION: 7 Ft Antenna Coax Cable Kit with BNC Connector offers quick disconnection from a handheld radio, suitable for racing. The threaded, replaceable components permit easy servicing in the field. It comes with a unique threaded connection in the bulkhead NMO for easy replacement of antenna cable or NMO bulkhead mount. The built-in BNC connection enables connection to virtually any handheld using a BNC adapter. This durable design delivers race proven performance. Its key features include a threaded replaceable cable, 7 feet long RF shielded RG-58 Cable, nickel-plated brass NMO mount to prevent corrosion, and a UHF Male Connector. Bulkhead adapter and the antenna are not included in the kit.

TITLE: Suction Cup Antenna Mount
DESCRIPTION: Suction Cup Antenna Mount delivers more antenna mounting options. Built tough and swiveling, this can be mounted on any angle or non-porous surface such as clean body panels and windows. This is ideal for aluminum or fiberglass bodied trucks and vehicles that cannot use a magnet mount, chase vehicles and motorhomes when drillings into the roof aren't desired. Scosche developed this for Rugged Radios to offer durable and secure antenna mounting options when there aren't many. This requires a non-ground-plane (NGP) antenna such as Rugged Radios VHF-1/2W-SPR or the POINT5 and Rugged Radios NMO-MT-15, a popular NMO Cable Mount option with 15 feet of cable.

TITLE: 17 Ft Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8  NMO (TM) Thick Mount
DESCRIPTION: 17 Ft Antenna Coax Cable with 3/8in NMO (TM) Thick Mount is developed for vehicles with thick roofs. This solution strengthens your antenna for roofs up to 1/2in thick. Classy features include 17' RG58A/U cable length, 3/8in NMO Mount, and Standard UHF connector. Adjustment of connector needs are accommodated with a variety of available options. Thick NMO mount is not required for all mounting applications. Avoid overtightening antenna to NMO connector.

TITLE: NASCAR 3C Harness to Stilo Helmet Coil Cord Adapter
DESCRIPTION: NASCAR 3C Harness to Stilo Helmet Coil Cord Adapter enables communication wiring connection to wired Stilo helmets. Connect the white plug into your Stilo helmet's comms jack, then plug the red one into a NASCAR style harness, and you're race-ready. The white plug is for Stilo Wired Helmet while red plug serves NASCAR Radio Harness.

TITLE: N-TYPE Male Antenna Connector RG58
DESCRIPTION: N-TYPE Male Antenna Connector RG58 is a replacement male antenna connector specifically for RG58 antenna coaxial cable. This model is compatible with SWR UHF & VHF Antenna Power Meter. If a standard UHF connector is required, refer to the Crimp On UHF Antenna Connector.

TITLE: OFFROAD Car Harness to 3.5mm Stereo Ear Piece Adapter
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Car Harness to 3.5mm Stereo Ear Piece Adapter enables direct connection to STEREO earbuds via your OFFROAD interface, offering convenience for listen-only applications, passengers, and some racing environments. However, it's incompatible with MONO earbuds. Noteworthy is the Dura-Link Seal, a molded design element that establishes a sealed connection between the intercom cable and helmet kit plug for protection against water, mud, and dirt that might impair audio performance. The Dura-Link Seal is compatible with both current Rugged OFFROAD intercom cables and all Rugged OFFROAD helmet kits. Adapter is designed exclusively for STEREO earbuds.

TITLE: OFFROAD and STX SUPER SPORT Headset and Helmet Kit Adapter - Adapter for OFFROAD Cables
DESCRIPTION: The OFFROAD and STX SUPER SPORT Headset and Helmet Kit Adapter connects a SUPER SPORT headset or helmet kit to OFFROAD or STX Stereo cabling. It features a snap-lock 3.5mm Dura-Link female connector that offers a secure, waterproof connection to Rugged SUPER SPORT cabling and adapts them to your existing cables. This adapter is compatible with SUPER SPORT helmet kits and the H10-SPORT headset, offering a secure, press-fit connection. Choose from OFFROAD or Stereo XTX adapters to suit your needs.

TITLE: Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks - Single
DESCRIPTION: Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks is designed for Nexus style jacks. The plug is essential when disconnecting the helmet kit, safeguarding the female Nexus jack from water, dirt, and debris. Ideal during vehicle exit or weekend dust and dirt cleanup processes. It bolsters the longevity of your investment and maintains efficient communication operations. The OFFROAD plug without duralink has a separate product number: #OFF-PLUG-NW. Compatibility issues with STX cables and jack mounts are to be noted.

TITLE: Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks - 2-Pack
DESCRIPTION: Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks is an OFFROAD Plug for Nexus style jacks. Ideal for use when disconnecting helmet kits, it acts as a protective seal against water, dirt, and debris, especially during vehicle cleaning or outdoor activities. However, STX cables and jack mounts are not compatible with Dura-Link Cable Plug, and a version without duralink is available as #OFF-PLUG-NW.

TITLE: Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks - 4-Pack
DESCRIPTION: Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks is ideal for Nexus style jacks. Users can protect the female Nexus jack from water, dirt, and debris by using this plug when disconnecting their helmet kit. Apart from cleaning, it is also useful when the user leaves the vehicle. However, it is essential to note that STX cables and jack mounts are not compatible with this plug. There is an alternative OFFROAD plug without duralink, identifiable as #OFF-PLUG-NW. The plug ensures the efficient operation of your comms.

TITLE: Non Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks
DESCRIPTION: Non Dura-Link Cable Plug for All 4C OFFROAD Jacks OFFROAD Plug for Nexus style jacks, is used to keep the female Nexus jack sealed against water, dirt, and debris when disconnected from a flush jack mount. This plug is particularly beneficial when the vehicle is not in use or during cleaning. The aim is to keep your comms functioning efficiently. This plugin is recommended for use with jacks such as JM-S-FM-NXS, JM-D-FM-NXS, and JM-D-BM-NXS, where the Dura-Link skirt does not fit. The OFFROAD plug compatible with Dura-Link is #OFF-PLUG. Sold individually.

TITLE: OFFROAD Headset or Helmet Splitter Adapter
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Headset or Helmet Splitter Adapter allows splitting of OFFROAD connections among passengers. This simple splitter works well with helmet kits and Nexus OFFROAD plugs. Inspired by Mike Bergstrom.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with R1 Radios
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with R1 Radios provides a perfect solution for racing communication. This kit offers reliable, clear communication between drivers, crew chiefs, and spotters. Included in this package are powerful handheld R1 dual-band digital/analog radios, M1 noise-cancelling dynamic headset, push-to-talk button, and more. The Rugged Harness, built with molded jacks, high-bend test cables, and RF blocking, ensures interference-free communication. The AlphaBud earbuds deliver loud, crisp sound, enhancing the communication for drivers. Other included items are H42 Behind the Head headset, a ballistic nylon belt with quick-release buckle, handheld radio coil cord, aluminum radio box, wired communication harness, clear voice audio helmet kit, steering wheel mounted push-to-talk button, and a medium storage bag. The R1 handheld supports all VHF/UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies. Options for radio models include RDM-DB, M1, RDH-X, R1, V3, RM60, RH5R, RDH16, and various models from Icom, Motorola, and Kenwood.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired  Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with RDH16 Radios
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired Driver and Crew Chief Racing Kit with RDH16 Radios is a custom communication package for racing communications, offering clear, reliable communication between drivers, crew chiefs, and spotters. Designed for demanding racing environments, the kit includes powerful RDH16 UHF digital handheld radios, along with a dynamic noise-canceling M1 mic headset for optimal voice clarity. The package also boasts molded jacks, high-bend test cables, RF blocking for interference-free communication and is easy to install with plug-and-play connections. Clear audio is delivered through included AlphaBud earbuds. The kit further includes a quick-release ballistic nylon belt, handheld radio coil cord, an aluminum radio box with universal mounting, a car harness, a clear voice audio helmet kit, a Velcro-mounted steering wheel PTT, and more. RDH16 radios offer superior power and ultra-clear digital audio and are compatible with all UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies. The kit also includes a medium storage bag.

TITLE: OFFROAD Nexus Jack to IMSA Plug Adapter
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Nexus Jack to IMSA Plug Adapter allows connection of OFFROAD Helmet Kits to IMSA Jacks with an adapter cable. The blue Jack is connected to an OFFROAD cable and the black cable is inserted into an IMSA style Jack, preparing for race. The black represents IMSA Plug while blue signifies Offroad Jack. For IMSA to OFFROAD Adapter, IMSA Helmet to OFFROAD Adapter is used.

TITLE: OFFROAD to Peltor Helmet Kit Adapter
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD to Peltor Helmet Kit Adapter allows helmet kits with Peltor configuration to connect to an offroad MONO intercom efficiently. Notable features include Total Shield RF blocking for signal purity, a high-bend test straight cord for durability, and Peltor connectivity. This adapter is compatible with all Rugged MONO intercoms and headsets, and most 3M headsets using Peltor connections.

TITLE: OFFROAD Jack to Stilo Helmet Adapter
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD Jack to Stilo Helmet Adapter allows connection of OFFROAD configured communication wiring to wired Stilo helmets using the adapter cable. Connect the black plug into the Stilo helmet comms jack and the blue plug into an OFFROAD style cable for racing readiness. Black refers to Stilo Wired Helmet; Blue refers to OFFROAD Radio Harness.

TITLE: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit - Large
DESCRIPTION: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet has an OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit for comfort, safety, with additional headroom. Features a 20 offset fresh air hose inlet and a top air system that cools and prevents dirt from entering your eyes. Comes with standard removable cheek pads and additional sizes for ideal fitting. Sizes from XS to XL cater to various racers. It includes an inintelligentin Gray Matter liner and customisable cheek pads for perfect fitting enabling racers to focus on the race. It offers a large eye port for exceptional track visibility, with a durable 1/8-inch polycarbonate shield. This US-manufactured helmet kit is wired with Rugged Radios. SNELL 2020 Certified, the shell is constructed from a proprietary American space-age Carbon-Kevlar tri-weave composite. It includes forward-facing chin bar vents and a fire-retardant Kevlar chinstrap with a locking dual D-ring design. The .125in Clear Shield comes standard with a 3 position detent. It weighs 4.5 lbs.

TITLE: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit - Medium
DESCRIPTION: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit is built for comfort, safety, and overhead clearance. The OS20 features a 20 offset fresh air hose inlet that channels air into the helmet, ensuring cooling from top down and away from the eyes. The helmet comes with standard-width removable cheek pads, but offers a variety of thicknesses to customize fit. Helmet sizes range from XS to XL. The helmet liner, called Gray Matter, is covered in fire-resistant fabric. The OS20 has a large eye port for excellent visibility on the track, shielded by a durable 1/8-inch polycarbonate shield. The helmet is made in the USA with proprietary American space-age Carbon-Kevlar tri-weave composite shell construction. The chinstrap is fire-retardant Kevlar with a locking dual D-ring design. The helmet weighs 4.5 lbs and comes with a 3 position detent standard clear shield.

TITLE: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit - Small
DESCRIPTION: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit, designed for comfort and safety, has a 20 offset fresh air hose inlet to channel air specifically towards the top. This feature cools from the top down and deflects dirt from user's eyes. It offers standard-width removable cheek pads, but a range of cheek pads from thin to thick also exists, catering to nearly all racers. The OS20 also uses Impact's inintelligentin Gray Matter liner, a proprietary design with fire-resistant fabric. It provides a large eye port for superior visibility, covered by a durable 1/8-inch polycarbonate shield. The helmet is wired with Rugged Radios and handcrafted in the USA with a shell constructed of proprietary American space-age Carbon-Kevlar tri-weave composite. Additionally, it features extended chin foil, forward-facing louvered chin bar vents, and a fire-retardant Kevlar chinstrap with a locking dual D-ring design. It comes standard with a .125in clear shield.

TITLE: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit - Extra Large
DESCRIPTION: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet with OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit is designed for comfort, safety, and overhead clearance. Featuring a 20 offset fresh air hose inlet, it channels air for cooling and dirt removal from eyes. Customizable cheek pad facilities accommodate any racer, contributing to perfect fit and concentration on winning. Large eye port facilitates excellent track visibility, shielded by a heavy-duty 1/8-inch polycarbonate shield. The helmet is wired with Rugged Radios Helmet Kit, and is handcrafted in the USA. Product features include SNELL 2020 Certified Shell construction, a proprietary American Carbon-Kevlar tri-weave composite, extended chin foil, louvered chin bar vents, an intelligent Gray Matter fire-retardant covered liner, Kevlar chinstrap with locking dual D-ring design, and a 0.125in clear shield. Comes in sizes ranging from XS to XL, and weighs 4.5 lbs.

TITLE: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit - Extra Small
DESCRIPTION: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit is safety-oriented, offering a 20 offset fresh air hose inlet for air channeling. It includes standard-width removable cheek pads, with a variety of thicknesses available. Available in sizes XS to XL, this helmet features an inintelligentin Gray Matter liner for comfort and interchangeable cheek pads for customizable fit. An extended chin foil mitigates helmet lift and buffeting, while louvered chin bar vents face forward. It includes a large eye-port for enhanced visibility and a durable 1/8-inch polycarbonate shield with a three-position detent. Handcrafted in the USA, the shell features a Carbon-Kevlar tri-weave composite. Additionally, it includes a fire-retardant Kevlar chinstrap with a dual D-ring design and a helmet kit wired with Rugged Radios. Helmet sizes vary from X-Small (53-54 cm) to XX-Large (63-64 cm). The helmet is SNELL 2020 certified.

TITLE: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet With OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit - XXL
DESCRIPTION: Impact RACE Offset Air Draft OS20 Helmet (with OFFROAD Wired Helmet Kit) is designed for comfort, safety, ample overhead clearance and features a 20 offset fresh air hose inlet to channel air, preventing dirt from entering your eyes. Included are standard-width removable cheek pads, but various thicknesses are available. With helmet sizes from XS to XL, fitting can be customized to suit most racers. The helmet incorporates an intelligent Gray Matter liner, covered in fire-resistant fabric, and a heavy-duty, 1/8-inch polycarbonate shield. The Air Draft OS20 is manufactured in the United States, wired with Rugged Radios Helmet Kit, and is SNELL 2020 Certified. With a shell of proprietary American space-age Carbon-Kevlar tri-weave composite, forward-facing chin bar vents, and a fire-retardant Kevlar chinstrap, safety is paramount. The helmet, weighing 4.5 lbs., is available in six sizes as per the given measurements.

TITLE: Rugged Adventure Patch
DESCRIPTION: Rugged Adventure Patch, designed for offroad passion expression, features embroidered design and natural hues, ideal for hats, bags, or adventure gear. Includes separate hook and loop backing for flexible affixation. Measuring 2.5in diameter, the size accommodates all adventures.

TITLE: Pulse Bar Power Adapter
DESCRIPTION: Pulse Bar Power Adapter is designed for Polaris Pulse Bar, offering immediate connectivity from your intercom and Rugged Radios Master Communication System to the Polaris Pulse Bar. This adapter stands out with a waterproof connector and an inline fuse.

TITLE: 12 Volt Power Adapter for Rugged Radios and other Mobile Radios
DESCRIPTION: 12 Volt Power Adapter for Rugged Radios and other Mobile Radios Mobile Radio Power Cord with 12V Cigarette Lighter Adapter offers quick and easy power connections for various applications such as chase vehicles and base camp. By plugging into your cigarette lighter and mobile radio, you get instant power. Two 15-amp fuses are built into the power cord for safety. Although running power straight to the battery is recommended, this cord adds convenience. You can cut off the 12V adapter and run wires directly to your battery terminals, if desired. The cord is 6' 6in in length and made of 12 gauge wire. Compatible with RDM-DB (early model), RM25, RM45, RM60 Vertex radios, and most other radio brands.

TITLE: Mobile Radio Waterproof Power Cable Extension
DESCRIPTION: Mobile Radio Waterproof Power Cable Extension, a 24in power extension cable, is compatible with all Rugged Radios mobile radios, offering easy radio installation. Feature of this product is waterproof connectors.

TITLE: Sprinter Van Mobile Radio Power Cable
DESCRIPTION: Sprinter Van Mobile Radio Power Cable is a 9' extended length power cable specifically designed for Mercedes Sprinter Vans. Key features include rugged construction, waterproof connectors, an inline fuse, and a protective braided loom, making easy connection to your Rugged Radios mobile radio. The product package includes a 12in Power Harness for engine cover/dog house mounting and a 9.5' Extension for longer distance mounting or upper shelf location. Compatible with Radio models: G1, G4, GMR25, GMR45, and M1.

TITLE: 12 Volt Power Adapter with Waterproof Connector for Rugged Radios and other Mobile Radios
DESCRIPTION: 12 Volt Power Adapter with Waterproof Connector for Rugged Radios and other Mobile Radios Mobile Radio Power Cord with 12V Cigarette Lighter Adapter serves as a distinct power cord ideal for chase vehicles, base camp applications and more. By plugging into your cigarette lighter and mobile radio, it results in immediate power. It is crafted with two 15-amp fuses, and a waterproof power connector. This power cord can also be modified for wiring straight to the battery by cutting off the 12V adapter and connecting wires directly to the battery terminals. The product is 6' 6in in length, has 12 gauge wire, and has radio compatibility with M1 G1 GMR25 (late model) and GMR45 (late model).

TITLE: Positive Flow Men s Racing Catheter - Combo Pack
DESCRIPTION: Positive Flow Men's Racing Catheter - Combo Pack includes a comfortable male external catheter worn like a condom. The silicone material prevents any chance of latex irritation. Its design ensures no leakage or displacement, making it ideal for long distance racing applications. The catheters are available in three different sizes for a customized fit. Using the packaging card sizing guide, you can find an accurate size. The combo pack supplies all sizes to help you identify the best fit. Each kit contains three self-sealing catheters of various sizes. Additional contents feature a 48in hose with 1/4in ID, a hose fitting, and a product card. Positive Flow is latex-free, hypoallergenic, and designed for positive results.

TITLE: Positive Flow Women s Racing Catheter
DESCRIPTION: Positive Flow Women's Racing Catheter offers comfort and simplicity. With latex-free and silicone composition, the risk of latex irritation is eliminated. Suitable for long distance racing scenarios, this catheter stays securely without leakage if worn correctly. Premium features being latex-free, medical grade, and hypoallergenic accentuate its user-friendliness. The kit consists of a urinary pouch, four microporous adhesive strips, and one skin protective wipe.

TITLE: Switch Install Harness for MAC Helmet Air Pumpers
DESCRIPTION: Switch Install Harness for MAC Helmet Air Pumps comes with all necessary elements for powering your MAC Air Pumper through an easily operated, illuminated rocker switch. Built specifically for Rugged Radios MAC Air Pumper systems, this power harness facilitates quick and easy connections for powering your pumper system. It is compatible only with MAC Air, MAC-1X, and MAC3.2 Pumper Systems.

TITLE: Master Power Switch for Mobile Radios and Intercoms
DESCRIPTION: Rocker Power Switch for Waterproof Mobile Radios and Rugged Intercoms is an all-in-one power switch. This PH-MS-WP communications rocker switch simplifies your set-up by eliminating extra cables. It includes a 26in intercom and radio install harness with a pre-wired rocker switch. The power cord can connect both your radio and intercom to the same power source, controlled easily with a rocker switch. This waterproof incommsin switch is compatible only with M1, G1, GMR25, and RM25R-WP radios. The main cable length is 26in, and the ignition cable length is 18in. Allows setting of VOX & volume and can power the entire system on/off. Compatible with all waterproof Rugged Radios intercoms and radios.

TITLE: Power and Antenna Cable Harness for Jeep JT JL
DESCRIPTION: The Power and Antenna Cable Harness for Jeep JT, JL simplifies radio kit installation. Engineered for Jeep JL and JT, ensures a hassle-free installation. A custom fit grommet, included, fits into the existing firewall hole for a clean, finished look. An adapter accommodates old style T-power connector. Cable length is designed for driver side antenna mounting on Jeep JL/JT with our Driver Side Antenna Mount and radio installed using our Mobile Radio Mount.

TITLE: Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - No Intercom / G1 GMRS
DESCRIPTION: The product, Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio, is designed for a seamless and enjoyable riding experience. This kit enables easy communication between passengers, music listening, and staying connected with other cars in your group through an intercom that employs voice activation. It also facilitates stereo music enjoyment by dimming the music when passengers speak, ensuring undisturbed conversations. Equipped with high-output amplifier, it provides high-fidelity audio. The kit also comes with enhanced music controls for volume and shuffle control. It is powered by Bluetooth, allowing easy connection with your phone, GPS or other devices. It sports high output 2-way radios for long-range communication. Both M1 and G1 radios are integrated with high output amplifiers, finely tuned receivers, and encased in IP67 waterproof housing. There's also a radio-only option that includes the custom radio mount and mountable external speaker, excluding the intercom. The kit is inclusive of STX Remote Head Stereo Intercom, Helmet Kits, Intercom Cables, and active filter among others. Both easy to install and use, this communication kit is suitable for Honda Pioneer models from 2016 onwards.

TITLE: Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - No Intercom / M1 VHF Business Band
DESCRIPTION: Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio fits Honda Pioneer models from 2016 onwards. This complete communication kit offers clear in-car conversations, Bluetooth connectivity for pairing with phones, GPS and other devices for calls and music, and long-range vehicle-to-vehicle radio communication. Its custom Rugged Radios mount ensures a clean and factory-style installation. Built for high-noise, off-road environments, this system uses either M1 VHF Business Band or G1 GMRS radios, which are IP67 waterproof and rugged. It features VOX music-dimming, which automatically lowers music when passengers speak, and implements simple audio controls for quick volume and music adjustments. The complete kit includes intercom cables, push-to-talk options for both driver and passenger, a powerful M1 or G1 radio, antenna coax cable, and radio/intercom mount. Helmet wiring kits or headsets may be chosen separately. Radio licensing is required.

TITLE: Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - STX Stereo Remote Head Intercom / G1 GMRS
DESCRIPTION: The Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio, fitting Honda Pioneer models from 2016 onward, provides an ultimate riding experience. The kit enables easy passenger communication, music listening, and touch with other cars. The interconnected system allows seamless voice activation conversation and incredible stereo music listening. Music dims when you speak, facilitating free conversation. With Bluetooth power, pair your phone and connect to GPS or other devices. With the built-in high-output amplifier, this intercom guarantees audio fidelity for music enjoyment and the rocker switch conveniently controls music volume and shuffle. The system offers long-range communication via high-output 2-way radios. Select between the M1 or G1 to talk to other vehicles in your group; they feature high output amplifiers, finely tuned receivers, and waterproof housings. This kit comes with radio-only options that include a custom radio mount and mountable external speaker and doesn't include in-car communications. The STX Stereo Intercom is also part of the kit, hidden out of sight with all controls placed on the remote head rocker switch. The complete kit includes the STX Stereo Remote Head Intercom, helmet kits, intercom cables, PTT for driver and passenger, choice between M1 business band or G1 GMRS mobile radio, long-range antenna, radio/intercom mount, active filter, reusable cable ties, and all necessary resources for installation.

TITLE: Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - STX Stereo Remote Head Intercom / M1 VHF Business Band
DESCRIPTION: Honda Pioneer Complete Communication Kit offers Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio custom fit for Honda Pioneer 2016-Present. The kit provides in-car conversations, Bluetooth pairing, long-range radio communication, and features a custom Rugged Radios mount for a clean, factory-style installation. This system is designed for high-noise, off-road settings. Radio options are M1 VHF Business Band or G1 GMRS, both are IP67 waterproof and durable. Optional intercom - STX provides stereo music with Bluetooth and VOX music-dimming.Features include in-car communication, clear intercom audio, Bluetooth connectivity to pair with other devices, VOX music-dimming, quick adjustments of volume and music, long-range 2-way radio communication, and IP67 waterproof radio built for off-road conditions. The Complete Radio kit comes with STX Stereo Remote Head Intercom, Intercom Cables, Driver PTT, Passenger PTT, M1 Business Band or G1 GMRS Mobile Radio, a 15' Ft. Antenna Coax Cable, Long Range Antenna - POINT5 or VHF 1/2 Wave, Radio/Intercom Mount, Active Filter, and Packs of R-Wrap. The Radio-Only kit lacks the intercom features. Helmets and radio license are not included.

TITLE: Pyrotect SA2015 Replacement Helmet Hardware
DESCRIPTION: Pyrotect SA2015 Replacement Helmet Hardware is a comprehensive hardware kit that provides all essential items required for updating and replacing hardware on your Pyrotect helmet. Aligns perfectly with Pyrotect SA2015 helmets.

TITLE: Pyrotect SA2020 Replacement Helmet Shield Hardware
DESCRIPTION: Pyrotect SA2020 Replacement Helmet Shield Hardware consists of a full kit for updating and replacing face shield hardware on any Pyrotect helmet. This kit works perfectly with Pyrotect SA2020 helmet shields.

TITLE: Waterproof Power Plug Connector Kit (Female)  Upgrade or Replacement
DESCRIPTION: Waterproof Power Plug Connector Kit (Female) serves as a replacement for damaged or worn female power plug connectors. It's designed for various applications such as off-road, racing, and general radio. This kit offers a secure, waterproof connection for power cables and can be used to upgrade non-waterproof female T-connectors, enhancing durability and protection in harsh surroundings. Key features include a waterproof design that seals against dust and moisture and easy DIY installation. Extra components are included like a spare wire plug and wire pin. It's compatible with all waterproof power plugs with female connectors and replaces non-waterproof female T-connectors for increased durability.

TITLE: Waterproof Power Plug Connector Kit (Male)  Upgrade or Replacement
DESCRIPTION: Waterproof Power Plug Connector Kit (Male) allows easy replacement of damaged or worn male power connectors. Intended for off-road, racing, and general radio applications, the kit provides a secure, waterproof connection for power cables. It can upgrade non-waterproof male T-connectors and offers enhanced durability in harsh environments. Features include a waterproof design resistant to dust and moisture, and easy DIY installation for replacing or upgrading connectors. The kit consists of one male waterproof plug with a rubber ring, three rubber wire plugs, and three male wire pins. Compatible with all waterproof power plugs featuring male connectors, it also replaces non-waterproof male T-connectors for durability.

TITLE: Rear Seat Expansion Kit with Helmet Kits or Headsets - Offroad Mono / Ultimate Headset - Behind the Head
DESCRIPTION: Rear Seat Expansion Kit with Helmet Kits or Headsets is designed to expand two-person intercom system to four. The STX Helmet Kit features Alpha Audio and Clear Hear speakers, noise cancelling mic, and is easily installed. DESCRIPTION: Rear Seat Expansion Kit with Helmet Kits or Headsets allows expansion of two-person to 4-person intercom system, available in headset and helmet versions for STX Stereo and Mono Intercoms including 16' cables. DESCRIPTION: Rear Seat Expansion Kit with Helmet Kits or Headsets expands your two-person intercom system to 4 persons. DESCRIPTION: Rear Seat Expansion Kit with Helmet Kits or Headsets are designed to expand a two-person intercom system to 4 persons. TITLE: Rear Seat Expansion Kit with Helmet Kits or Headsets - STX Stereo / AlphaBass Headset - Over the Head
DESCRIPTION: Rear Seat Expansion Kit with Helmet Kits or Headsets is designed to expand your two-person intercom system to 4 persons. Options for STX Stereo and Mono Intercoms come with 16' cables.
