TITLE: GMRS and UHF No Ground Plane NGP Tuned Whip Antenna
DESCRIPTION: GMRS and UHF No Ground Plane NGP Tuned Whip Antenna optimize GMRS radio, delivering best signal performance throughout programmed channels. Measuring 12.5in, POINT5 antenna functions on frequency 406-470MHz, including GMRS. Mounting base includes silver soldered connections, gold plated push pin contacts, and an o-ring. Recommended placement is a metal roof for optimal signal performance. Proper placement and surface area preparation are detailed in our Tech Installation Guide.

TITLE: Rugged Mobile Power Female Water Proof to Male T Connector
DESCRIPTION: Rugged Mobile Power Female Water Proof to Male T Connector, a non-water proof radio adapter, allows connectivity to waterproof power switch and power filters. Each adapter includes Male Rugged waterproof and Female T-Connector.

TITLE: Power Adapter for Waterproof Connector to T-Power Connector
DESCRIPTION: Power Adapter for Waterproof Connector to T-Power Connector enables use of existing T-type molex power cable on a waterproof Rugged Radio. This cable facilitates adaptation of waterproof power connector to standard, non-waterproof T-type connector, eliminating hassle of re-running power lead. The adapter demonstrates compatibility with radios, filters, and switch plugs utilizing our waterproof power connector, including models PH-MS-WP, AUDIO-FILTER-WP, M1, GMR25, and others.

TITLE: Replacement Intercom Power Cord
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Intercom Power Cord is a cord specifically for all Rugged Radios intercoms. Its unique features are a 9' length, a standard molex connector, and ends that are stripped.

TITLE: Replacement Power Cable for MAC Pumper (12 ft)
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Power Cable for MAC Pumper (12 ft) is a 16ga cable featuring a waterproof 3-pin male connector and has a length of 12 ft.

TITLE: Replacement 8.5  Mobile Radio Power Cable with T-power connector
DESCRIPTION: Replacement 8.5' Mobile Radio Power Cable with T-power connector is an 8.5' length cable employing 12 gauge wire. Integrated into the design are two 15-amp fuses. This power cable is not just applicable to all Rugged Radios' brand Mobile Radios with a T-power connector, but also compatible with Vertex radios and most other radio brands utilizing a T-power connector.

TITLE: Wiring Harness for Variable Speed Controller (VSC) to MAC Helmet Air Pumper
DESCRIPTION: Wiring Harness for Variable Speed Controller (VSC) to MAC Helmet Air Pumper is a complete replacement wiring harness suitable for Rugged Radios Rocker Switch Variable Speed Controller or standard Rugged Radios Variable Speed Controller. Can connect to MAC Air, MAC3.2, or MAC-1X Helmet Air Pumpers, and is compatible with either the SW-RS-VSC or MAC-VSC1. Additionally, the Wiring Harness offers compatibility with MAC Air 2P or 4P, MAC3.2, and MAC-1X Helmet Air Pumper. Also, supports Variable Speed Controller models SW-RS-VSC and MAC-VSC1.

TITLE: Replacement 8.5  Mobile Radio Power Cable with Waterproof Connector
DESCRIPTION: Replacement 8.5' Mobile Radio Power Cable with Waterproof Connector is a power cord that comes with two 15-amp fuses built in. The cable, suitable for all Rugged Radios' brand Mobile Radios with waterproof power connectors (as depicted in photos), features an 8.5' length and 12-gauge wire.

TITLE: Dynamic Microphone Preamplifier
DESCRIPTION: Dynamic Microphone Preamplifier is designed for 150 ohm mics.

TITLE: Alpha Audio Speaker Pods - Velcro Mounting and Gel Ear Pods - Stereo & Mono 3.5mm
DESCRIPTION: Alpha Audio Speaker Pods - Velcro Mounting and Gel Ear Pods - Stereo & Mono 3.5mm, or PRO-POD system, offers an alternative sound option for helmets. This comes with padded gel ear cups with Alpha Audio Speakers, capable of function with any 3.5mm stereo or mono input jack. It pairs well with the Nitro Bee Extreme UHF Race Receiver or the Offroad Wired Helmet Kit. These can considerably improve communications by enhancing noise reduction. Key features include comfortable gel earseals, a 3.5mm input jack, and Velcro mounting. Particularly compatible with Impact helmets, other helmets might need modification for fitting.

TITLE: 2025 Polaris RZR Pro XP Pro R and Pro S - Complete Communication Kit with Bluetooth Intercom and 2-Way Radio - 696 PLUS Remote Head / G1 GMRS
DESCRIPTION: The 2025 Polaris RZR Pro XP, Pro R, and Pro S Complete Communication Kit provides a seamless system for in-car communication, featuring Bluetooth connectivity and long-range 2-way radio communication. The kit includes a custom Rugged Radios mount designed for Polaris, ensuring a clean, factory-style look. The system is built for high-noise, off-road conditions and offers an array of customizations - from the choice of M1 VHF Business Band or G1 GMRS radio (both IP67 waterproof), to an array of Intercom choices, Intercom Styles, and Mount Locations options. Interaction includes not only clear intercom audio for driver and passengers but also music and calls pairing with various devices. DESCRIPTION: XStack Tear Offs for Pyrotect, Bell Vortex, M4, K-1, BR-1 - 10205C by Racing Optics comes with patented laminated tearoff technology. Being 2 mil thick, this 10-layer tearoff stack suits all dirt racing applications. Each sleeve offers 3 stacks of 10 tearoffs, allowing for a total of 30 tearoffs per sleeve. TITLE: Handheld Radio Pouch

Unique strap system enables mounting on vertical or horizontal roll cage bars, MOLLE panels, backpacks, belts, handlebars, etc. High-quality materials ensure that your radio withstands rugged environments. Its thoughtful design makes it the ultimate solution for off-roading, hiking, or work purposes.

TITLE: R-Wrap - Reusable Cable Tie
DESCRIPTION: R-Wrap - Reusable Cable Tie holds securely while being simple to reuse and reposition, eliminating the need for the potential damage of cables from pinching, crimping, or over-tightening with traditional zip ties. This hook and loop strip keeps cables secure, reduces damage and ensures easy accessibility. For servicing a cable, instead of cutting and replacing a zip tie, you simply unwrap and re-wrap. Ideal for use in your vehicle or toolbox, these strips help you keep your cables and accessories organized. You get twenty 11-1/2in (292mm) long and 1/2in (12mm) wide strips per pack.

TITLE: Rugged R1 - Business Band Two Way Handheld Radio - Digital and Analog - Blue
DESCRIPTION: Rugged R1 - Business Band Two Way Handheld Radio sets itself apart with features such as digital and analog operation, enabling you to leverage latest technology while talking to race radios on both VHF and UHF frequencies. It offers an easy-to-grab attribute, hard-to-let-go feature, and a wide range of accessories to increase range, battery life and pairing with Moto and Single Seat kits. Intuitive controls, a simple keypad layout, and a customizable P1 and P2 button toggle make this radio easy to use. It comes with a large LED display and text messaging on digital channels. Equipped with a powerful business band frequency, this handheld radio features dual monitoring, a performance-tuned antenna, a rechargeable Li-ion battery, a 5-Watt transmitter, a lockable control centre and even a built-in safety flashlight. This radio works with all VHF/UHF business band radios as well as digital radios using the DMR platform. This radio is FCC and CE certified, though a business license is required for usage.

TITLE: 2 PACK - Rugged R1 - Business Band Two Way Handheld Radio - Digital and Analog
DESCRIPTION: 2 PACK - Rugged R1 - Business Band Two Way Handheld Radio - Digital and Analog is robustly built and tooled from scratch, accommodating Work, Race, or Play activities effortlessly. Its standout features include DIGITAL AND ANALOG operation, compatibility with race radios on both VHF and UHF frequencies, and an ability to pair with Moto and Single Seat kits for increased range and battery life. The R1's simplicity is accentuated by a user-friendly keypad layout and intuitive interface, the RT Systems software allows toggling between channels. It's equipped with business band frequencies, an LED Display, Text Messaging on digital channels, Dual monitor and Performance-tuned antenna. Other features include a Charge-on-the-go USB cable, Rechargeable Li-ion battery, 5-Watt transmitter, Built-in safety flashlight, 1 Touch FM Radio, Lockable controls and 1,024 Channel & 250 Zone capacity. TITLE: Rugged Air RA200 General Aviation Student Pilot Headset

Ideal for general aviation application, this headset leverages advanced technology for effortless usability. A must-have for contemporary pilots.

TITLE: Rugged Air RA980 Bluetooth Cell Phone ANR General Aviation Pilot Headset

The control module also allows Bluetooth auxiliary control for pairing, phone call answering, music volume adjustment, mode receiving priority for radio transmissions, and auto shut-off after 5 minutes of inactivity. Other features contain an EM56 noise-reflective microphone, 50mm stereo audio speakers, full-flex rotating boom, leather ear seals, carbon fiber ear cups and stirrups, adjustable stainless steel headband, 3.5mm audio jack, and lightweight design. The kit offers Race Series Intercom Cables that feature NEXUS style plugs, compatible with helmet kits and Race Helmets. Optional Digital Speech Processor Chips may be equipped on the intercom to eliminate background noise for clearer communication. TITLE: Ford Raptor Two-Way Mobile Radio Kit - M1-V - Business Band VHF
DESCRIPTION: Ford Raptor Two-Way Mobile Radio Kit is designed for rugged communication with models like GMRS G4, G1 and VHF Business Band M1. TITLE: Ballistic Nylon Radio Bag for Handheld Radios

TITLE: Aluminum Radio Box for Handheld Radios - Universal Mounting

There are 3 horizontal and 2 vertical mounting options facilitated by multiple mounting holes. Traditionally, bar mounts can also be used. The RBOX-XL provides a stationary radio seal. Dimensions are 3-3/4inW x 5-1/8in H x 2-5/8in D.

No hardware or tools are needed for the cover, which features dimensions of 6-1/2inW x 1-1/4inD x 2-1/8inH. The cover is also incompatible with the 696 intercom, for which a low-profile bezel is required.

TITLE: Radio Kit - G1 ADVENTURE SERIES Waterproof GMRS Mobile Radio with Antenna

Features also include active noise-canceling for advanced audio clarity, programmable, easy-access controls, large, bright LED Display, and upgradeable firmware. DESCRIPTION: Replacement 300 Ohm 50mm Foam Mount Headset Speaker is a single item, 50mm, 300 ohm speaker with foam mount. This speaker is not sold in pairs.

TITLE: Replacement 32 Ohm / 32 Ohm Dual Cone Headset Speaker
DESCRIPTION: Replacement 32 Ohm / 32 Ohm Dual Cone Headset Speaker is a dual cone replacement speaker designed for split audio applications. This 50mm speaker is perfect for dual radio or additional scanner listening, eliminating issues of connecting two power sources to one speaker. The speaker can easily be installed in most behind-the-head and over-the-head style headsets with two posts. Specifications include a frequency response of 100Hz to 8 kHz, a sensitivity level of 95+/-5 dB SPL (at 1 kHz, 1 mW input per earcup side) when at full volume on an ear simulator. Impedance stands at 32 ohm / 32 ohm with a rate input of 100mW and a max input of 250mW.

TITLE: Replacement 32 Ohm 50mm Headset Speaker
DESCRIPTION: Replacement 32 Ohm 50mm Headset Speaker offers speaker replacement for headsets. Notably, the specifications include 50mm size and 32 OHM resistance.

TITLE: Replacement Speakers for BT2 Bluetooth Headset
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Speakers for BT2 Bluetooth Headset features two wired, hook and loop mounted speakers complete with BT2 connector. This kit serves as a direct replacement for the BT2 Bluetooth Headset.

TITLE: Intercom Headsets / Helmet 5 Pin Port Splitter Cable
DESCRIPTION: Intercom Headsets / Helmet 5 Pin Port Splitter Cable permits the addition of a 5th person to an existing 4 person intercom system through a simple connection process. Incorporating an extra intercom cable to one of your inCREWin ports expands your system. A 16ft cable is suggested for back seat passengers.

TITLE: External Push to Talk (PTT) Adapter Cable for 5 Pin Ports
DESCRIPTION: External Push to Talk (PTT) Adapter Cable for 5 Pin Ports allows addition of a Push to Talk to your 5 pin radio or intercom port. Ideal for adding an external PTT on RRP362, 362-BT and 364-BT intercoms. Can also adapt a secondary PTT to your 5 pin intercom headset / helmet port. Can be used with: PTT-VM2 PTT-HM for enhanced communication.

TITLE: Dual AUX Port Splitter Cable for Intercoms
DESCRIPTION: Dual AUX Port Splitter Cable for Intercoms splits your intercom's AUX auxiliary port, enabling two accessories on a single intercom. This cable enables wireless Bluetooth music streaming through your intercom and records audio to an external digital camera with WM1-6P and CS-MUSIC-REC.

TITLE: 3.5mm Mono Plug Y-Splitter for External Speakers
DESCRIPTION: The 3.5mm Mono Plug Y-Splitter for External Speakers, allows easy connection of 2 listen-only headsets or an external speaker with its 3.5mm plug to (2) 3.5mm jacks Y-Adapter. This fully shielded, full molded nickel plated assembly with 1 male to 2 female configuration has a total length of 6in. The conductor is mono.

TITLE: DUAL RADIO Splitter  - Connect  2 Radios with  1 Listen Only and 1 Transmit and Receive
DESCRIPTION: DUAL RADIO Splitter allows connection of two radios - one for solely listening and another for both transmission and listening at the same time. This makes it perfect for single seat offroad communications between driver and spotter, and between race control and driver. With this splitter, simultaneous transmission and listening become possible. A tan cable facilitates listening, while a black cable enables transmission and listening. Compatibility of this splitter includes Rugged Radios (RH-5R, V3, R1 and RDH16), numerous Kenwood models, HYT TC620, and TC700EX and several Relm models (RPV516A, RPV599A, PLUS, RPU416A, RPU499A PLUS).

TITLE: SUPER SPORT Male to OFFROAD Female Adapter
DESCRIPTION: SUPER SPORT Male to OFFROAD Female Adapter connects an OFFROAD Nexus headset or helmet kit to SUPER SPORT cabling. Features include a snap-lock 3.5mm Dura-Link male connector providing a secure and waterproof connection. This adapter also adapts to OFFROAD Nexus cabling enabling the use of traditional OFFROAD headsets and helmet kits with lightweight SUPER SPORT cabling. Also highlights a secure, press-fit connection.

TITLE: Crew Chief - H42 Spotter Headset and Rugged Handheld Radio Package - Dual Radio / R1 Business Band Handheld - Digital and Analog / Blue
DESCRIPTION: Crew Chief - H42 Spotter Headset and Rugged Handheld Radio Package is specifically developed for Crew Chiefs and spotters. The package combines Rugged Radio's H42 headset, a coiled headset jumper cable, and a handheld radio. The kit suits NASCAR, IMSA circle track, and road racing clear communications needs. There are two radio options, the completely digital 16-channel RDH for ultra-clear communication, or the R1 with dual band, digital and analog operation. Digital technology enables ultra-clear sound, allowing analog mode for compatibility with standard analog radios. The RDH16 is preferred for power, performance, and ease. The R1 includes both UHF and VHF operation with accessories to expand your radio range off the track. Included are three kit options: Single Radio, Dual Radio, and Single Radio with Nitro Bee X. Features include easy setup with a single cable connection, headset PTT, volume knob, dynamic noise cancelling mic, dual band Radio, available accessories, and button lock. The package includes RDH16 UHF or R1 Dual Band Digital/Analog Handheld Radio, H42 Behind the Head Headset, and Radio-to-Headset Coil Cord. R1 and RDH-16U are compatible with VHF/UHF and UHF business band radios respectively.

TITLE: Crew Chief - H42 Spotter Headset and Rugged Handheld Radio Package - Dual Radio / R1 Business Band Handheld - Digital and Analog / Safety Yellow
DESCRIPTION: Crew Chief - H42 Spotter Headset and Rugged Handheld Radio Package is specifically designed for Crew Chiefs and spotters. This kit is inclusive of Rugged Radio's H42 headset, coiled headset jumper cable, and handheld radio, aiming to provide clear communications for NASCAR and IMSA circle track and road racing crew chiefs and spotters. You may opt for the fully digital 16-channel RDH for ultra-clear communication or the common dual band R1 with digital and analog operation. The RDH16 radio provides power and performance with easy operation and digital technology for ultra-clear communication along with analog mode for compatibility with standard analog radios. The R1 offers UHF and VHF operation with many accessories to extend radio usability on and off the track. Kit options: Single Radio, Dual Radio and Single Radio with Nitro Bee X. Features include easy setup, headset PTT, volume control, DNC Mic, Dual Band operation and Button Lock. Radio models include R1, RDM-DB, M1, RDH-X, V3, RM60, RH5R, RDH16, as well as Icom, Motorola, Kenwood business band radios and more. Requires a business license.

TITLE: Mercedes Sprinter Van Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - G1 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: The Mercedes Sprinter Van Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit is designed for rugged communication. Available in models  GMR25, G4, and G1, these radios offer miles of communication with incredible clarity and reliability. They are designed for tough trails and remote landscapes. The radio kit features exceptional range and clarity, a durable GMRS antenna for peak performance in harsh environments, and an easy-to-install system with all hardware and mounts included. The antenna mount offers a direct bolt-on fit to factory mounting points with no drilling required. The kit also includes a Rugged Ready pigtail cable for integration with intercoms, headsets, or any 5-pin accessories. Universally compatible with GMRS radios from top brands like Motorola, Midland, and Uniden. The kit includes radio options from the waterproof G1, durable G4, or the waterproof GMR25, premium GMRS-tuned antenna, heavy-duty antenna cable, passenger-side antenna mount, and mobile radio mount. It's compatible with all GMRS radios, including Rugged GMR45, GMR25, GMR2, and GMR2 PLUS, and also with FRS radios on channels 1-7 and 15-22. Aimed at enthusiasts and outdoor adventurers  a reliable communication partner for any journey.

TITLE: Mercedes Sprinter Van Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - Rambler G4
DESCRIPTION: Mercedes Sprinter Van Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit is designed for ultimate rugged communication, suitable for the toughest trails and remote landscapes. The kit, available in three models - GMR25, G4, and G1, offers exceptional range and clarity. The package comes with a reliable, rugged-tuned GMRS antenna designed to withstand harsh environments while delivering peak performance. Also, it includes a low-loss, double-shielded antenna cable for boosting signal strength and clarity. This radio kit is user-friendly with quick and simple installation that requires no special tools. Already included are all mounts and hardware for Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Vans and Sprinter Van based conversions like the Winnebago Revel. The kit provides adventure-ready antenna mounting on the passenger side that requires no drilling. It also includes an antenna adapter mount for pillar light mounts. You can easily integrate it with intercoms, headsets, or any 5-pin accessories using the built-in Rugged Ready pigtail cable. The system is universally compatible, communicating with all GMRS and FRS radios. The kit includes radio options, a rugged antenna, heavy-duty antenna cable, passenger-side antenna mount, mobile radio mount. It is primarily compatible with Mercedes Sprinter Van (2007-present) and all GMRS radios. It's built for enthusiasts and outdoor adventurers to provide reliable, go-anywhere communication.

TITLE: Mercedes Sprinter Van Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit - GMR25 Waterproof
DESCRIPTION: The Mercedes Sprinter Van Two-Way GMRS Mobile Radio Kit features three models like GMR25, G4, and G1. They are designed for challenging trails and offer exceptional range and clarity. The GMRS-specific antenna, designed to withstand harsh environments, yields peak performance and clarity with a low-loss, double-shielded cable. The installation process is quick and simple with the provided hardware and mounts for the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Vans and associated conversions like the Winnebago Revel from 2007 to the present. A direct bolt-on fitment for factory mounting points is available with the passenger side antenna mount requiring no drilling. An antenna adapter mount applicable to A-pillar overland adventure lights is included. Built-in connectivity enables the easy incorporation of intercoms, headsets, or 5-pin accessories. The kit is universally compatible with all GMRS and FRS radios, including brands like Motorola, Midland, and Uniden. The kit includes varying models of radio, a premium GMRS tuned antenna, a 13' heavy-duty antenna cable, the passenger-side antenna mount, mobile radio mount, and is compatible with 2007-present Mercedes Sprinter Vans and all GMRS radios from various manufacturers. This radio kit combines rugged durability, easy installation, and universal GMRS compatibility, making it an essential for any explorer or adventurer.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired  Driver Only Communication Kit without Radio
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit is ideal for seamless race communications. Designed to pair with your existing radio, this kit is customized for driver-only applications. Included in the package are a helmet kit, AlphaBud earbuds, a push-to-talk button, and an optional handheld radio. The wired 2-Pin design is ready for connection with Rugged or Kenwood radios. The moulded jacks and high-bend test cables of the Rugged Harness, along with Total Shield RF, block any interferences for clear communication. The kit also includes a wired communication harness, a helmet kit, a jump wire connecting the handheld radio to the harness, and a Velcro-mounted steering wheel push-to-talk button. The AlphaBud earbuds deliver clear audio for effective communication.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with R1 Radio - Kit with Helmet Speakers
DESCRIPTION: The RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with R1 Radio is a dedicated racing solution. It ensures team communication till the finish line by combining UHF and VHF dual-band capability with digital and analog operation. Specially created for drivers, this offering provides consistent communication, with racing-specific configuration and R1 digital/analog dual band radio. Its rugged harness has molded jacks, high-bend test cables, and Total Shield RF blocking for interference-free communication. AlphaBud earbuds enhance communication by delivering loud, clear sound. The kit items consist of an R1 dual-band handheld radio, aluminum radio box with universal mounting, a wired communication harness, a rugged wired helmet kit with mic and 3.5mm jack, radio jumper, and a Velcro-mounted steering wheel with PTT. It works with all VHF/UHF business band radios operating on corresponding frequencies.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with RDH16 Radio - Kit with Earbuds
DESCRIPTION: RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with RDH16 Radio, ideal for racing communications. With superior power and ultra-clear digital audio, RDH16 delivers unmatched clarity on the track. The kit maintains compatibility with analog systems, while ensuring the best digital sound quality. Tailored for driver-only applications, this custom package includes a helmet kit, AlphaBud earbuds, push-to-talk button, and an optional handheld radio for seamless communication. Features include a racing-specific configuration, powerful RDH16 UHF digital radio, rugged harness with molded jacks, high-bend test cables, and Total Shield RF blocking. The AlphaBud earbuds deliver loud, crisp audio. Also included are a handheld radio, radio box, wired communication harness, and push-to-talk button. Works with all UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies.

TITLE: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - Behind-the-Head H42 Ultimate Headset
DESCRIPTION: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio features a powerful digital mobile radio, optimal for any track requiring significant radio power and distance. Designed for short course, sand rails, sand cars, trophy karts, UTV, mega trucks, and all off-road racing, the kit allows transmission to crew chief, mechanic, support team, or base camp via PTT (Push-to-Talk). M1 mobile radio is compatible with all digital and analog VHF radios, and DMR digital radios: Motorola, Rugged, etc. Key components are top-tier ensuring quality communication. Dimensions are 5.5inW x 6.75inD x 2inH Front/ 1.5in H Back. Includes VHF 1/2 Wave Spring Antenna, Uni-Mag NMO Mount, Single Seat Car Harnesses, Velcro Mount PTT, headset or helmet kit option, and iPod/MP3 Music Cable. Requires a business license. Installation guides are available.

TITLE: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - AlphaBass Headset
DESCRIPTION: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio provides ultimate performance on any track with its powerful digital mobile radio. Designed for short course, sand rails, trophy karts, UTV, mega trucks, and offroad racing. This kit enables you to transmit to your crew chief, mechanic, support team, or base camp via PTT (Push-to-Talk). M1 mobile radio offers compatibility with all digital & analog VHF radios and all DMR digital radios such as Motorola, Rugged, etc. Easy installation and high-quality components assure effective communication. Kit includes a powerful digital mobile radio, VHF 1/2 Wave Spring Antenna, Uni-Mag NMO Mount, Single Seat Car Harnesses, Velcro Mount PTT, a choice of headset or helmet kit, and iPod/MP3 Music Cable. Business License required.

TITLE: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - Helmet Kit
DESCRIPTION: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio delivers ultimate performance on any track where radio power and distance are necessary. Ideal for short course, sand rails, sand cars, trophy karts, UTV, mega trucks, and offroad racing. The kit lets the driver transmit to crew chief, mechanic, support team, or base camp through PTT feature. Compatible with all digital, analog VHF radios, and all DMR digital radios including Motorola, Rugged. Ensures ease of installation and elite quality. The package comprises of a digital mobile radio, VHF 1/2 Wave Spring Antenna, Uni-Mag NMO Mount, Single Seat Car Harnesses, Velcro Mount PTT, choice of headset or helmet kit and iPod/MP3 Music Cable. TITLE: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - Over-the-Head H22 Ultimate Headset
DESCRIPTION: Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio, used on short course, sand rails, sand cars, trophy karts, UTV, mega trucks, and offroad racing, lets you transmit through PTT (Push-to-Talk) to your crew chief, mechanic, or support team. Compatible with all digital and analog VHF radios and DMR digital radios like Motorola, Rugged. Easy installation and top components ensure excellent communication. Kit includes a powerful digital mobile radio, VHF 1/2 Wave Spring Antenna, Uni-Mag NMO mount, single seat car harnesses, velcro mount PTT, and your choice of headset or helmet kit. Also supplied with an iPod/MP3 Music Cable. Business License required.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with R1 Radio - Kit with Earbuds
DESCRIPTION: The RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with R1 Radio, geared for racing communications, promotes team connectivity and efficient communication, made possible through its UHF/VHF dual-band capability, supplemented with digital/analog dual band radio (R1). Elements such as molded jacks, high-bend test cables, Total Shield RF blocking, and AlphaBud earbuds assure interference-free communication and clear, crisp sounds, respectively. The SS-R1 package includes an R1 Dual Band Radio, an Aluminum handheld radio box, a wired communication harness, a rugged wired helmet kit, and a Velcro-mounted steering wheel Push-to-Talk button. The SS-KIT-R1 package offers similar features with added Alpha audio speakers. For versatile operation, this kit is compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios on similar frequencies such as RDM-DB, M1, RDH-X, R1, V3, RM60, etc.

TITLE: RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with RDH16 Radio - Kit with Helmet Speakers
DESCRIPTION: The RUGGED Wired Driver Only Communication Kit with RDH16 Radio is a race communications solution, enabling connection with your team all the way to the podium. Preferred by racers, the RDH16 offers superior power, ultra-clear digital audio, an easy-to-use 16-channel design, and compatibility with analog systems. The custom package includes a helmet kit, AlphaBud earbuds, push-to-talk button, and an optional handheld radio, ideal for driver-only applications. The RDH16 radio displays strong performance, with the Rugged Harness providing molded jacks, high-bend test cables, and Total Shield RF blocking for interference-free communication. AlphaBud earbuds deliver clear audio for driver communication, and the push-to-talk button allows for clear communication. All UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies are compatible with RDH.

TITLE: Single Seat Bluetooth Module
DESCRIPTION: Single Seat Bluetooth Module SS-WM1 ensures Bluetooth connectivity for music streaming and cell phone calls, alongside connections to a two-way radio for comprehensive communication. With an uncomplicated interface and actions such as play, pause, answer, and disconnect managed via a singular button, user-friendly operation is secure. Features include a front-facing Audio Out port compatible with GoPro or equivalent audio recording, a rear connection supporting a single headset or helmet kit, and a PTT connection for two-way radio usage. Wireless connection to Bluetooth devices promises 40' range, clear audio streaming, ease of pairing, and automatic muting of music during radio transmissions or receptions. SS-WM1 is ideal for solo riders or individuals seeking simplistic communication solutions. Installation guides and the user manual are available.

TITLE: SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - Behind-the-Head H42 Ultimate
DESCRIPTION: SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio provides Bluetooth connectivity for music streaming and cell phone calls plus it connects to a two way radio for full communication. The M1 mobile radio works with digital and analog VHF radios, and DMR digital radios such as Motorola and Rugged. The SS-WM1 has a simple interface for easy operation, with a front button for play, pause, answer, and disconnect functions. It also has a front facing Audio Out port and rear connectivity to a single headset or helmet kit, plus a PTT connection for two-way radio. It has wireless connection to Bluetooth devices with up to a 40' range, clear streaming audio and automatically mutes music for transmission or reception from radio. The M1 features include a waterproof, IP67 sealed housing, superior digital audio clarity, digital / analog VHF band mobile transceiver, and a powerful Mitsubishi Transmit (TX) amplifier.

TITLE: SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - AlphaBass Headset
DESCRIPTION: The product is the SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio, perfect for single seat applications. Linking to your mobile for music streaming and cell phone calls while connecting to a two-way radio for full communication, it works with both digital and analog VHF radios and DMR digital radios like Motorola, Rugged, etc. SS-WM1 offers a simple interface for easy operation, allowing you to play pause music or answer calls via the front button. Connect to any audio recording tool via the front facing Audio Out port. The rear end connects to a headset or helmet kit, featuring a PTT connection for two-way radio usage. The product has a wireless connectivity range of 40', high-quality audio streaming, easy pairing with Bluetooth, and automatic muting during radio transmission or reception. The M1 mobile is waterproof with a sealed housing and comes with a Mitsubishi Transmit amplifier.

TITLE: SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - Helmet Kit
DESCRIPTION: SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio is designed for single seat applications, providing Bluetooth connectivity for music streaming and phone calls, as well as two-way radio communication. Compatible with all digital, analog VHF, and DMR digital radios like Motorola and Rugged, the kit uses a straightforward interface for ease of use. The front button is capable of playing, pausing music, answering, disconnecting phone calls, while the front-facing Audio Out port can be connected to a GoPro or similar audio recording device. The rear offers connectivity to a single headset or helmet kit and a PTT connection for two-way radio use. The M1 mobile radio, waterproof and with superior audio clarity, is part of the kit. SS-WM1 guarantees up to 40' range with clear streaming audio and automatic music muting during transmission or reception from radio. For lone riders, this is an optimal communication solution. Installation guides and user manuals are available. Requires a business license.

TITLE: SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio - Over-the-Head H22 Ultimate
DESCRIPTION: SS-WM1 Single Seat Kit with Digital Radio provides Bluetooth connectivity for music streaming and cell phone calls, and connection to a two-way radio. Its features include a simple interface with front button for music operation and phone calls. Its front Audio Out port facilitates connection to audio recording tools such as GoPro, while the rear provides connectivity to a single headset or helmet kit and a PTT connection for linking to a two-way radio. Its wireless connection to Bluetooth devices operates up to 40', it mutes music during radio transmission or reception. The M1 mobile radio is compatible with all digital and analog VHF radios, all DMR digital radios, and sports a waterproof, IP67 sealed housing, offering superior digital audio clarity. A Business License is required for use.

TITLE: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for GMRS and UHF - Non-Ground Plane
DESCRIPTION: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for GMRS and UHF, designed for caravans and offroad vehicle travel, is robust and compact. Its high transmission capabilities ensure clear communication when traveling with a group within a few miles. For optimal transmit distance, switch to the POINT5 antenna. The Stealth antenna is exceptionally low-profile and capable of fitting into toyhaulers or low clearance areas. At only 3.25in tall, it doesn't catch on brush and branches, making it great for trail rides. It offers a frequency of 450-480 MHz and 2.0 dBi Gain. There are two versions available; the GROUND PLANE version for mounting on metal surfaces, and a NON-GROUND PLANE for non-metallic surfaces such as plastic roofs or mirror brackets. A ground plane is a horizontal conducting surface acting as part of an antenna to reflect radio waves.

TITLE: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for GMRS and UHF - Ground Plane
DESCRIPTION: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for GMRS and UHF is an ideal small and powerful solution for communication during caravan and offroad trips. With efficient transmission, this antenna enables clear makings for group rides within a few miles. Paired with a POINT5 antenna, it ensures optimal transmission distance. It is recommended to remove the antenna during storage or travel, and prevention of damage from radio transmission without an antenna emphasizes its importance. The Stealth antenna's super low profile is perfect for low clearance areas. Apart from its compact dimensions, its precise tuning offers two mounting options - a GROUND PLANE version for mounting on metal surfaces such as steel or aluminum roofs, and a NON-GROUND PLANE version for non-metallic surfaces like plastic roofs, or tab mounting on roll cages. It also features a height of 3.25in, NMO mount, and a frequency of 450-480 MHz/ 2.0 dBi Gain.

TITLE: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for VHF - Non-Ground Plane
DESCRIPTION: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for VHF is a small, powerful antenna, ideal for use when travelling with a caravan or offroad vehicle. This antenna provides clear transmit and receive communications within a few miles and offers the ultimate distance when switched to the VHF-1/2W-SPR antenna. Caution is advised not to operate radio without the antenna to avoid damage. With its super low profile, Stealth fits in toyhaulers or other low clearance areas, without getting snagged by low branches or brush, which makes it optimal for trail rides. This antenna is 3.25in tall, has a standard NMO mount, and operates at 150-158 MHz with 2 dB Gain. Options for mounting locations include GROUND PLANE version for metal surfaces such as steel or aluminium roofs, and NON-GROUND PLANE versions for non-metallic surfaces or tab mounting on a roll cage, fender, or mirror brackets.

TITLE: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for VHF - Ground Plane
DESCRIPTION: Stealth Tuned Low Profile Antenna for VHF is a powerful, compact-sized solution ideal for travel with a caravan or offroad vehicle. This antenna ensures clear communication within a group or caravan. In ultimate transmit distance scenarios, simply switch to the VHF-1/2W-SPR antenna. The super low profile Stealth is only 3.25in tall, perfect for low clearance areas and avoids catching on brush or low branches. It operates with a frequency of 150-158 MHz with a 2 dB Gain. It comes with two versions depending on mounting location: GROUND PLANE version for mounting on metal surfaces like steel or aluminum roofs, and NON-GROUND PLANE version for mounting on non-metallic surfaces or tab mounting on a roll cage, fender, or mirror brackets.

TITLE: Rugged Radios Die Cut Stickers - Available In A Variety of Sizes - 12 Inch
DESCRIPTION: Rugged Radios Die Cut Stickers showcase strong adhesive, bold colors and clean lines. Ideal accent for a vehicle, hauler, window or tool box. Can match any body panel color. Sold individually. Available in various sizes. Perfect to display your rugged side.

TITLE: Rugged Radios Bolt Logo Sticker
DESCRIPTION: Rugged Radios Bolt Logo Sticker features a clean black and grey color scheme and strong adhesive. These stickers provide the perfect accent for a vehicle, hauler, window, body panel, or tool box. They measure 5in x 2.7in and are sold individually.

TITLE: Rugged Radios Die Cut Stickers - Available In A Variety of Sizes - 8 Inch
DESCRIPTION: Rugged Radios Die Cut Stickers, available in a variety of sizes, display bold colors and clean lines. TITLE: Rugged Radios  32 Die Cut Sticker
DESCRIPTION: Rugged Radios '32 Die Cut Sticker offers aesthetic appeal for your vehicle, hauler, window, or tool box. Accentuates any color body panel, this die-cut sticker lets you display your Rugged side. Sold individually and each measures 6in Wide by 3.5in Tall.

TITLE: Coax Cable Stripper Tool
DESCRIPTION: Coax Cable Stripper Tool is an optimal tool for constructing antenna kits. This tool allows for a strip length of 6mm. It aligns with RG/U 6, RG/U 58, RG/U 59, RG/U 62, 3C2V, and 5C2V coaxial cables.

TITLE: STX - STEREO High Fidelity Intercom with Bluetooth Music
DESCRIPTION: The STX - STEREO High Fidelity Intercom with Bluetooth Music is a fully featured intercom suitable for vehicles with 2 to 5 seats. This play intercom features voice activated music-dimming, two-way radio connectivity for group communications, enhanced Bluetooth for streaming music, and the capability to answer phone calls. High Fidelity True Stereo is one of the advanced features, leveraging the latest generation Bluetooth technology combined with Alpha Audio Speakers for optimum music listening. The STX Stereo Intercom also allows total cell phone and music control, including volume up/down, skip forward/back, play/pause. This product is compatible with Rugged Radios STX STEREO helmet kits and headsets, STX STEREO cables, and other stereo helmet kits and headsets like PCI Trax.

TITLE: OFFROAD and STX SUPER SPORT Headset and Helmet Kit Adapter - Adapter for STX Stereo Cables
DESCRIPTION: OFFROAD and STX SUPER SPORT Headset and Helmet Kit Adapter connect a SUPER SPORT headset or helmet kit to OFFROAD or STX Stereo cabling. They use a snap-lock 3.5mm Dura-Link female connector, providing a secure, waterproof connection to Rugged SUPER SPORT cabling and adapting them to existing cabling. The adapter has a snap-lock 3.5mm Dura-link Connector (female) and OFFROAD or Stereo XTX adapters are selectable. This adapter offers a secure, press-fit connection and is compatible with SUPER SPORT helmet kits and H10-SPORT Headset.

TITLE: Dura-Link Cable Plug for STX STEREO Jacks
DESCRIPTION: Dura-Link Cable Plug for STX STEREO Jacks provides protection, sealing the female jack against water, dirt, and debris. Ideal when you're outside the vehicle or clearing weekend dust and dirt. Sold individually. Note, compatibility with OFFROAD cables isn't featured. Regarding STX STEREO Jack Mounts usage, the cable must account for the Dura-Link depth.

TITLE: STX - REMOTE HEAD - STEREO High Fidelity Intercom with Bluetooth Music
DESCRIPTION: STX - REMOTE HEAD - STEREO High Fidelity Intercom with Bluetooth Music offers stereo features in a compact package adaptable to standard rocker switch holes, optimising dash space use. Release of this high fidelity true stereo music intercom meets expectations for sound quality and user-friendly operation while providing novel add-ons elevating the ride experience. Key advanced features include remote head rocker switch interface fitting all regular rocker switch holes for space savvy vehicles and the latest Bluetooth technology linked with Alpha Audio Speakers for a superior music experience. To outline, the product has a remote head rocker switch interface, high fidelity and true stereo music, enhanced Bluetooth, total cell phone and music control interface, and is two-way radio ready. Included are a remote head rocker switch interface, slide-in intercom mount, and mount hardware.

TITLE: Rocker Switch Adapter - Carling Style 6-Pack
DESCRIPTION: Rocker Switch Adapter - Carling Style 6-Pack is designed for 2025 RZR Pro models and alike vehicles. The adapters provide enhanced accessibility by pushing your standard switches out slightly and keep them secure in place. Openings are adapted to 1.45in x 0.830in for Carling style switch.

TITLE: Replacement Intercom Control Head
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Intercom Control Head is a replacement intercom rocker switch suitable for the 696 PLUS Remote Head Intercom and STX Remote Head Intercom. This product requires a simple plug into your intercom for operation.

TITLE: Rocker Switch Hole Plug
DESCRIPTION: Rocker Switch Hole Plug provides a clean look to your rocker switch panel, flawlessly fitting into a blank hole either as a placeholder for future switch addition, or to conceal an area of removed, unneeded switch. TITLE: UNI-MAG Universal NMO or Magnetic Antenna Mount

Option two is a standard NMO mount, which can be easily revealed by disassembling the UNI-MAG. This mount can be affixed to a tab, threaded through a car roof or attached to a roll cage with an Antenna Bar Mount. The accompanying cable features a secure, weathertight UHF/RL-259 connector compatible with Rugged Radios and other standard connection manufacturers. Additional features include a nickel plated brass NMO, gold contact pin, a 13 Ft. RG-58 Cable, a UHF male connector, and a sturdy 3-1/4in ABS base. Note: Antenna not included.

It is compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios operating on the same frequencies including RDM-DB, M1, RDH-X, R1, V3, RM60, RH5R, RDH16, plus Icom, Motorola, Kenwood business band radios and more. FCC and CE certified. Business License required.

TITLE: Long Range Bundle for V3 and RH5R Handheld Radios
DESCRIPTION: Long Range Bundle for V3 and RH5R Handheld Radios extends the performance of your handheld radio by 30% with a long-range dual-band ducky antenna, offering a larger transmit distance. The inclusion of a high capacity 3800mAh battery provides double the battery life of a standard battery - ideal as a spare, backup, or during race events. The bundle is compatible with Rugged Radios V3 and RH-5R handheld radios but not with Rugged Radios R1. The radio is not included in the bundle.

TITLE: V3 READY PACK - Rugged V3 - Business Band Two Way Handheld Radios - Analog Only
DESCRIPTION: V3 READY PACK - Rugged V3 - Business Band Two Way Handheld Radios - Analog Only Handheld come as a pack of two with essential accessories. These include XL Antennas for increased range, XL Batteries for extended battery life, USB charging cables for on-the-go charges, and a storage bag. The pack features a dual band V3 Handheld Radio for communication with crews and racers. Operating on both VHF and UHF bands, this radio serves dual purposes. It's compatible with all VHF/UHF business band radios, such as RDM-DB, M1, RDH-X, R1, V3, RM60, RH5R, RDH16, Icom, Motorola, Kenwood etc. but a business license is needed. The package is FCC and CE certified.

TITLE: Replacement Hook and Loop for BT2 Bluetooth Headset
DESCRIPTION: Replacement Hook and Loop for BT2 Bluetooth Headset is a direct replacement kit designed specifically for the BT2 Bluetooth Headset. This complete kit features all the required fasteners needed for speakers, mic boom, and the BT2 unit itself.

TITLE: VHF 1/2 Wave No Ground Plane (NGP) Antenna
DESCRIPTION: VHF 1/2 Wave No Ground Plane (NGP) Antenna delivers optimum performance in the VHF range of frequencies. Enhanced with wide-band technology, this plug-and-play antenna doesn't require metal surface attachment. Even without ground plane usage, the antenna performs well for all users. Comprised of a molded high heat ABS base with silver soldered connections, gold plated push pin contacts, and O-ring. The antenna covers VHF Range of 136-174 Mhz, pre-tuned to 154 MHz. It has no connector type, is chrome colored, and offers 4.5 dB gain with VHF Bandwidth of 4 MHz. Power capacity is up to 120 watts. The whip, made from 17-7PH Stainless Steel, measures 39.8in at 154 MHz. Offering an NMO Style VHF Base, this pre-tuned antenna is ready for mounting and usage.

TITLE: VHF Fiberglass Base Camp Antenna
DESCRIPTION: VHF Fiberglass Base Camp Antenna enhances radio transmission and reception performance, particularly helpful for long-distance communication. A suitable addition for base camp, chase truck, or pit crew,  performance can be further improved by elevating the antenna with a telescoping flagpole. Notable features include a high performance 200 watts power rating, low SWR, a broader band, and a weatherproof Flag Pole Mounting Bracket. The High Gain Mast diameter accepted is 1-3/16in to 2-7/16in,  with a UHF Connector. Best performance is achieved with a 35' HD coaxial cable and the optional Telescoping Flagpole. The antenna stands 6' tall, with gain registering at 4.5dB / 6.6dBi.

TITLE: VHF Long Range Antenna for RDH 16 Digital Radio
DESCRIPTION: VHF Long Range Antenna for RDH 16 Digital Radio is designed specifically for VHF RDH-16 Digital Handheld Radio. The antenna increases range by up to 30%, improving transmission and reception. Easy installation involves unscrewing the existing antenna and threading this one on. With a height of 6.5in, this is a dedicated VHF antenna for 136mHz-174mHz. Requires a UHF version for UHF-DUCKY-RDH.

TITLE: VHF Antenna Set Screw Set
DESCRIPTION: VHF Antenna Set Screw Set replaces lost or broken hardware on your antenna. It includes two screws and an allen wrench for securely fixing your whip antenna within the base.

TITLE: Replacement 8 Ohm 50mm Headset Speaker
DESCRIPTION: Replacement 8 Ohm 50mm Headset Speaker is an 8 ohm, 50 mm speaker replacement for a headset.

TITLE: Small Cable Strain Relief Grommet
DESCRIPTION: Small Cable Strain Relief Grommet is a compact solution for cable strain relief. With dimensions of 1/2in in length and width, and a hole diameter of 1/8in, this product is designed for small strain relief for cables.

TITLE: Large Cable Strain Relief Grommet for H22-ULT and H42-ULT Headsets
DESCRIPTION: Large Cable Strain Relief Grommet for H22-ULT and H42-ULT Headsets is a large relief grommet for cables. Measurements: 1 in in length and 5/8in in width. The hole diameter is 3/16in.

TITLE: UHF & VHF Wide Band 1/4 Wave Antenna with Spring (132 - 525 MHz)
DESCRIPTION: UHF & VHF Wide Band 1/4 Wave Antenna with Spring (132 - 525 MHz) is a wide band quarter wave antenna featuring a shock spring. With bandwidths of 24 MHz in VHF and 100 MHz in UHF, it is suitable for heavy duty equipment vehicles. A ground plane can improve the performance, but is not necessary. For best results, this antenna should be cut and tuned to a single specified frequency. It operates within 132-525 mhz, with 0 db 18in whip.

TITLE: 41  Replacement VHF Whip Antenna (PAIR)
DESCRIPTION: 41in Replacement VHF Whip Antenna (PAIR) is a crucial component for most 1/2 wave antennas. Specifically, this whip can be cut-tuned for use on 141-176MHz, with a 44in whip recommended for frequencies below 141MHz. Designed as a replacement for VHF radios, this pair of 41in stainless antenna whips is also recommended for Dual band radios. A tuning chart is provided for aligning the whip to the gear's frequency. The whip is designed for quick restoration of communications performance in case of lost or damaged antennas. Note that a SWR Meter is essential for proper antenna tuning.

TITLE: VHF 1/2 Wave Replacement Whip Antenna
DESCRIPTION: VHF 1/2 Wave Replacement Whip Antenna 44.5in is a stainless replacement for VHF radios. When your antenna gets lost or damaged, use this spare whip to maintain full efficiency and performance in communications. You can tune or cut the antenna whip according to the frequency employed, as per the VHF Antenna Tuning Chart provided. It's important to note that a SWR Meter is essential for tuning your antenna properly.

TITLE: Wire Boom for H15 H22 H42 Headsets

TITLE: Wire Boom Mounting Kit for Headsets or Helmets
DESCRIPTION: Wire Boom Mounting Kit is designed for headsets or helmets. This kit, available in black, mounts your wire boom to either a headset or helmet.

TITLE: Wire Transfer Fees
